original: nyung zad nyung zad 'khru dang bcas //
analyzed: nyung zad nyung zad 'khru dang bcas //
translated: There is frequent loose stool, with little pain.🔽There is itching of the anus, and flatulence,

original: ba spu brtse zhing glongs bcas dang // chu so lto ba gzhang kha lci //🔽bshang yang bshang ba ma btang snyam //
analyzed: ba spu brtse zhing glongs bcas dang // chu so lto ba gzhang kha lci // bshang yang bshang ba ma btang snyam //
translated: and heaviness of the bladder, abdomen, and anus.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: There is a feeling of incomplete defecation.

original: bad kan las gyur pa'i tshad par 'khru ba ni 'khru ba ska zhing gar gar por 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'byar bag la sogs pa dang bcas par 'byung ba dang / khong snyom pa ni bya ba rnams la spro ba chung ba'o //🔽glongs pa ni nad rnams bskyod par gyur pa'o //🔽lci ba ni chu so dang @134a * //
analyzed: bad kan las gyur pa'i tshad par 'khru ba ni 'khru ba ska zhing gar gar por 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'byar bag la sogs pa dang bcas par 'byung ba dang / khong snyom pa ni bya ba rnams la spro ba chung ba'o // glongs pa ni nad rnams bskyod par gyur pa'o // lci ba ni chu so dang @134a * //
translated: The fever of phlegm is characterized by loose stools that are thin and slimy, with a feeling of heaviness in the abdomen, and a feeling of incomplete defecation.

original: lto ba dang gzhang kha kun tu lci zhing sbom pa snyam du sems pa'o //
analyzed: lto ba dang gzhang kha kun tu lci zhing sbom pa snyam du sems pa'o //
translated: The feeling of heaviness is a feeling of heaviness and distension of the bladder, abdomen, and anus.

original: bshang yang bshang ba ma btang ba snyam du sems pa ni bshang ba bshang zhing 'dor du zin kyang khong lci bsam bshang ba snyam du sems shing yang dang yang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bshang yang bshang ba ma btang ba snyam du sems pa ni bshang ba bshang zhing 'dor du zin kyang khong lci bsam bshang ba snyam du sems shing yang dang yang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The feeling of incomplete defecation is a feeling that even after defecating and expelling the stool, the abdomen is heavy and there is a feeling of incomplete defecation, and it occurs again and again.

original: kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The one arising from all humors has the characteristics of all.

original: nad gzhi kun 'dus pa las skyes pa'i tshad par 'khru ba ni nad gzhi gsum char gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: nad gzhi kun 'dus pa las skyes pa'i tshad par 'khru ba ni nad gzhi gsum char gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: The one arising from all humors has the characteristics of all three humors.

original: 'jigs pas sems ni 'khrugs gyur pa //🔽rlung gis mkhris bcas bshang ba ni //🔽sla byed de nas 'khru ba ni //
analyzed: 'jigs pas sems ni 'khrugs gyur pa // rlung gis mkhris bcas bshang ba ni // sla byed de nas 'khru ba ni //
translated: The one arising from fear is disturbed by the mind.🔽The one arising from wind is the easy evacuation of feces with bile.

original: tsha zhing sla la 'phyo ba dang // mtshan ma rlung mkhris las byung 'dra //🔽mya ngan las byung de dang 'dra //
analyzed: tsha zhing sla la 'phyo ba dang // mtshan ma rlung mkhris las byung 'dra // mya ngan las byung de dang 'dra //
translated: Then the one arising from bile is the evacuation of hot, easy, and frothy feces.🔽The characteristics are like those of wind and bile.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: The one arising from grief is similar to that.

original: 'jigs pa'i rgyus sems 'khrugs shing glongs par gyur pa rlung gis mkhris pa dang bcas pa'i bshang ba sla zhing gsher bar byed la /
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i rgyus sems 'khrugs shing glongs par gyur pa rlung gis mkhris pa dang bcas pa'i bshang ba sla zhing gsher bar byed la /
translated: The one arising from fear is the disturbance and agitation of the mind by the cause of fear. The wind causes the easy and watery evacuation of feces with bile.

original: de nas de'i 'og tu tshad par 'khru ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni 'khru ba'i rang bzhin tsha zhing dro ba dang / sla zhing gar bag med pa dang / 'phyo zhing chur mi 'bying ba dang / mtshan ma rlung dang mkhris pa las byung ba dang 'dra ba yin par slob dpon rnams kyis bshad do //
analyzed: de nas de'i 'og tu tshad par 'khru ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni 'khru ba'i rang bzhin tsha zhing dro ba dang / sla zhing gar bag med pa dang / 'phyo zhing chur mi 'bying ba dang / mtshan ma rlung dang mkhris pa las byung ba dang 'dra ba yin par slob dpon rnams kyis bshad do //
translated: Then, after that, a fever with diarrhea occurs. The nature of diarrhea is hot and warm, soft and loose, floating and not sinking in water, and the signs are similar to those arising from wind and bile. The masters explain.

original: mya ngan las byung ba'i tshad par 'khru ba'i mtshan nyid kyang rlung dang mkhris ba las byung ba'i tshul de dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin par bshad do //
analyzed: mya ngan las byung ba'i tshad par 'khru ba'i mtshan nyid kyang rlung dang mkhris ba las byung ba'i tshul de dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin par bshad do //
translated: The characteristics of fever with diarrhea arising from grief are also explained as being similar and like those arising from wind and bile.

original: mdor na tshad 'khru rnam gnyis te //
analyzed: mdor na tshad 'khru rnam gnyis te //
translated: In brief, there are two types of fever with diarrhea:

original: ma zhur bcas dang ma zhu med //
analyzed: ma zhur bcas dang ma zhu med //
translated: with indigestion and without indigestion,

original: khrag bcas khrag med /
analyzed: khrag bcas khrag med /
translated: with blood and without blood.

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: Here it is said:

original: tshad par 'khru ba ni mdor na rnam pa gnyis yin te /
analyzed: tshad par 'khru ba ni mdor na rnam pa gnyis yin te /
translated: In brief, fever with diarrhea is of two types:

original: smin pa dang ma smin pa'i rnam pa 'am /
analyzed: smin pa dang ma smin pa'i rnam pa 'am /
translated: the type of ripening and the type of non-ripening,

original: khrag dang bcas pa'am khrag med pa'i rnam pas so //
analyzed: khrag dang bcas pa'am khrag med pa'i rnam pas so //
translated: or the type with blood and the type without blood.

original: de las ni //
analyzed: de las ni //
translated: From that,

original: dang po bshang gci chur 'bying 'gyur //🔽dri mnam lto ni sbo ba dang // mkhregs shing mchil snabs shin tu mang //
analyzed: dang po bshang gci chur 'bying 'gyur // dri mnam lto ni sbo ba dang // mkhregs shing mchil snabs shin tu mang //
translated: First, the feces and urine sink in water.🔽There is a bad smell, distension of the stomach,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: hardness, and excessive mucus and saliva.

original: tshad par 'khru ba smin pa dang ma smin pa de gnyis kyi nang nas /
analyzed: tshad par 'khru ba smin pa dang ma smin pa de gnyis kyi nang nas /
translated: Among the two types of diarrhea, ripe and unripe,

original: dang po ma smin pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan nyid ni 'khru bar 'byung ba'i bshang ba de rang bzhin lci zhing /
analyzed: dang po ma smin pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan nyid ni 'khru bar 'byung ba'i bshang ba de rang bzhin lci zhing /
translated: the characteristics of unripe diarrhea are as follows: The feces that are the basis of diarrhea are naturally heavy.

original: chu la bcug na nang du 'bying zhing nub par 'gyur ba dang / dri mnam zhing nga ba dang / lto sbo ba la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: chu la bcug na nang du 'bying zhing nub par 'gyur ba dang / dri mnam zhing nga ba dang / lto sbo ba la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If placed in water, they sink and submerge, and there is a bad smell, distension of the stomach, and so on.

original: smin pa de las bzlog @134b pa yin ;🔽/ zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: smin pa de las bzlog @134b pa yin ; / zhes bya ba la /
translated: Ripe diarrhea is the opposite of that.

original: bshang ba smin pa'i mtshan nyid de las go bzlog pa yin te /
analyzed: bshang ba smin pa'i mtshan nyid de las go bzlog pa yin te /
translated: The characteristics of ripe diarrhea are the opposite of that.

original: bshang ba yang zhing chur mi 'bying ba dang / lhag par dring ba med pa dang / lto sbo pa la sogs pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: bshang ba yang zhing chur mi 'bying ba dang / lhag par dring ba med pa dang / lto sbo pa la sogs pa med pa yin no //
translated: The feces are light and do not sink in water, there is no excessive smell, and there is no distension of the stomach, and so on.

original: bad kan smin pa'ang chu nang 'bying //
analyzed: bad kan smin pa'ang chu nang 'bying //
translated: Phlegm that is ripe also sinks in water.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /

original: bad kan gyi rgyu las tshad par 'khru ba ni /
analyzed: bad kan gyi rgyu las tshad par 'khru ba ni /
translated: The text reads: If one has a fever due to phlegm,

original: smin zhing ma zhu ba med pa yin yang chu'i nang du 'bying bar 'gyur ba yin no //🔽gang zhig tshad 'khru 'bad pa ni //🔽med des pho ba'i nad du 'gyur //
analyzed: smin zhing ma zhu ba med pa yin yang chu'i nang du 'bying bar 'gyur ba yin no // gang zhig tshad 'khru 'bad pa ni // med des pho ba'i nad du 'gyur //
translated: one sinks in water even though ripe and undigested.🔽The text reads: If one has a fever and does not make an effort,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: that will become a stomach disease.

original: skyes bu gang la tshad pa'i nad kyis thebs par gyur nas spang bar bya ba'i dngos po spang bar bya ba la 'bad pa med par gyur na /
analyzed: skyes bu gang la tshad pa'i nad kyis thebs par gyur nas spang bar bya ba'i dngos po spang bar bya ba la 'bad pa med par gyur na /
translated: If a person who has been struck by a fever does not make an effort to avoid what should be avoided,

original: des grang ba la sogs pa'i pho ba'i nad du 'gyur ro //🔽me drod nyams par byed pa yi //
analyzed: des grang ba la sogs pa'i pho ba'i nad du 'gyur ro // me drod nyams par byed pa yi //
translated: that will become a stomach disease of cold, etc.

original: zas bsten pa yis me drod nyams //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zas bsten pa yis me drod nyams // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The text reads: By relying on food and drink that impairs the digestive heat, the digestive heat is impaired.

original: pho ba'i nad de yang khong pa'i me drod nyams par byed pa'i kha zas dang btung ba bsten zhing longs spyod pa las me drod nyams shing grang ba'i pho ba'i nad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pho ba'i nad de yang khong pa'i me drod nyams par byed pa'i kha zas dang btung ba bsten zhing longs spyod pa las me drod nyams shing grang ba'i pho ba'i nad du 'gyur ro //
translated: By relying on and consuming food and drink that impairs the digestive heat in the stomach, the digestive heat is impaired and becomes a stomach disease of cold.

original: pho ba'i nad dang tshad par 'khru ba la khyad par ci zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: pho ba'i nad dang tshad par 'khru ba la khyad par ci zhig yod ce na /
translated: What is the difference between a stomach disorder and diarrhea?

original: de'i phyir smras pa ni /🔽gang zhig zhu nas bshang ba ni //🔽be'u snabs bcas dang be'u snabs med //
analyzed: de'i phyir smras pa ni / gang zhig zhu nas bshang ba ni // be'u snabs bcas dang be'u snabs med //
translated: Therefore, it is said:🔽That which is digested and excreted🔽with or without mucus

original: 'khru ba de ni tshad 'khru ste //
analyzed: 'khru ba de ni tshad 'khru ste //
translated: is diarrhea.

original: rang bzhin gyis ni myur gsod byed //🔽ces bya ba la /🔽nad kyi khyad par gang dag gis zas zhu bar gyur nas bshang ba be'u snabs dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni myur gsod byed // ces bya ba la / nad kyi khyad par gang dag gis zas zhu bar gyur nas bshang ba be'u snabs dang bcas pa'am /
translated: It is naturally a quick killer.

original: be'u snabs med pa'i rnam par 'khru bar gyur pa ni tshad par 'khru ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: be'u snabs med pa'i rnam par 'khru bar gyur pa ni tshad par 'khru ba zhes bya ste /
translated: That which is digested and excreted with or without mucus due to a specific disorder is called diarrhea.

original: de ni rang gi rang bzhin gyis myur du gsod cing gnod par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni rang gi rang bzhin gyis myur du gsod cing gnod par byed pa yin no //
translated: It is naturally a quick killer and a harm-doer.🔽Undigested food, indigestion,

original: ma zhu kha zas ma zhu dang // zhu ba smin pa'ang mi 'khru 'gyur //🔽rgyu med yang dang yang sri ba'am //
analyzed: ma zhu kha zas ma zhu dang // zhu ba smin pa'ang mi 'khru 'gyur // rgyu med yang dang yang sri ba'am //
translated: and even digested ripened food do not cause diarrhea.🔽Without a cause, it occurs again and again,

original: rgyu med yang yang sla bar 'byung //🔽pho bar ma zhu sogs shing 'khru //
analyzed: rgyu med yang yang sla bar 'byung // pho bar ma zhu sogs shing 'khru //
translated: or without a cause, it easily occurs again and again.

original: yun ring na bar byed pa yin //
analyzed: yun ring na bar byed pa yin //
translated: Diarrhea in the stomach and so on causes long-term illness.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /

original: pho ba grang ba'i ma zhu ba'i nad ni bshang ba ma zhu ba'i be'u snabs sam /🔽zas dang bcas par nges par 'khru bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: pho ba grang ba'i ma zhu ba'i nad ni bshang ba ma zhu ba'i be'u snabs sam / zas dang bcas par nges par 'khru bar 'gyur la /
translated: The indigestion of a cold stomach is a diarrhea with undigested feces, or with mucus, or with food.

original: zas zhu nas ni bshang ba sri bar 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas ma smin par 'khru bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zas zhu nas ni bshang ba sri bar 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas ma smin par 'khru bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It is certain that there is diarrhea, but when the food is digested, the diarrhea of feces does not occur. Therefore, there is diarrhea before digestion.

original: yang rgyu med par glo bur du bshang ba de yang dang yang du sri ba dang / @135a * //
analyzed: yang rgyu med par glo bur du bshang ba de yang dang yang du sri ba dang / @135a * //
translated: Also, the diarrhea of feces without cause occurs suddenly and repeatedly.

original: yang lan 'ga' ni rgyu med par bshang ba de sla bar yang dang yang du 'byung zhing 'khru bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang lan 'ga' ni rgyu med par bshang ba de sla bar yang dang yang du 'byung zhing 'khru bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Also, sometimes the diarrhea of feces without cause occurs easily and repeatedly.

original: yang pho ba'i ma zhu ba de ni yun ring du sogs shing bshang ba 'khru ba dang / yun ring por na bar byed cing myur du gsod par mi byed pa yin no //
analyzed: yang pho ba'i ma zhu ba de ni yun ring du sogs shing bshang ba 'khru ba dang / yun ring por na bar byed cing myur du gsod par mi byed pa yin no //
translated: That indigestion of the stomach lasts a long time, causes diarrhea of feces, and causes illness for a long time, but does not quickly kill.

original: de ni nad sna re re 'dus ;
analyzed: de ni nad sna re re 'dus ;
translated: That is the collection of each disease.

original: / las byung rnam pa bzhi yin no //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: / las byung rnam pa bzhi yin no // zhes bya ba la /
translated: It arises from karma, and has four types.

original: pho ba ma zhu ba'i nad de ni rnam pa bzhi yod de /
analyzed: pho ba ma zhu ba'i nad de ni rnam pa bzhi yod de /
translated: That indigestion of the stomach has four types.

original: rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi re re nas skyes pa dang / 'dus pa las byung ba'i bzhi yin no //
analyzed: rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi re re nas skyes pa dang / 'dus pa las byung ba'i bzhi yin no //
translated: The four types of disorders are those that arise from each of the humors, wind and so forth, and those that arise from their combination.🔽The preliminary stages of these are: a feeling of heaviness,

original: de yi sngon tshul snyom pa dang // ring nas 'ju zhing skyur bag 'byung //
analyzed: de yi sngon tshul snyom pa dang // ring nas 'ju zhing skyur bag 'byung //
translated: a long-lasting indigestion, and belching.

original: mchil mang kha yis dri mi tshor //
analyzed: mchil mang kha yis dri mi tshor //
translated: One produces much saliva, and the mouth has a bad smell.

original: rmya snyom skom zhing yi ga 'chus //
analyzed: rmya snyom skom zhing yi ga 'chus //
translated: One feels weak, thirsty, and has a loss of appetite.

original: lto sbo slon ni bro ba dang // rna ba rgyu ma sgra dang bcas //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: lto sbo slon ni bro ba dang // rna ba rgyu ma sgra dang bcas // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The stomach is distended, and there is a rumbling sound in the stomach and intestines.

original: pho ba ma zhu ba grang ba'i nad de phyis 'byung ba'i tshul ni yan lag snyom zhing nyam chung ba dang / pho ba'i me drod zhan zhing zas rid nas 'ju ba dang / de bzhin du sgregs pa skyur bag 'byung ba la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: pho ba ma zhu ba grang ba'i nad de phyis 'byung ba'i tshul ni yan lag snyom zhing nyam chung ba dang / pho ba'i me drod zhan zhing zas rid nas 'ju ba dang / de bzhin du sgregs pa skyur bag 'byung ba la sogs pa yin no //
translated: The way in which indigestion, a cold disorder, occurs later is that the limbs feel heavy and weak, the digestive heat of the stomach is weak, food is digested slowly, and similarly belching is sour.🔽The general characteristics are: emaciation,

original: spyi yi mtshan nyid skem pa dang // du ba mun dang rims kyis 'debs //
analyzed: spyi yi mtshan nyid skem pa dang // du ba mun dang rims kyis 'debs //
translated: smoke, darkness, and being struck by contagious diseases.

original: brgyal zhing mgo na bshang ba 'gags //
analyzed: brgyal zhing mgo na bshang ba 'gags //
translated: One faints, has a headache, and constipation.

original: rkang pa lag pa skrangs par 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rkang pa lag pa skrangs par 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba la /
translated: The feet and hands become swollen.

original: pho ba'i nad bzhi char gyi spyi'i thun mong gi mtshan nyid ni lus skom zhing rid pa nas rkang pa dang lag pa skrangs par 'gyur ba'i bar yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: pho ba'i nad bzhi char gyi spyi'i thun mong gi mtshan nyid ni lus skom zhing rid pa nas rkang pa dang lag pa skrangs par 'gyur ba'i bar yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The general characteristics of all four types of stomach disorders should be known to be from the body being thirsty and emaciated to the swelling of the feet and hands.

original: de la rlung la rkan skams shing //
analyzed: de la rlung la rkan skams shing //
translated: In that regard, for wind [disorders], the palate is dry,

original: rab rib rna bar sgra 'byung dang // rtsib logs brla dang chu sor na //
analyzed: rab rib rna bar sgra 'byung dang // rtsib logs brla dang chu sor na //
translated: there is blurred vision, sounds in the ears, and pain in the ribs, thighs, and urinary bladder.

original: bshang ba yang dang yang du 'byung //
analyzed: bshang ba yang dang yang du 'byung //
translated: Feces are passed again and again,

original: yang yang sbo zhing gsud pa dang // ro rnams kun la brkam pa dang // bkres skom rgyu ma bcad snyam sems //
analyzed: yang yang sbo zhing gsud pa dang // ro rnams kun la brkam pa dang // bkres skom rgyu ma bcad snyam sems //
translated: there is frequent belching and vomiting, craving for all tastes, and the feeling that hunger and thirst are not relieved.🔽After food is digested, there is bloating,

original: zas zhu nas ni sbo ba dang // zas zos nas ni bde bar 'gyur //🔽rlung gi snying nad skran gzhang 'brum //
analyzed: zas zhu nas ni sbo ba dang // zas zos nas ni bde bar 'gyur // rlung gi snying nad skran gzhang 'brum //
translated: and after eating, there is comfort.🔽Wind disorders are suspected to cause heart disease, tumors, hemorrhoids,

original: mdzer pa skya rbab 'byung bar dogs //
analyzed: mdzer pa skya rbab 'byung bar dogs //
translated: swellings, and ascites.

original: bshang ba 'byung dka' ska slar 'byung //
analyzed: bshang ba 'byung dka' ska slar 'byung //
translated: Feces are difficult to pass and return with pain,

original: de yang be'u snabs sgra can 'byung //
analyzed: de yang be'u snabs sgra can 'byung //
translated: and there is also mucus and gurgling sounds.

original: gzhang na lud pa dbugs mi bde //
analyzed: gzhang na lud pa dbugs mi bde //
translated: There is hemorrhoids, phlegm, and dyspnea.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de la pho ba'i nad bzhi po'i nang nas rlung la sogs pa'i pho ba'i mtshan nyid ni rkan skams par 'gyur ba dang / mig rab rib kyis 'debs pa dang / rna @135b bar sgra zi zi por 'byung ba dang / rtsib logs la sogs pa na bar 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: de la pho ba'i nad bzhi po'i nang nas rlung la sogs pa'i pho ba'i mtshan nyid ni rkan skams par 'gyur ba dang / mig rab rib kyis 'debs pa dang / rna @135b bar sgra zi zi por 'byung ba dang / rtsib logs la sogs pa na bar 'gyur ba dang /
translated: Among the four stomach illnesses, the characteristics of the stomach illnesses of wind and so forth are: the palate becomes dry, the eyes are covered with cataracts, a buzzing sound occurs in the ears, and the sides and so forth ache.

original: mngar ba la sogs pa'i ro rnams kun la brkam zhing chags pa dang / rgyu ma bcad pa bzhin du sems shing na ba dang / zas zhu nas lto spo bar 'gyur ba dang / de ltar na na bas kha zas zos shing longs spyad na sla bar 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: mngar ba la sogs pa'i ro rnams kun la brkam zhing chags pa dang / rgyu ma bcad pa bzhin du sems shing na ba dang / zas zhu nas lto spo bar 'gyur ba dang / de ltar na na bas kha zas zos shing longs spyad na sla bar 'gyur ba dang /
translated: One craves and is attached to all tastes such as sweet and so forth, one thinks about cutting the intestines and so forth, and one’s stomach moves after food is digested. Thus, if one eats and enjoys food when sick, it will be easy.

original: rlung las gyur pa'i snying nad la sogs pa 'byung bar dogs shing yid gnyis su 'gyur ba dang / yun ring zhig na bshang ba 'byung zhing thogs la na bar 'gyur ba dang / ska ba dang sla ba la sogs pa'i khyad par ldan par 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: rlung las gyur pa'i snying nad la sogs pa 'byung bar dogs shing yid gnyis su 'gyur ba dang / yun ring zhig na bshang ba 'byung zhing thogs la na bar 'gyur ba dang / ska ba dang sla ba la sogs pa'i khyad par ldan par 'byung ba yin no //
translated: One suspects and is uncertain that a heart illness and so forth will arise from wind, and after a long time, one defecates with difficulty and pain, and it occurs with the specific characteristics of thin and thick and so forth.

original: mkhris pa sngo zhing ser ba dang // ser po sla bag 'khru bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mkhris pa sngo zhing ser ba dang // ser po sla bag 'khru bar 'gyur //
translated: The pitta-type stomach disorder is loose stools that are green and yellow, or yellow in color, and so forth.

original: mnam zhing sgregs skyur snying lkog tsha //
analyzed: mnam zhing sgregs skyur snying lkog tsha //

original: tshad dang dbyibs ni yungs kar 'dra //
analyzed: tshad dang dbyibs ni yungs kar 'dra //
translated: The size and shape are like mustard seeds.

original: myur du smin zhing nad tshabs che //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: myur du smin zhing nad tshabs che // zhes bya ba la /
translated: It quickly ripens and is a serious disease.

original: 'brum bu sran chung zhes bya ba ni tshad dang dbyibs sran chung dang 'dra ba @144b yin no ;
analyzed: 'brum bu sran chung zhes bya ba ni tshad dang dbyibs sran chung dang 'dra ba @144b yin no ;
translated: The disease called “pea-like boils” has a size and shape like a pea.

original: / de bzhin du tshad dang dbyibs yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran yang yod de /
analyzed: / de bzhin du tshad dang dbyibs yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran yang yod de /
translated: Similarly, there are also boils with a size and shape like mustard seeds.

original: de ni myur du smin zhing nad tshabs che ba yin no //🔽yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran gyis //
analyzed: de ni myur du smin zhing nad tshabs che ba yin no // yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran gyis //
translated: That one quickly ripens and is a serious disease.🔽The boils that are like mustard seeds

original: yongs su bskor bas chu bur can //
analyzed: yongs su bskor bas chu bur can //
translated: are surrounded by blisters.

original: bu bcas che zhing mang ba la ;
analyzed: bu bcas che zhing mang ba la ;
translated: The abscesses are large and numerous,

original: / rab phra'i 'brum bus khyab gyur pa'o //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: / rab phra'i 'brum bus khyab gyur pa'o // zhes bya ba la /
translated: and are covered with tiny pustules.

original: 'bras nad bu bcas zhes bya ba ni yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran gyis yongs su bskor cing /
analyzed: 'bras nad bu bcas zhes bya ba ni yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran gyis yongs su bskor cing /
translated: The abscesses are called “with children” because they are surrounded by tiny pustules that resemble mustard seeds.

original: de bzhin du lhun che ba dang / mang zhing shin tu phra ba dang / du mas khyab cing g-yogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du lhun che ba dang / mang zhing shin tu phra ba dang / du mas khyab cing g-yogs pa yin no //
translated: Similarly, they are large, numerous, very small, and covered and enveloped by many [pustules].

original: ldum bu bi da ri ltar zlum //
analyzed: ldum bu bi da ri ltar zlum //
translated: The abscesses are round like the vidari plant.

original: sra ba bi da ri zhes bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sra ba bi da ri zhes bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The hard ones are called vidari.

original: bi da ri zhes bya ba'i 'bras nad ni ldum bu bi da ri zhes bya ba'i dbyibs ltar zlum por gnas la /
analyzed: bi da ri zhes bya ba'i 'bras nad ni ldum bu bi da ri zhes bya ba'i dbyibs ltar zlum por gnas la /
translated: The abscesses called vidari are round like the shape of the vidari plant.

original: rdo ltar shin tu sra ba yin no //
analyzed: rdo ltar shin tu sra ba yin no //
translated: They are very hard like stone.

original: khong 'bras gzhan du bshad pa yin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: khong 'bras gzhan du bshad pa yin // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The other abscesses are explained elsewhere.

original: khong 'bras zhes bya ba'i nad ni skabs gzhan du bshad de /
analyzed: khong 'bras zhes bya ba'i nad ni skabs gzhan du bshad de /
translated: The abscesses called “internal” are explained elsewhere.

original: 'di'i rjes thogs kyi le'u las bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i rjes thogs kyi le'u las bshad pa yin no //
translated: They are explained in the chapter that follows this one.

original: de la dang po'i 'bras nad gsum //
analyzed: de la dang po'i 'bras nad gsum //
translated: Of those, the first three abscesses

original: bu bcas dang ni bi da ri //
analyzed: bu bcas dang ni bi da ri //
translated: are “with children” and “vidari.”

original: tshil chen las byung brnag dka' yin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: tshil chen las byung brnag dka' yin // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The one arising from fat is difficult to cure.

original: de la 'bras kyi nad 'di dag gi nang nas dang po'i gsum po khar thor zhes bya ba dang / rus sbal zhes bya ba dang / dra ba can zhes bya ba gsum dang / bu bcas dang bi da ri zhes bya ba lnga po gal te tshil che ba'i mi 'byung na brnag par dka' zhing nad tshabs che ba yin no //🔽gzhan dag mkhris pa shas che zhing //
analyzed: de la 'bras kyi nad 'di dag gi nang nas dang po'i gsum po khar thor zhes bya ba dang / rus sbal zhes bya ba dang / dra ba can zhes bya ba gsum dang / bu bcas dang bi da ri zhes bya ba lnga po gal te tshil che ba'i mi 'byung na brnag par dka' zhing nad tshabs che ba yin no // gzhan dag mkhris pa shas che zhing //
translated: Among these diseases of hemorrhoids, the first three, namely, Kharthor, Kumbhi, and Jala, and the last two, namely, Sahapuri and Vidari, if they occur in a person with excess fat, are difficult to cure and severe.🔽The others, arising from excess bile

original: tshil chung las byung brnag nus 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: tshil chung las byung brnag nus 'gyur // zhes bya ba la /
translated: and little fat, are curable.

original: snga ma las gzhan pa'i 'bras nad lhag ma lnga po mkhris pa'i nad las byung zhing /
analyzed: snga ma las gzhan pa'i 'bras nad lhag ma lnga po mkhris pa'i nad las byung zhing /
translated: The remaining five hemorrhoids, other than the above, arise from bile diseases.

original: mi tshil chung ba las byung ba yin na /
analyzed: mi tshil chung ba las byung ba yin na /
translated: If they occur in a person with little human fat,

original: de ni brnag nus shing nad tshabs chung la gso sla ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni brnag nus shing nad tshabs chung la gso sla ba yin no //
translated: they are curable, less severe, and easy to treat.

original: de rnams nad shas ji ltar che'i //
analyzed: de rnams nad shas ji ltar che'i //
translated: The more severe they are,

original: gcin snyi ba yi dbang las 'byung //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gcin snyi ba yi dbang las 'byung //🔽zhes bya ba la /
translated: the more they arise from urinary disorders.

original: 'bras bu'i nad de rnams ni gcin snyi @145a * //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i nad de rnams ni gcin snyi @145a * //
translated: The results of these diseases are diabetes.🔽

original: ba'i nad kyi dbang las byung zhing /
analyzed: ba'i nad kyi dbang las byung zhing /
translated: These resultant diseases arise from the power of diabetes.

original: rang rang gi nad ji ltar shas che ba bzhin du de'i rnam par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽bad kan gyi za khu la ni bad kan shas che bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: rang rang gi nad ji ltar shas che ba bzhin du de'i rnam par 'byung bar 'gyur ro // bad kan gyi za khu la ni bad kan shas che bar 'gyur la /
translated: They occur in the form of whatever disease is predominant.🔽In the case of phlegm-predominant chyle, phlegm increases.

original: rlung dang mkhris pa shas che ba'i za khu las kyang rlung dang mkhris pa'i 'bras nad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rlung dang mkhris pa shas che ba'i za khu las kyang rlung dang mkhris pa'i 'bras nad du 'gyur ro //
translated: From chyle that is predominantly wind and bile, wind and bile diseases occur.

original: 'di dag za khu med par ni //
analyzed: 'di dag za khu med par ni //
translated: These are not due to chyle,

original: gnod gyur tshil las 'byung 'gyur te //
analyzed: gnod gyur tshil las 'byung 'gyur te //
translated: but arise from fat when it is impaired.

original: ji srid dngos po mi snang ba //
analyzed: ji srid dngos po mi snang ba //
translated: As long as the substance is not visible,

original: de srid shes par mi 'gyur ro //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de srid shes par mi 'gyur ro // zhes bya ba la /
translated: consciousness does not occur.

original: thor du'i nad 'di dag ni za khu'i nad med par mi tshil ches pa las nad du gyur pa dag las 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: thor du'i nad 'di dag ni za khu'i nad med par mi tshil ches pa las nad du gyur pa dag las 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: Here, these diseases of tumors arise from excessive fat without the disease of chyle.

original: de ni ji srid rang gi dngos po lto dang rgyab la sogs pa gsal por mi snang ba de srid kyi bar du shes shing rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni ji srid rang gi dngos po lto dang rgyab la sogs pa gsal por mi snang ba de srid kyi bar du shes shing rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: As long as the body is not clearly perceived, the stomach, the back, etc., are not perceived.

original: kha dog ljang ba'am dmar ba'i gcin //
analyzed: kha dog ljang ba'am dmar ba'i gcin //
translated: The urine is green or red,

original: za khu'i sngon tshul med pa yis //
analyzed: za khu'i sngon tshul med pa yis //
translated: without the previous mode,

original: gcin 'byung gang de za khu min //
analyzed: gcin 'byung gang de za khu min //
translated: the urine is not semen.

original: de ni khrag mkhris yin zhes bya //
analyzed: de ni khrag mkhris yin zhes bya //
translated: It is said to be blood and bile.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: In this verse,

original: gang zhig gcin gyi mdog ljang ba la sogs par byung la /
analyzed: gang zhig gcin gyi mdog ljang ba la sogs par byung la /
translated: if the color of the urine becomes green, etc.,

original: sngon du byung ba'i tshul med pa de ni za khu'i nad yin par slob dpon gyis ma bshad de /
analyzed: sngon du byung ba'i tshul med pa de ni za khu'i nad yin par slob dpon gyis ma bshad de /
translated: without the previous mode, the Master does not explain that it is a disease of semen.

original: gcin ni khrag mkhris kyi rang bzhin can yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gcin ni khrag mkhris kyi rang bzhin can yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the urine is of the nature of blood and bile.🔽The body is dusty, the limbs are foul and loose,

original: lus rdul yan lag mnam zhing lhod pa dang // stan dang mal dang gnyid kyi bde la chags //
analyzed: lus rdul yan lag mnam zhing lhod pa dang // stan dang mal dang gnyid kyi bde la chags //
translated: attached to the pleasure of seat, bed, and sleep,

original: snying mig rna ba kha lce byugs snyam byed //
analyzed: snying mig rna ba kha lce byugs snyam byed //
translated: the heart, eyes, ears, mouth, and tongue seem to be smeared.

original: lus sbom skra dang sen mo ring ba dang // bsil bag dga' zhing gre ba rkan skams shing //
analyzed: lus sbom skra dang sen mo ring ba dang // bsil bag dga' zhing gre ba rkan skams shing //
translated: The body is stout, the hair and nails are long,🔽one likes coolness, the throat and palate are dry,

original: kha nang ro mngar rkang mthil lag mthil tsha //
analyzed: kha nang ro mngar rkang mthil lag mthil tsha //
translated: and the inside of the mouth is sweet, the soles of the feet and palms of the hands are hot.

original: gang du gcis par grog ma 'du 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang du gcis par grog ma 'du 'gyur ba //
translated: Wherever one is treated, ants gather.

original: gcin nad za khu'i tshogs ni phyis 'byung tshul //🔽zhes bya ba la ;
analyzed: gcin nad za khu'i tshogs ni phyis 'byung tshul // zhes bya ba la ;
translated: The collection of dysuria and urinary disorders will arise later.

original: gcin nad za khu'i tshogs nyi shu po phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rtags sam tshul sngon du 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: gcin nad za khu'i tshogs nyi shu po phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rtags sam tshul sngon du 'byung ba ni /
translated: The twenty collections of dysuria and urinary disorders that will arise later are the signs or ways that arise beforehand.

original: lus la rdul 'dzag pa dang / yan lag dring zhing mnam la lhod cing rmya ba dang / stan la sogs pa la 'dug pa'i bde ba la chags shing @145b sred pa dang / snying ga la sogs pa lus kyi bu ga rnams su dri ma 'phel bas byugs shing rkyang nul byas pa snyam du sems pa dang /
analyzed: lus la rdul 'dzag pa dang / yan lag dring zhing mnam la lhod cing rmya ba dang / stan la sogs pa la 'dug pa'i bde ba la chags shing @145b sred pa dang / snying ga la sogs pa lus kyi bu ga rnams su dri ma 'phel bas byugs shing rkyang nul byas pa snyam du sems pa dang /
translated: The body sweats, the limbs are loose, smelly, and emaciated, one is attached to and craves the comfort of sitting on a seat, and so on, and the body's orifices, such as the heart, feel as if they are smeared and softened by the increase of impurities.

original: lus ma thug cing sbom pa dang / de bzhin du skra la sogs pa shin tu ring zhing 'phel ba dang / bsil bag la dga' zhing grang ba 'dod pa dang / gre ba dang rkan skams par 'gyur ba la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: lus ma thug cing sbom pa dang / de bzhin du skra la sogs pa shin tu ring zhing 'phel ba dang / bsil bag la dga' zhing grang ba 'dod pa dang / gre ba dang rkan skams par 'gyur ba la sogs pa yin no //
translated: The throat and palate become dry.🔽Urine is the color of honey, thick,🔽and sweet like honey, but is thought to be of two kinds.

original: za khu sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'dra 'byil ba dang // sbrang rtsi'i ro 'dra ba la gnyis su rtog / lus brtas bad kan can gyi za khu'am //🔽nyes pa zad pas rlung gi bdag can yin //
analyzed: za khu sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'dra 'byil ba dang // sbrang rtsi'i ro 'dra ba la gnyis su rtog / lus brtas bad kan can gyi za khu'am // nyes pa zad pas rlung gi bdag can yin //
translated: The body is nourished by phlegm urine.

original: zhes bya ba la /🔽gcin nad za khu sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'dra ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la / gcin nad za khu sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'dra ba la /
translated: It is said that the urine of a person with a wind constitution is thin.🔽The urine of a person with a bile constitution is yellow.🔽The urine of a person with a phlegm constitution is white.🔽The urine of a person with a blood constitution is red.🔽The urine of a person with a flesh constitution is thick.🔽The urine of a person with a fat constitution is oily.

original: lci zhing 'byil ba shal ma li'i khu ba 'dra bar gnas pa /
analyzed: lci zhing 'byil ba shal ma li'i khu ba 'dra bar gnas pa /
translated: The urine of a person with a bone constitution is rough.🔽The urine of a person with a marrow constitution is clear.

original: sbrang rtsi'i ro ltar mngar ba la /🔽skyes bu blo dman pa dag tshul gnyis su rtog cing dpyod par byed de /🔽lus kyi nyams brtas par byas pa'i dbang gis ci 'di bad kan las byung ba yin nam /
analyzed: sbrang rtsi'i ro ltar mngar ba la /🔽skyes bu blo dman pa dag tshul gnyis su rtog cing dpyod par byed de /🔽lus kyi nyams brtas par byas pa'i dbang gis ci 'di bad kan las byung ba yin nam /
translated: The urine of a person with a semen constitution is sweet.🔽The urine of a person with a wind constitution is thin.

original: yang bad kan la sogs pa'i nyes pa zad par byas pa'i nyams dmad pa las byung ba'i rlung gi bdag nyid can yin no //
analyzed: yang bad kan la sogs pa'i nyes pa zad par byas pa'i nyams dmad pa las byung ba'i rlung gi bdag nyid can yin no //
translated: Also, it is of the nature of wind that arises from the exhaustion of faults such as phlegm and so on.🔽🔽

original: zhes blo zhan pa dag rtog par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes blo zhan pa dag rtog par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Again, the weak-minded imagine that the humors are exhausted by the exhaustion of phlegm, etc., and that the humors are of the nature of wind.🔽The humors that arise from phlegm and bile, and also the humors that arise from wind, are difficult to cure.

original: sngon tshul bcas pa'i bad mkhris za khu dang // gang yang rim gyis rlung nad za khur 'gyur //🔽mkhris pa las gyur gang yin gso bar dka' //
analyzed: sngon tshul bcas pa'i bad mkhris za khu dang // gang yang rim gyis rlung nad za khur 'gyur // mkhris pa las gyur gang yin gso bar dka' //
translated: The humors that arise from phlegm and bile are difficult to cure.🔽The humors that arise from phlegm, etc., are difficult to cure.🔽The humors that arise from phlegm, etc., are difficult to cure.🔽The humors that arise from phlegm, etc., are difficult to cure.

original: gal te tshil nad shas chung gyur gso sla //🔽zhes bya ba la /🔽sngon byung ba'i tshul gyis lus rngul ba la sogs pa dang bcas par 'byung ba'i bad kan dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa'i za khu ni gso dka' ba yin la /
analyzed: gal te tshil nad shas chung gyur gso sla // zhes bya ba la / sngon byung ba'i tshul gyis lus rngul ba la sogs pa dang bcas par 'byung ba'i bad kan dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa'i za khu ni gso dka' ba yin la /
translated: The humors that arise from phlegm, etc., are difficult to cure.🔽The humors that arise from phlegm, etc., are difficult to cure.🔽The humors that arise from phlegm, etc., are difficult to cure.🔽The humors that arise from phlegm, etc., are difficult to cure.🔽The humors that arise from phlegm, etc., are difficult to cure.🔽The humors that arise from phlegm, etc., are difficult to cure.🔽The humors that arise from phlegm, etc., are difficult to cure.🔽The humors that arise from phlegm, etc., are difficult to cure.🔽The humors that arise from phlegm, etc., are difficult to cure.🔽The humors that arise from phlegm, etc., are difficult to cure.🔽The humors that arise from phlegm, etc., are difficult to cure.

original: de bzhin du gang yang rim gyis bad kan la sogs pa las 'byung ba'i rlung nad kyi za khu de yang gso dka' ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du gang yang rim gyis bad kan la sogs pa las 'byung ba'i rlung nad kyi za khu de yang gso dka' ba yin no //
translated: The humors that arise from phlegm, etc., are difficult to cure.

original: de bzhin du mkhris pa las rim gyis byung ba'i za khur gyur pa ni gso bar dka' ba yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du mkhris pa las rim gyis byung ba'i za khur gyur pa ni gso bar dka' ba yin la /
translated: Likewise, a swelling that gradually arises from bile is difficult to cure.

original: gsor rung ba ni mkhris pa las gyur pa yang yin la /
analyzed: gsor rung ba ni mkhris pa las gyur pa yang yin la /
translated: One that is curable is also due to bile,

original: tshil gyi nad shas che ba yang ma yin na @146a * //
analyzed: tshil gyi nad shas che ba yang ma yin na @146a * //
translated: but not if it is a predominance of a fat disease.

original: gso bar sla ba yin no //
analyzed: gso bar sla ba yin no //
translated: It is easy to cure.🔽This is the commentary on the tenth chapter, having eight sections, in “The Excellent🔽Accomplishment of the Purpose,” an explication of the “Eight Branches” Compendium

analyzed: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /

translated: Whatever remains round or elongated🔽is one of the six types of abdominal distension:🔽located in one place, combined,

original: khong 'bras de ni rnam pa drug / nad dmigs sna re 'dus pa dang // khrag dang smas pa las byung ba'o //
analyzed: khong 'bras de ni rnam pa drug / nad dmigs sna re 'dus pa dang // khrag dang smas pa las byung ba'o //
translated: from blood, or from injury.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here is the explanation.

original: kha zas g-yos zin nas mtshan mo 'das shing zhag lon pa'i khengs bu la sogs pa rgyud du zos pa dang / khrag nad skyed par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gzhan dag tu bsten pa de dang des nad bskyed pas pags pa la sogs pa'i phyi dang nang gi cha la brten te skrangs bar gyur pa gang yin pa de rtsa ba che zhing dbyung bar dka' la /
analyzed: kha zas g-yos zin nas mtshan mo 'das shing zhag lon pa'i khengs bu la sogs pa rgyud du zos pa dang / khrag nad skyed par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gzhan dag tu bsten pa de dang des nad bskyed pas pags pa la sogs pa'i phyi dang nang gi cha la brten te skrangs bar gyur pa gang yin pa de rtsa ba che zhing dbyung bar dka' la /
translated: The swelling that occurs based on the outer and inner parts of the skin and so forth is a swelling that is difficult to remove because its root is large.

original: nad tshabs che zhing brnag par dka' ba'i skrang pa zlum zhing kha zheng che ba'am /
analyzed: nad tshabs che zhing brnag par dka' ba'i skrang pa zlum zhing kha zheng che ba'am /
translated: The swelling that is difficult to bear because of its great severity is a swelling that is round, very wide,

original: 'jong par gnas shing dpangs ring ba gang yin pa de ni khong 'bras zhes bya la /
analyzed: 'jong par gnas shing dpangs ring ba gang yin pa de ni khong 'bras zhes bya la /
translated: or long in height. That is called “abdominal swelling.”

original: khong 'bras de ni rlung la sogs pa'i nad sna re re 'dus pa dang / khrag dang smas pa las byung ba ste rnam pa drug yin no //
analyzed: khong 'bras de ni rlung la sogs pa'i nad sna re re 'dus pa dang / khrag dang smas pa las byung ba ste rnam pa drug yin no //
translated: That abdominal swelling is of six types: the individual combinations of the disorders of wind and so forth, and those that arise from blood and injury.

original: 'dir phyi'i yan lag de dang der //
analyzed: 'dir phyi'i yan lag de dang der //
translated: Here, in that and that outer limb,

original: rab na mdud pa 'dra la mtho //
analyzed: rab na mdud pa 'dra la mtho //
translated: if it is best, it is like a knot and high.

original: zhes bya ba @146b la ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba @146b la ;
translated: Here, in that and that outer limb,🔽if it is best, it is like a knot and high.

original: 'dir khong 'bras gnyis yod pa'i nang nas phyi ni lte ba dang / gzhang la sogs pa'i yan lag de dang der mi bzad par rab tu na ba dang / mdud pa byas shing brgyus pa ltar rdog rdog por 'dug pa dang / mtho zhing 'phags pa yin no //🔽nang gi shin tu mi bzad cing //
analyzed: 'dir khong 'bras gnyis yod pa'i nang nas phyi ni lte ba dang / gzhang la sogs pa'i yan lag de dang der mi bzad par rab tu na ba dang / mdud pa byas shing brgyus pa ltar rdog rdog por 'dug pa dang / mtho zhing 'phags pa yin no // nang gi shin tu mi bzad cing //
translated: Here, the outer abscess is the center and the inner abscess is the limbs such as the anus. It is extremely painful and unbearable in that particular limb. It is solid like a knot that has been tied and is high and elevated.

original: gting ring skran ltar sra ba yin //
analyzed: gting ring skran ltar sra ba yin //
translated: The inner abscess is extremely unbearable and difficult to endure. It is deep and submerged, hard and solid like a tumor, and elevated like an anthill.

original: grog mkhar lta bur mtho ba dang // me dang mtshon ltar myur gsod byed //🔽ces bya ba la /
analyzed: grog mkhar lta bur mtho ba dang // me dang mtshon ltar myur gsod byed // ces bya ba la /
translated: It is like fire and weapons, quickly killing.

original: nang gi khong 'bras ni shin tu mi bzad cing brnag par dka' bar na ba dang / gting ring zhing nang du nub pa dang / skran ltar sra zhing rem rem por gnas pa dang / grog mkhar gyis spungs pa'i rtse mo ltar mtho bar gnas pa dang /
analyzed: nang gi khong 'bras ni shin tu mi bzad cing brnag par dka' bar na ba dang / gting ring zhing nang du nub pa dang / skran ltar sra zhing rem rem por gnas pa dang / grog mkhar gyis spungs pa'i rtse mo ltar mtho bar gnas pa dang /
translated: The inner abscess is extremely unbearable and difficult to endure, deep and submerged, hard and solid like a tumor, and elevated like an anthill.

original: phyi'i khong 'bras pas nang gi khong 'bras myur du gsod par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: phyi'i khong 'bras pas nang gi khong 'bras myur du gsod par byed pa yin te /
translated: The outer abscess is quickly killed by the inner abscess.

original: de yang me dang mtshon gyis myur du gsod par byed pa dang 'dra ba 'dar yang myur du gsod par byed pa yin no //🔽lte ba chu so mchin mcher pa //
analyzed: de yang me dang mtshon gyis myur du gsod par byed pa dang 'dra ba 'dar yang myur du gsod par byed pa yin no // lte ba chu so mchin mcher pa //
translated: It is like fire and weapons, which quickly kill.🔽It arises in the navel, bladder, liver, spleen,🔽lungs, heart, stomach, thighs, and channels,

original: glo dang snying lto brla rtsa dang // mkhal ma gnyis sam gzhang du'ang 'byung //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: glo dang snying lto brla rtsa dang // mkhal ma gnyis sam gzhang du'ang 'byung // zhes bya ba la /
translated: in the two kidneys, or in the anus.

original: khong 'bras de ni lte ba dang chu so la sogs pa'i gnas gang yang rung ba'i lus kyi phyogs gcig tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: khong 'bras de ni lte ba dang chu so la sogs pa'i gnas gang yang rung ba'i lus kyi phyogs gcig tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: It arises in any one part of the body, such as the navel, bladder, and so on.

original: de la rlung gyur nad tshabs drag / dmar nag ring zhig lon nas ni //
analyzed: de la rlung gyur nad tshabs drag / dmar nag ring zhig lon nas ni //
translated: The wind-type is severe, red-black, and long-lasting.

original: 'byung zhing smin pa dbyibs mi snyoms //🔽ran zhing mgo 'khor sbo ba dang // g-yo zhing 'pho la sgra dang bcas //
analyzed: 'byung zhing smin pa dbyibs mi snyoms // ran zhing mgo 'khor sbo ba dang // g-yo zhing 'pho la sgra dang bcas //
translated: It arises and ripens, with an uneven shape.🔽It is appropriate, with dizziness, swelling,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: movement, shifting, and sound.

original: khong 'bras de rlung las gyur pa ni nad tshabs drag cing rno ba dang / mdog dmar nag tu gnas pa dang / yun ring zhig lon nas 'byung zhing smin pa yin gyi /
analyzed: khong 'bras de rlung las gyur pa ni nad tshabs drag cing rno ba dang / mdog dmar nag tu gnas pa dang / yun ring zhig lon nas 'byung zhing smin pa yin gyi /
translated: The abscess that arises from wind is very severe and sharp, remains red-black in color, and arises and matures after a long time.

original: myur du 'byung zhing smin pa ma yin pa dang / nad kyi dbyibs mtho dman dang che chung mi snyoms pa dang / tshad ha cang mi che zhing ran pa la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: myur du 'byung zhing smin pa ma yin pa dang / nad kyi dbyibs mtho dman dang che chung mi snyoms pa dang / tshad ha cang mi che zhing ran pa la sogs pa yin no //
translated: It does not arise and mature quickly, and the shape of the abscess is uneven, with high and low and large and small [parts], and it is not very large, but of a suitable size, and so forth.🔽The one that arises from bile is copper-colored, with dark veins,

original: mkhris gyur zangs ltar dmar rtsa gnag / skom dang tsha rims rmongs bag skyed //
analyzed: mkhris gyur zangs ltar dmar rtsa gnag / skom dang tsha rims rmongs bag skyed //
translated: and produces thirst, fever, and confusion.

original: ldang zhing smin pa myur ba yin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ldang zhing smin pa myur ba yin // zhes bya ba la /
translated: It arises and matures quickly.

original: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rmongs pa ni /
analyzed: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rmongs pa ni /

analyzed: mdog dmar ba la sogs pa gang @147a * // yang rung ba dang ldan pa dang / skom pa la sogs pa dang ldan par ldang zhing 'byung ba dang smin zhing rnags pa myur ba yin no //
translated: has any of the colors such as red,🔽and it arises and matures quickly, with thirst and so forth.🔽The one that arises from phlegm is pale, with itching,

original: bad kan las skya g-ya' dang bcas //
analyzed: bad kan las skya g-ya' dang bcas //
translated: and is slow to arise and mature.

original: slon zhing bsil la sla ba dang // glal zhing lci la yi ga 'chus //
analyzed: slon zhing bsil la sla ba dang // glal zhing lci la yi ga 'chus //
translated: It is swollen, cold, soft, and causes yawning, heaviness, and loss of appetite.

original: 'byung zhing smin pa yun ring thogs //
analyzed: 'byung zhing smin pa yun ring thogs //
translated: It is slow to appear and to ripen.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here is the explanation:

analyzed: de la bad kan las gyur pa'i khong 'bras ni kha dog dkar zhing skya ba dang / g-ya' ba la sogs pa'i nad dang bcas pa dang / 'byung ba dang smin pa'i dus yun ring du 'gor ba yin no //
translated: Phlegm-born abdominal disease is white or pale, accompanied by itching and other such symptoms, and is slow to appear and to ripen.

analyzed: 'dus pa las gyur 'dren ma yin //
translated: The one born from a combination has mixed characteristics.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i khong 'bras ni mtshan nyid 'dren ma dang ldan pa yin par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: The abdominal disease born from a combination has mixed characteristics.

original: 'dir ni phyi nang gnyis mtshan nyid //
analyzed: 'dir ni phyi nang gnyis mtshan nyid //
translated: Here, the external and internal characteristics

original: don gyi dbang las shes par bya //
analyzed: don gyi dbang las shes par bya //
translated: should be understood according to the meaning.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here is the explanation:

analyzed: khong 'bras bzhi po 'dir rab tu na ba dang / shin tu mi bzad par na ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyis phyi dang nang gnyis kyi mtshan nyid don gyi dbang las shes par bya ste /
translated: He should understand the characteristics of the four results from the power of the meaning of the characteristics of both the external and the internal, by the characteristic of being very sick and by the characteristic of being extremely unbearable.

original: rigs mthun pa dang mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa las phyi nang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dbye bar bya zhing shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs mthun pa dang mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa las phyi nang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dbye bar bya zhing shes par bya'o //
translated: The characteristics of the similar and dissimilar should be understood by distinguishing the characteristics of the external and internal.

original: de ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: de ni 'di skad ston te /

original: rlung las gyur pa'i khong 'bras kyi mtshan nyid phyi dang nang du rnam bar phye ste ma bshad mod kyi /
analyzed: rlung las gyur pa'i khong 'bras kyi mtshan nyid phyi dang nang du rnam bar phye ste ma bshad mod kyi /
translated: Although the characteristics of internal disorders arising from wind are not explained by distinguishing the external and internal,

analyzed: 'on kyang dmar ba nyid la sogs pa phyi rol du snang bar rig pa de ni de nyid las shes par bya la /
translated: nevertheless, the appearance of redness and so forth externally should be understood from that itself.

analyzed: gang yang lto sbo ba dang yi ga 'chus pa la sogs pa nang gi rnam pa yin par 'thad pa de ni de nyid kyi mtshan ma yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: Also, whatever is reasonable as an internal aspect, such as a swollen belly and loss of appetite, should be understood as the signs of that itself.

original: 'brum bu nag pos khebs shing gnag / rab tsha na zhing rims kyis 'debs //
analyzed: 'brum bu nag pos khebs shing gnag / rab tsha na zhing rims kyis 'debs //

analyzed: khrag gyur bud med nyid la 'byung ; / zhes bya ba la / khrag las gyur pa'i khong 'bras gang yin pa de ni 'brum bu nag pos khebs shing gang ba yin la /
translated: The blood-born one occurs only in women.🔽The internal or external abscess that is blood-born is covered with black spots and is full of them.

original: mdog ni gnag pa yin zhing rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / mkhris pa'i rtags zangs ltar dmar ba la sogs pa @147b dang ldan pa de ni phyi'i yin yang rung nang gi yin yang rung ste /

analyzed: de ni bud med kho na la 'byung gi skyes pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: It occurs only in women, not in men.

analyzed: mtshon la sogs pas smas pa yis //

analyzed: rma byung mi 'phrod bsten pa las //

analyzed: khong 'bras bla brnan nad mang zhing //

analyzed: khrag mkhris mtshan nyid can dag byed //
translated: The one with the characteristics of blood and bile is the one that cleans.

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: In this verse,

analyzed: gang mtshon dang rdo la sogs pas smas shing snad par gyur pa des rma byung ba dang / mi 'phrod pa'i kha zas bsten cing longs spyad pas rma kha'i tsha ba rlung gis phul zhing bskyod pa dang bcas pa'i mkhris pa 'byung zhing 'dzag par 'gyur ba de las khong 'bras bla brnan gyi nad mang zhing khrag dang mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the one that is injured by weapons, stones, and so forth, by relying on and consuming unwholesome food, the heat of the wound is fanned and stirred by the wind, and the bile arises and flows. From that, many diseases of the abscess of the brain arise, and they have the characteristics of blood and bile.

analyzed: bla brnan de yi dbye ba yang //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: mchin par // dbugs 'byung 'gags skom mgo 'khor 'gyur //

analyzed: glo bar byung na lkog nad 'gyur //

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: khong 'bras glo bar byung na lkog ma'i nad rnams su 'gyur ro //

analyzed: snying byung yan lag kun gzir snyam //
translated: If it occurs in the heart, one thinks that all the limbs are being pressed.🔽One thinks that one is in a state of

translated: Similarly, one is confused and loses one's senses, and one thinks that one is in darkness.

analyzed: na zhing lto sbos 'byung bar 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba la /

translated: If it occurs in the navel, it causes pain between the navel and the ribs, between the two shoulders, and in the belly itself, which becomes swollen and gurgling.

analyzed: chu so mdoms bar byung brla na // zhes bya ba la /

translated: When the subtle parts of the intestines🔽are turned inside out by the vata,

original: rang gi gnas nas thur du bskyod //
analyzed: rang gi gnas nas thur du bskyod //
translated: they descend from their place.

original: chu so'i tshigs su phyin pa dang // de tshe mdud pa ltar glo 'gyur //
analyzed: chu so'i tshigs su phyin pa dang // de tshe mdud pa ltar glo 'gyur //
translated: When it reaches the colon, then the lung becomes swollen like a knot.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here, the causes of disturbing the wind are:🔽consuming rough, astringent, and so forth foods,🔽swimming in cold water,

original: rlung 'khrug par byed pa'i kha zas rtsub pa dang / bska ba la sogs pa bsten pa dang / de bzhin du chu grang mo la rkyal gyis brgal ba dang / de bzhin du bshang gci la sogs pa'i shugs 'byung ba bkag pa dang / nan gyis btsir pa dang /
analyzed: rlung 'khrug par byed pa'i kha zas rtsub pa dang / bska ba la sogs pa bsten pa dang / de bzhin du chu grang mo la rkyal gyis brgal ba dang / de bzhin du bshang gci la sogs pa'i shugs 'byung ba bkag pa dang / nan gyis btsir pa dang /
translated: restraining the urge to defecate, urinate, and so forth,🔽and other causes of harm such as carrying heavy loads.

original: khur la sogs pas gnod par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gzhan dag gis rlung 'khrugs par gyur pa'i dus gang gi tshe rgyu ma phra mo'i cha ste /
analyzed: khur la sogs pas gnod par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gzhan dag gis rlung 'khrugs par gyur pa'i dus gang gi tshe rgyu ma phra mo'i cha ste /
translated: When the wind is disturbed, at that time the small intestine,

original: rgyu ma phre'u phyogs gcig log par phul te /
analyzed: rgyu ma phre'u phyogs gcig log par phul te /
translated: the small intestine is twisted in one place,🔽and it moves downward from its own place.

original: rang gi gnas nas thur du bskyod cing chu so'i tshigs su rlung gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: rang gi gnas nas thur du bskyod cing chu so'i tshigs su rlung gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When the wind is located in the colon, then

original: mdud pa ltar glo ba'i skrang bag skyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mdud pa ltar glo ba'i skrang bag skyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: the lung becomes swollen like a knot.

original: yal bar bor na rlig pa cher skye zhing //
analyzed: yal bar bor na rlig pa cher skye zhing //
translated: If it is neglected, the testicles grow large.

original: sbo zhing na la rengs par rlung gis byed //🔽rab tu gzer zhing nang na sgra dang bcas //
analyzed: sbo zhing na la rengs par rlung gis byed // rab tu gzer zhing nang na sgra dang bcas //
translated: It causes distension, pain, and rigidity.🔽It causes severe pain and a rumbling sound within.

original: gang bar byed cing bcug kyang slar 'byung byed //🔽ces bya ba la /
analyzed: gang bar byed cing bcug kyang slar 'byung byed // ces bya ba la /
translated: It fills the scrotum and causes the testicles to protrude even when retracted.

original: nad de yal bar bor zhing gso ba ma byas na /
analyzed: nad de yal bar bor zhing gso ba ma byas na /
translated: If this disease is neglected and not treated,

original: rlig pa skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / lto sbo zhing rengs par rlung des skyed par byed pa dang / yang rlung des rab tu gzer zhing nyen pas rlung sgra dang bcas shing krul krul zer ba dang / yang rlung gis gang bar byed cing phyung ba de bcug kyang slar 'byung bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rlig pa skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / lto sbo zhing rengs par rlung des skyed par byed pa dang / yang rlung des rab tu gzer zhing nyen pas rlung sgra dang bcas shing krul krul zer ba dang / yang rlung gis gang bar byed cing phyung ba de bcug kyang slar 'byung bar byed pa yin no //
translated: it causes the testicles to grow and increase, and the wind causes distension and rigidity of the abdomen. The wind also causes severe pain and a rumbling sound with the wind. The wind fills the scrotum and causes the testicles to protrude even when retracted.

original: rgyu rlugs 'di ni gso dka' ste //
analyzed: rgyu rlugs 'di ni gso dka' ste //
translated: This disease is difficult to cure,

original: rlung gi rlig rlugs 'dra ba yin //
analyzed: rlung gi rlig rlugs 'dra ba yin //
translated: like a wind-induced scrotal swelling.

original: rtsub cing gnag la dmar ba'i rtsa //
analyzed: rtsub cing gnag la dmar ba'i rtsa //
translated: It has rough, black, and red veins,

original: phra mo'i dra bas khebs pa yin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: phra mo'i dra bas khebs pa yin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
translated: covered by a fine web.

original: rgyu @150b rlugs zhes bya ba'i nad 'di ni gso dka' zhing bcos par mi nus pa yin la /
analyzed: rgyu @150b rlugs zhes bya ba'i nad 'di ni gso dka' zhing bcos par mi nus pa yin la /
translated: This disease called “rupture” is difficult to cure and cannot be treated.

original: yang de ni rlung gi rlig rlugs dang mtshan ma 'dra ba yin te /
analyzed: yang de ni rlung gi rlig rlugs dang mtshan ma 'dra ba yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is similar to the wind-rupture and the sign.🔽As stated in the text:

original: rlung gyur rkyal ba gang 'dra zhing //
analyzed: rlung gyur rkyal ba gang 'dra zhing //
translated: “It is like a wind-pouch,

original: reg na rtsub cing rgyu med na //🔽zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis bstan pa yin no ;
analyzed: reg na rtsub cing rgyu med na // zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis bstan pa yin no ;
translated: rough to the touch, and without cause.”

original: / yang de bzhin du rtsub cing mdog gnag la dmar ba'i rtsa'i tshogs phra mo'i dra bas khebs shing khyab par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: / yang de bzhin du rtsub cing mdog gnag la dmar ba'i rtsa'i tshogs phra mo'i dra bas khebs shing khyab par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is rough, dark-colored, and covered with a net of fine veins.🔽The eight kinds of tumors, each one,🔽mixed, and combined,

original: skran brgyad nad ni so so dang // 'dres dang 'dus pa las gyur dang // zla mtshan gyi ni nyes pa yis //
analyzed: skran brgyad nad ni so so dang // 'dres dang 'dus pa las gyur dang // zla mtshan gyi ni nyes pa yis //
translated: and from the fault of menstruation,

original: brgyad pa bud med rnams la 'byung //
analyzed: brgyad pa bud med rnams la 'byung //
translated: the eighth occurs in women.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: skran ni rnam pa brgyad yod de /
analyzed: skran ni rnam pa brgyad yod de /
translated: there are eight kinds of tumors.

original: de yang rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi so so las byung ba gsum dang / nad gzhi gnyis gnyis dang 'dres pa'i ldan pa las gyur ba gsum dang / nad gzhi gsum car 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig dang / bud med rnams la zla mtshan gyi nad kyi nyes pa las byung ba gcig ste /
analyzed: de yang rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi so so las byung ba gsum dang / nad gzhi gnyis gnyis dang 'dres pa'i ldan pa las gyur ba gsum dang / nad gzhi gsum car 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig dang / bud med rnams la zla mtshan gyi nad kyi nyes pa las byung ba gcig ste /
translated: These are the three that arise from the individual humors of wind and so forth, the three that arise from the combination of two humors, the one that arises from the combination of all three humors, and the one that arises from the fault of menstruation in women.

original: de ltar na spyir brgyad yin no //🔽rims dang slon dang tshad 'khru sogs //
analyzed: de ltar na spyir brgyad yin no // rims dang slon dang tshad 'khru sogs //
translated: Thus, in general, there are eight.🔽Fever, indigestion, and contagious diseases,

original: skyug sman sogs dang las rnams kyis //
analyzed: skyug sman sogs dang las rnams kyis //
translated: vomiting, and so forth,🔽emaciation from medicine, and eating when hungry,

original: skem gyur rlung skyes zas za dang // bkres te chu grang 'thungs gyur pa'am //
analyzed: skem gyur rlung skyes zas za dang // bkres te chu grang 'thungs gyur pa'am //
translated: or drinking cold water when thirsty,

original: skom 'thungs rjes la gang zhig ni //
analyzed: skom 'thungs rjes la gang zhig ni //
translated: or after drinking,

original: rkyal dang mchod pa la sogs pa //
analyzed: rkyal dang mchod pa la sogs pa //
translated: or bathing, worshipping, and so forth,🔽cause the body to be disturbed.🔽Indigestion, vomiting,

original: bsten pas lus ni dkrugs byas dang // slon mi bro yang skyugs pa dang // rlung la sogs pa 'byung ba yi ;
analyzed: bsten pas lus ni dkrugs byas dang // slon mi bro yang skyugs pa dang // rlung la sogs pa 'byung ba yi ;
translated: and the suppression of the force of wind and so forth,

original: / shugs bkag pa'am gcin btsir ba'am //
analyzed: / shugs bkag pa'am gcin btsir ba'am //
translated: or the suppression of urine,

original: snum dang dugs ni ma bsten par //
analyzed: snum dang dugs ni ma bsten par //
translated: or not using oil and heat,

original: sbyang ba'i las ni byed pa dang // sbyangs zin myur du tsha ba dang // bad kan skyed pa'i zas skom spyad //
analyzed: sbyang ba'i las ni byed pa dang // sbyangs zin myur du tsha ba dang // bad kan skyed pa'i zas skom spyad //
translated: The action of the disease is to cause the body to become hot, and to cause the body to become cold.

original: rlung rgyas pa yi nad rnams ni //
analyzed: rlung rgyas pa yi nad rnams ni //
translated: The disease of wind is of three kinds:

original: so so'am 'dres pa'am 'khrugs gyur pa'am //
analyzed: so so'am 'dres pa'am 'khrugs gyur pa'am //
translated: isolated, mixed, and disturbed.

original: kun nas khrag dang bcas 'khrugs pas //
analyzed: kun nas khrag dang bcas 'khrugs pas //
translated: When it is mixed with blood, it is disturbed.

original: sbubs can la ni brten gyur nas //
analyzed: sbubs can la ni brten gyur nas //
translated: When it is based in the intestines,

original: steng 'og lam ni bkag nas su //
analyzed: steng 'og lam ni bkag nas su //
translated: it blocks the upper and lower paths.

original: gzer sngon 'gro zhing reg tu rung //
analyzed: gzer sngon 'gro zhing reg tu rung //
translated: It causes pain and a feeling of pressure.

original: shin tu mtho zhing mdud pa'i gzugs //
analyzed: shin tu mtho zhing mdud pa'i gzugs //
translated: It has a very high and knotted form.

original: skran ni skyed par 'gyur ba yin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: skran ni skyed par 'gyur ba yin // zhes bya ba la /
translated: It causes the formation of tumors.

original: @151a * // skran 'byung ba'i rgyu ni rims la sogs pa'i nad rnams dang / de bzhin du skyug sman la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: @151a * // skran 'byung ba'i rgyu ni rims la sogs pa'i nad rnams dang / de bzhin du skyug sman la sogs pa ste /
translated: The causes of the formation of tumors are diseases such as fever, and likewise vomiting and so forth.

original: skyug sman dang bkru sman dang / bkru sman drag po mas gtong ba dang / 'jam rtsi dang / mgo bo'i bkru sman zhes bya ba'i dpyad kyi sbyor ba nyes pa dang / de bzhin du drag shul gyi nad rnams kyis skem zhing sbegs par gyur pa dang /
analyzed: skyug sman dang bkru sman dang / bkru sman drag po mas gtong ba dang / 'jam rtsi dang / mgo bo'i bkru sman zhes bya ba'i dpyad kyi sbyor ba nyes pa dang / de bzhin du drag shul gyi nad rnams kyis skem zhing sbegs par gyur pa dang /
translated: The application of emetics, purgatives, strong enemas, unctuous enemas, and head purgation are also harmful.🔽Similarly, it is harmful to eat rough, sour, and so forth foods that generate wind when you are emaciated and weak from a severe illness.

original: rlung skyes pa'i zas rtsub cing kha ba la sogs pa za ba dang / de bzhin du bkres shing zas za bar 'dod pa'i skabs su zas ma zos par chu grang mo 'thung ba'am /
analyzed: rlung skyes pa'i zas rtsub cing kha ba la sogs pa za ba dang / de bzhin du bkres shing zas za bar 'dod pa'i skabs su zas ma zos par chu grang mo 'thung ba'am /
translated: Similarly, it is harmful to drink cold water when you are hungry and want to eat, or to drink water after eating.

original: yang na skom 'thungs ba'i rjes la rkyal ba dang mchong ba dang nyal po bsten pa dang / rta rgyug pa la sogs pa la brten cing /
analyzed: yang na skom 'thungs ba'i rjes la rkyal ba dang mchong ba dang nyal po bsten pa dang / rta rgyug pa la sogs pa la brten cing /
translated: It is also harmful to swim, jump, have sex, or ride a horse after drinking.

original: lus 'khrugs shing bskyod par byas pa dang / yang na slon mi bro ba bzhin du nan gyis slon zhing skyugs pa dang / rlung dang bshang gci la sogs pa'i shugs 'byung bar ldog bzhin du nan gyis bkag cing brnag pa dang / de dag nan gyis btsir ba dang /
analyzed: lus 'khrugs shing bskyod par byas pa dang / yang na slon mi bro ba bzhin du nan gyis slon zhing skyugs pa dang / rlung dang bshang gci la sogs pa'i shugs 'byung bar ldog bzhin du nan gyis bkag cing brnag pa dang / de dag nan gyis btsir ba dang /
translated: Also, it is to forcefully eat when the body is disturbed and agitated, or when one feels nauseous. It is to forcefully stop and suppress the natural urges of wind, feces, urine, and so forth. It is to forcefully press down on those urges.

original: yang na snum dang dugs kyi cho ga yang dang yang du bya ba ma bsten cing goms par ma byas par sbyang ba'i las skyug sman dang bkru sman la sogs pa gtang ba dang / yang na sbyangs zin cing skyug sman btang ba la sogs pa byas zin pa'i rjes thogs nyid la myur bar lus tsha bar byed pa'i zas skom la bsten pa dang /
analyzed: yang na snum dang dugs kyi cho ga yang dang yang du bya ba ma bsten cing goms par ma byas par sbyang ba'i las skyug sman dang bkru sman la sogs pa gtang ba dang / yang na sbyangs zin cing skyug sman btang ba la sogs pa byas zin pa'i rjes thogs nyid la myur bar lus tsha bar byed pa'i zas skom la bsten pa dang /
translated: It is to not rely on and not become accustomed to the procedures of oil and heat, and then to take emetics, purgatives, and so forth, which are the activities of purification. It is to quickly rely on food and drink that heat the body right after one has been purified and has taken emetics and so forth.

original: de bzhin du bad kan skyed pa'i ljan ljin 'phel ba'i zas skom longs spyad pa dang / de bzhin du rlung rgyas shing 'phel ba'i nad kyi dri ma rnams so sor 'khrugs par 'gyur ba 'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du bad kan skyed pa'i ljan ljin 'phel ba'i zas skom longs spyad pa dang / de bzhin du rlung rgyas shing 'phel ba'i nad kyi dri ma rnams so sor 'khrugs par 'gyur ba 'am /
translated: Similarly, one consumes food and drink that increases the impurities that give rise to phlegm, and similarly, the impurities of the disease that increases and expands the wind.

original: gnyis pa'i ldan pa 'khrugs pa'am /
analyzed: gnyis pa'i ldan pa 'khrugs pa'am /
translated: Either the two humors are disturbed,

original: yang na gzhi thams cad 'khrugs pa'am /
analyzed: yang na gzhi thams cad 'khrugs pa'am /
translated: or all the bases are disturbed,🔽or they are disturbed and agitated together with blood.

original: khrag dang bcas pas 'khrugs shing g-yos pas sbubs chen po ste /
analyzed: khrag dang bcas pas 'khrugs shing g-yos pas sbubs chen po ste /
translated: The great vessel,

original: lto ba zhes bya ba'i lus kyi dbyibs kyi cha de la brten cing gnas nas de'i 'og tu rtsa bo che'i nang du zhugs te /
analyzed: lto ba zhes bya ba'i lus kyi dbyibs kyi cha de la brten cing gnas nas de'i 'og tu rtsa bo che'i nang du zhugs te /
translated: which is the part of the body called the abdomen, is based on and abides in that [navel].🔽After that, it enters the great channel,

original: steng dang 'og gi lam bkag nas skran skyed par 'gyur la de yang gzer sngon du 'gro ba'i sgo nas nad skyed par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: steng dang 'og gi lam bkag nas skran skyed par 'gyur la de yang gzer sngon du 'gro ba'i sgo nas nad skyed par 'gyur zhing /
translated: and having blocked the upper and lower paths, it gives rise to a tumor.

original: reg tu rung ba shin tu mtho zhing 'bur bar mdud pa'i gzugs can ltar ril ril por gnas pa'i skran zhes bya ba skyed par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: reg tu rung ba shin tu mtho zhing 'bur bar mdud pa'i gzugs can ltar ril ril por gnas pa'i skran zhes bya ba skyed par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: That tumor is produced by pain, and it is a tumor that is very high and protruding, like a knot, and remains round.

original: skem pas bad kan mkhris bshang @151b ba'i //
analyzed: skem pas bad kan mkhris bshang @151b ba'i //
translated: The wind, residing in the stomach,🔽is rough and hard,🔽because of emaciation,

original: rgyun srang 'gags par gyur pa yis //
analyzed: rgyun srang 'gags par gyur pa yis //
translated: the obstruction of the channels of phlegm, bile and feces,

original: rlung ni khong par gnas bcas pa //
analyzed: rlung ni khong par gnas bcas pa //
translated: and the wind’s own power.

original: rtsub pas sra bar gyur pa yin //🔽rang gnas ldang gyur rang dbang can //🔽gzhan gnas la brten gzhan dbang can //🔽gong por gyur pas gzugs med kyang //
analyzed: rtsub pas sra bar gyur pa yin // rang gnas ldang gyur rang dbang can // gzhan gnas la brten gzhan dbang can // gong por gyur pas gzugs med kyang //
translated: It is hard, because it is rough.🔽It is formless, but it is called a “tumor”

original: gzugs can ltar gnas skran zhes bya //
analyzed: gzugs can ltar gnas skran zhes bya //
translated: because it is located like a form.

original: chu so lte ba snying ga dang // rtsib logs la ni gnas pa yin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: chu so lte ba snying ga dang // rtsib logs la ni gnas pa yin // zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is located in the bladder, the navel, the heart, and the ribs.

original: skem zhing lus zungs zad pas lan 'ga' zhig rlung 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: skem zhing lus zungs zad pas lan 'ga' zhig rlung 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur la /
translated: The wind is sometimes disturbed and rises because of emaciation and the wasting of the body’s constituents.

original: lan 'ga' zhig ni bad kan dang mkhris pa dang bshang ba rgyu ba'i bu ga'i lam srang 'gags par 'gyur bas 'khrugs par 'gyur la /
analyzed: lan 'ga' zhig ni bad kan dang mkhris pa dang bshang ba rgyu ba'i bu ga'i lam srang 'gags par 'gyur bas 'khrugs par 'gyur la /
translated: Sometimes it is disturbed because the channels of the movement of phlegm, bile and feces are obstructed.

original: 'khrugs pa'i rlung de khong pa'i nang du gnas bcas shing brten par gyur pa yin la /
analyzed: 'khrugs pa'i rlung de khong pa'i nang du gnas bcas shing brten par gyur pa yin la /
translated: The disturbed wind resides and is supported in the stomach.

original: des na rtsub pa'i rgyus sra zhing mkhrang bar gyur pa yin la /
analyzed: des na rtsub pa'i rgyus sra zhing mkhrang bar gyur pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, due to the cause of roughness, it becomes hard and solid.

original: rlung de rang gi gnas na gnas pa'i tshe na ni rang dbang can zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rlung de rang gi gnas na gnas pa'i tshe na ni rang dbang can zhes bya ba la /
translated: When that wind abides in its own location, it is called independent.

original: rang gi gnas bad kan dang mkhris pa'i gnas la brten pa'i tshe na ni gzhan dbang can zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi gnas bad kan dang mkhris pa'i gnas la brten pa'i tshe na ni gzhan dbang can zhes bya'o //
translated: When it abides in its own location, which is the location of phlegm and bile, it is called dependent.

original: yang nad de ni gong por gnas pas na reg tu rung bar gyur pas /
analyzed: yang nad de ni gong por gnas pas na reg tu rung bar gyur pas /
translated: Moreover, since that disease abides in the upper body, it is suitable to be touched.

original: rlung de gzugs med pa ste sra ba ma yin du zin kyang gzugs can lta bur gnas shing mdud pa'i gzugs su 'dug pas ming skran zhes bya bar btags pa yin no //
analyzed: rlung de gzugs med pa ste sra ba ma yin du zin kyang gzugs can lta bur gnas shing mdud pa'i gzugs su 'dug pas ming skran zhes bya bar btags pa yin no //
translated: Even though that wind is formless and not solid, it abides like a form and has the form of a knot, so it is designated by the name tumor.

original: de yang chu so la sogs pa'i gnas su gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang chu so la sogs pa'i gnas su gnas pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, it abides in the locations of the bladder and so forth.

original: chu so dang lte ba snying ga dang rtsib logs g-yas g-yon te lngar gnas pa yin no //🔽rlung las mjing pa klad pa gzer //
analyzed: chu so dang lte ba snying ga dang rtsib logs g-yas g-yon te lngar gnas pa yin no // rlung las mjing pa klad pa gzer //
translated: It abides in five locations: the bladder, the navel, the heart, and the right and left sides.🔽When the life-upholding wind is disturbed, it causes goiters, headaches,

original: rims 'debs mcher na rgyu ma 'khrug / bshang sri khab kyis gtsags snyam na //
analyzed: rims 'debs mcher na rgyu ma 'khrug / bshang sri khab kyis gtsags snyam na //
translated: fever, pain in the spleen, intestinal disturbance,🔽constipation, and the feeling of being pricked by needles.

original: dbugs 'byin yang dang yang mi phyin //
analyzed: dbugs 'byin yang dang yang mi phyin //
translated: And one cannot breathe out again and again.🔽The body is stiff, the mouth is dry,🔽One becomes emaciated, the digestive heat is uneven,

original: lus rengs kha ni skam pa dang // skem zhing me drod mi snyoms dang // lpags sogs gnag cing rtsub pa dang // rlung skran g-yo ba yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: lus rengs kha ni skam pa dang // skem zhing me drod mi snyoms dang // lpags sogs gnag cing rtsub pa dang // rlung skran g-yo ba yin pa'i phyir //
translated: The skin and so forth become dark and rough,🔽And the wind-tumor moves.

original: dbyibs ni brtag par mi mngon zhing //
analyzed: dbyibs ni brtag par mi mngon zhing //
translated: The shape is not visible to examination.🔽The tumor grows in the place, increases, decreases, and hurts,

original: gnas 'phel 'bri dang na ba dang // grog mas khyab pa lta bur ni //
analyzed: gnas 'phel 'bri dang na ba dang // grog mas khyab pa lta bur ni //
translated: As if pervaded by ants.

original: skran ni 'gul zhing zug pa yin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: skran ni 'gul zhing zug pa yin // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The tumor moves and hurts.

original: rlung las gyur pa'i skran nad ni mjing ba dang klad pa gzer ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'debs par @152a * //
analyzed: rlung las gyur pa'i skran nad ni mjing ba dang klad pa gzer ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'debs par @152a * //
translated: Here, a tumor that arises from wind is afflicted by diseases such as a stiff neck and a headache.

original: 'gyur ba dang / khab kyis gtsags ba snyam du na zhing zug pa dang / dbugs 'byin par dka' zhing yang dang yang du mi thon pa dang / lus rengs shing 'gyur mi shes pa dang / skem zhing rid pa dang / pags pa dang mig dang sen mo dang gdong dang lce la sogs pa gnag pa dang /
