original: phyi rol du byung ba'i skran ni nang du 'byung ba'i skran gyi mtshan ma de las go bzlog pa yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol du byung ba'i skran ni nang du 'byung ba'i skran gyi mtshan ma de las go bzlog pa yin te /
translated: an external tumor is the opposite of the signs of an internal tumor.

original: chu so la sogs par na bar mi 'gyur ba dang / me drod la sogs pa nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / shugs mi 'gag cing bde blag tu 'byung ba dang khong pa'i yan lag lte ba la sogs par nad tshabs chung zhing shas che bar min pa dang /
analyzed: chu so la sogs par na bar mi 'gyur ba dang / me drod la sogs pa nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / shugs mi 'gag cing bde blag tu 'byung ba dang khong pa'i yan lag lte ba la sogs par nad tshabs chung zhing shas che bar min pa dang /
translated: It does not cause pain in the urinary bladder and so on, does not impair the digestive heat and so on, does not block the channels, arises easily, and is not severe or excessive in the stomach and so on.

original: skran chags pa'i phyogs de'i mdog nyams shing kha dog gzhan du 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du phyi rol du @154a * //
analyzed: skran chags pa'i phyogs de'i mdog nyams shing kha dog gzhan du 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du phyi rol du @154a * //
translated: The color of the affected area fades and changes. Similarly, externally

original: lhag par mthong zhing 'phags pa yin no //🔽lto sbo lhag par mi bzad na //
analyzed: lhag par mthong zhing 'phags pa yin no // lto sbo lhag par mi bzad na //
translated: it is seen protruding.🔽If the abdomen is distended and unbearable,

original: rgyu ma'i sgra bcas mi bzad na //
analyzed: rgyu ma'i sgra bcas mi bzad na //
translated: and if the intestines make sounds and are unbearable,

original: sbo bcas lto ba na ba dang // rlung gi nad kyis steng 'og bkag / de ni hen gyi zhes byar bshad //
analyzed: sbo bcas lto ba na ba dang // rlung gi nad kyis steng 'og bkag / de ni hen gyi zhes byar bshad //
translated: This is explained as “hernia.”

original: ces bya ba la /🔽lto sbo zhing sgra dang bcas pa dang / steng 'og tu rlung gi lam bkag pas lhag bar mi bzad bar na zhing /
analyzed: ces bya ba la / lto sbo zhing sgra dang bcas pa dang / steng 'og tu rlung gi lam bkag pas lhag bar mi bzad bar na zhing /
translated: Here,

original: brnag par dka' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de ni /
analyzed: brnag par dka' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de ni /
translated: the stomach is distended and makes sounds, and the wind path is obstructed above and below, causing severe pain and difficulty.

original: lto sbo hen gyi nad ces bya ba yin par slob dpon gyis bshad do //
analyzed: lto sbo hen gyi nad ces bya ba yin par slob dpon gyis bshad do //
translated: The master explains that this is characterized by distension and hernia.

original: sra zhing gtun 'dra ma dud pa can //
analyzed: sra zhing gtun 'dra ma dud pa can //
translated: It is hard, like a mortar, and has a lump.

original: gtun 'dra gyen du mtho bar gnas //
analyzed: gtun 'dra gyen du mtho bar gnas //
translated: The mortar is elevated upwards.

original: hen gyi mtshan ldan /
analyzed: hen gyi mtshan ldan /
translated: It has the characteristics of hernia.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: nad gang sra zhing rdo'i gtun 'dra zhing mdud pa can du gnas la /
analyzed: nad gang sra zhing rdo'i gtun 'dra zhing mdud pa can du gnas la /
translated: whatever disease is hard, like a stone mortar, and has a lump,

original: gtun rdo dang dbyibs 'dra zhing gyen du mtho bar 'jong bag tu gnas pa hen gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni gtun 'dra ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gtun rdo dang dbyibs 'dra zhing gyen du mtho bar 'jong bag tu gnas pa hen gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni gtun 'dra ba zhes bya'o //
translated: and the shape is like a mortar, elevated upwards, and protrudes, it has the characteristics of hernia and is called “like a mortar.”

original: gtun bu ni ;
analyzed: gtun bu ni ;
translated: The mortar is

original: 'phred gnas de dang tshul 'dra yin //
analyzed: 'phred gnas de dang tshul 'dra yin //
translated: it is situated horizontally, like that.

original: zhes bya ba la /🔽gtun bu zhes bya ba'i nad ni 'phred du thad kar gnas kyi /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la / gtun bu zhes bya ba'i nad ni 'phred du thad kar gnas kyi /
translated: The disease called “pestle” is a disease that is located horizontally.🔽

original: gyen du 'gro ba ma yin la /
analyzed: gyen du 'gro ba ma yin la /
translated: The term prapata means a disease that is located horizontally, not vertically.

original: nad kyi tshul ni gtun 'dra ba dang mtshungs te /
analyzed: nad kyi tshul ni gtun 'dra ba dang mtshungs te /
translated: The manner of the disease is similar to a pestle.

original: de lta bu'i nad la ni gtun bu zhes bya'o //🔽zhu ba'i gnas nas gzhang pho mtshan //
analyzed: de lta bu'i nad la ni gtun bu zhes bya'o // zhu ba'i gnas nas gzhang pho mtshan //
translated: Such a disease is called a prapata.

original: rlung ni mi bzad na zhing rgyu //🔽thur du zug pa yin par bshad //
analyzed: rlung ni mi bzad na zhing rgyu // thur du zug pa yin par bshad //
translated: The wind moves in the anus and the penis

original: ces bya ba la /🔽zhu ba'i nad lte ba'i 'og tu gnas gzhang dang pho mtshan dag tu rlung rgyu zhing /
analyzed: ces bya ba la / zhu ba'i nad lte ba'i 'og tu gnas gzhang dang pho mtshan dag tu rlung rgyu zhing /
translated: from the place of digestion, and it is said to be a downward moving wind.

original: lhag par na bar byed pa de ni thur du zug pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lhag par na bar byed pa de ni thur du zug pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The term anus and penis means that the wind moves in the anus and the penis from the place of digestion below the navel, and it is called a downward moving wind.

original: de las bzlog pa gyen du zug pa'o //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa gyen du zug pa'o // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The opposite of that is an upward moving wind.

original: gyen du zug ba zhes bya ba'i nad ni de las bzlog pa ste /
analyzed: gyen du zug ba zhes bya ba'i nad ni de las bzlog pa ste /
translated: The term upward moving wind means the opposite of that.

original: gzhang dang pho mtshan gyi gnas nas lte bar gyen du zug cing na la gyen du zug pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gzhang dang pho mtshan gyi gnas nas lte bar gyen du zug cing na la gyen du zug pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It moves upward from the anus and the penis to the navel, and it is called an upward moving wind.

original: sgregs pa mang zhing bshang ba 'gags pa dang // 'grangs za mi nus rgyu ma sgra dang bcas //
analyzed: sgregs pa mang zhing bshang ba 'gags pa dang // 'grangs za mi nus rgyu ma sgra dang bcas //
translated: There is much belching, constipation, inability to eat a full meal, and rumbling in the intestines.

original: sbo zhing hen langs kha zas 'ju mi nus //
analyzed: sbo zhing hen langs kha zas 'ju mi nus //
translated: There is distension, a feeling of fullness, and inability to digest food.

original: skran ni nyer 'byung mtshan ma yin par bshad //
analyzed: skran ni nyer 'byung mtshan ma yin par bshad //
translated: It is taught that these are the signs of the onset of a tumor.

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: This is what it says.

original: mi gang la skran nye bar 'ongs par 'gyur ba'i sngar 'byung ba'i tshul ni sgregs pa mang po yang dang yang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / bshang ba 'gags shing sri ba @154b dang ; /'grangs shing tshim par za ma nus pa dang / rgyu ma sgra dang bcas shing mi gsal ba'i sgra krul krul zer ba dang /
analyzed: mi gang la skran nye bar 'ongs par 'gyur ba'i sngar 'byung ba'i tshul ni sgregs pa mang po yang dang yang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / bshang ba 'gags shing sri ba @154b dang ; /'grangs shing tshim par za ma nus pa dang / rgyu ma sgra dang bcas shing mi gsal ba'i sgra krul krul zer ba dang /
translated: The way in which a tumor is about to arise is that there is much belching that occurs again and again, constipation and heaviness, an inability to eat a full meal, rumbling and unclear sounds in the intestines,

original: sbo zhing lto rgyas la hen langs pa dang / me drod zhan pas kha zas 'ju bar mi byed pa ste /
analyzed: sbo zhing lto rgyas la hen langs pa dang / me drod zhan pas kha zas 'ju bar mi byed pa ste /
translated: distension, a feeling of fullness in the stomach, and a feeling of fullness. Because of the low digestive heat, food is not digested.

original: de dag ni skran ring po mi thogs par 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i mtshan ma yin par slob dpon gyis bstan cing bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni skran ring po mi thogs par 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i mtshan ma yin par slob dpon gyis bstan cing bshad pa yin no //
translated: These are the signs that a tumor will arise before too long. This is what the master has taught and explained.

original: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
analyzed: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
translated: The Moonlight: A Commentary on the Meaning of the Words, a Compendium of the Essence of the Eight Branches,

original: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las /
analyzed: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las /
translated: composed by the master Candranandana.

original: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the eleventh chapter of the Explanatory Tantra, the chapter on the site of disease.

original: // / de nas dmu rdzing gi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: // / de nas dmu rdzing gi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Now, the site of dropsy will be explained.

original: 'di na khong 'bras la sogs pa dang tshul 'dra bas 'di brtsams pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di na khong 'bras la sogs pa dang tshul 'dra bas 'di brtsams pa yin no //
translated: Here, it is composed in a manner similar to the site of abdominal distension and so forth.

original: nad kun me drod nyams las skye //
analyzed: nad kun me drod nyams las skye //
translated: All diseases arise from impaired digestive heat.

original: lhag par dmu rdzing nad skye zhing //
analyzed: lhag par dmu rdzing nad skye zhing //
translated: In particular, dropsy arises from impaired digestive heat.

original: ma zhu dri ma can gyi zas //
analyzed: ma zhu dri ma can gyi zas //
translated: Indigestible and contaminated food

original: dri ma sogs las skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dri ma sogs las skye bar 'gyur //
translated: arises from contamination and so forth.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: gang gi phyir nad thams cad kyang pho ba'i me drod nyams pa las skye bar 'gyur ba yin mod kyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir nad thams cad kyang pho ba'i me drod nyams pa las skye bar 'gyur ba yin mod kyi /
translated: although all diseases arise from impaired digestive heat,

original: khyad par du 'am /🔽lhag par dmu rdzing gi nad ni /
analyzed: khyad par du 'am / lhag par dmu rdzing gi nad ni /
translated: in particular,

original: pho ba'i me drod nyams pa las skye bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: pho ba'i me drod nyams pa las skye bar 'gyur la /
translated: dropsy arises from impaired digestive heat.

original: de bzhin du ma zhu ba rnam pa bzhi dang / dri ma can gyi zas rul pa dang / zhag lon pa'i khengs bu dang / 'dren ma la sogs pa'i skyon dang ldan pa bsten pa dang / de bzhin du nad kyi dri ma yun ring du sogs shing 'phel bar 'gyur ba las dmu rdzing gi nad skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du ma zhu ba rnam pa bzhi dang / dri ma can gyi zas rul pa dang / zhag lon pa'i khengs bu dang / 'dren ma la sogs pa'i skyon dang ldan pa bsten pa dang / de bzhin du nad kyi dri ma yun ring du sogs shing 'phel bar 'gyur ba las dmu rdzing gi nad skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: Likewise, the contamination of disease increases over a long time and the disease of ascites arises and occurs.

original: de dag ni nad kyi rgyu bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni nad kyi rgyu bstan pa yin no //
translated: Those are the causes of disease.

original: nad kyis chu ni rgyu ba'i rtsa //
analyzed: nad kyis chu ni rgyu ba'i rtsa //
translated: The channels through which the water element moves

original: steng dang 'og tu bkag nas ni //
analyzed: steng dang 'og tu bkag nas ni //
translated: are blocked above and below.

original: srog dang thur sel la gnod de //
analyzed: srog dang thur sel la gnod de //
translated: The life-force and downward-voiding vāyus are harmed.

original: pags pa sha yi bar gnas nad //
analyzed: pags pa sha yi bar gnas nad //
translated: The disease is between the skin and flesh.

original: lto ba bkang ste dmu rdzing skyed //🔽ces bya ba la /
analyzed: lto ba bkang ste dmu rdzing skyed // ces bya ba la /
translated: The disease of ascites is generated by filling the stomach.

original: rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyis chu'am /
analyzed: rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyis chu'am /
translated: As such, the water element is the basis of the body.

original: bad kan gyi tshogs rgyu ba'i rtsa lus kyi steng 'og tu rgyu ba bkag nas rgyu des srog ces bya ba'i rlung la sogs pas gnod cing 'khrugs par byas nas pags pa dang sha'i bar na yod pa'i nad drangs te /
analyzed: bad kan gyi tshogs rgyu ba'i rtsa lus kyi steng 'og tu rgyu ba bkag nas rgyu des srog ces bya ba'i rlung la sogs pas gnod cing 'khrugs par byas nas pags pa dang sha'i bar na yod pa'i nad drangs te /
translated: The humors of phlegm move above and below the body, and when they are blocked, the life-force wind and so on are harmed and disturbed by that movement, drawing out the disease that exists between the skin and flesh.

original: lto ba bkang nas dmu rdzing skyed @155a * //🔽cing 'byung bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: lto ba bkang nas dmu rdzing skyed @155a * // cing 'byung bar byed pa yin no //
translated: When the stomach is full, it produces and causes ascites.

original: de yang rnam pa brgyad 'gyur te //🔽nad gzhi tha dad 'dus mcher pa //
analyzed: de yang rnam pa brgyad 'gyur te // nad gzhi tha dad 'dus mcher pa //
translated: That is also of eight types.🔽The bases of disease are different, the spleen,

original: dri ma 'gags dang rgyu rdol dang // zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dri ma 'gags dang rgyu rdol dang // zhes bya ba la /
translated: obstructed waste, and ruptured intestines.

original: dmu rdzing de yang grangs kyi dbye ba rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur te /
analyzed: dmu rdzing de yang grangs kyi dbye ba rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur te /
translated: That ascites is of eight types by way of enumeration.

original: rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan gyi nad gzhi tha dad pa las byung ba gsum dang / gsum char 'dus pa las byung ba gcig dang / mcher pa las byung ba dang / dri ma 'gags pa'i dmu rdzing dang / rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing dang /
analyzed: rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan gyi nad gzhi tha dad pa las byung ba gsum dang / gsum char 'dus pa las byung ba gcig dang / mcher pa las byung ba dang / dri ma 'gags pa'i dmu rdzing dang / rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing dang /
translated: There are three that arise from the bases of disease of wind, bile, and phlegm, one that arises from the combination of all three, one that arises from the spleen, ascites of obstructed waste, ascites of ruptured intestines,🔽and ascites of the stomach.

original: chu'i dmu rdzing ste rnam pa brgyad do //
analyzed: chu'i dmu rdzing ste rnam pa brgyad do //
translated: These are the eight types of edema.

original: des gzir rkan dang mchu bskams shing //
analyzed: des gzir rkan dang mchu bskams shing //
translated: A person afflicted by edema has a dry palate and lips,

original: rkang pa lag pa gsus pa skrangs //
analyzed: rkang pa lag pa gsus pa skrangs //
translated: swollen feet, hands, and belly,

original: spyod pa kha zas nyams stobs 'bri //
analyzed: spyod pa kha zas nyams stobs 'bri //
translated: and a decline in behavior, food, and strength.

original: skem zhing gsus pa cher skyes la //
analyzed: skem zhing gsus pa cher skyes la //
translated: Emaciated and with a distended belly,

original: mi ni yi dags gzugs can 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mi ni yi dags gzugs can 'gyur // zhes bya ba la /
translated: a person becomes like a hungry ghost.

original: dmu rdzing gi nad des gzir cing nyen pa'i mi ni rkan dang mchu bskams par gyur pa dang / rkang pa dang pags pa dang lto ba skrangs pa dang / lus kyi spyod pa nyams pa dang / kha zas za ba'i rtsol ba nyams pa dang /
analyzed: dmu rdzing gi nad des gzir cing nyen pa'i mi ni rkan dang mchu bskams par gyur pa dang / rkang pa dang pags pa dang lto ba skrangs pa dang / lus kyi spyod pa nyams pa dang / kha zas za ba'i rtsol ba nyams pa dang /
translated: A person afflicted by edema has a dry palate and lips, swollen feet, hands, and belly, a decline in physical behavior, a decline in the effort to eat food,

original: lus kyi nyams stobs 'bri zhing zad pa dang / skem zhing sha dang khrag zad pa dang / gsus pa cher skyes shing rgyas par 'gyur te /🔽mdor na mi de yi dags kyi gzugs can lta bu'am /
analyzed: lus kyi nyams stobs 'bri zhing zad pa dang / skem zhing sha dang khrag zad pa dang / gsus pa cher skyes shing rgyas par 'gyur te / mdor na mi de yi dags kyi gzugs can lta bu'am /
translated: a decline and exhaustion of physical strength, emaciation, and a loss of flesh and blood, and a distended and enlarged belly.🔽In brief, that person becomes like a hungry ghost.

original: 'chi ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'chi ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Or it is like death.

original: de ni 'byung 'gyur mtshan ma dag / bkres pa med cing zas kun ni //
analyzed: de ni 'byung 'gyur mtshan ma dag / bkres pa med cing zas kun ni //
translated: no hunger, all food

original: ring nas tsha zhing skyur bcas 'ju //
analyzed: ring nas tsha zhing skyur bcas 'ju //
translated: is long digested with heat and sourness.

original: 'ju dang mi 'ju mi shes la //
analyzed: 'ju dang mi 'ju mi shes la //
translated: One does not know whether it is digested or not.

original: 'grangs par za yang mi nus shing //
analyzed: 'grangs par za yang mi nus shing //
translated: One cannot eat to one’s fill.

original: stobs ni rtag tu zad par 'gyur //
analyzed: stobs ni rtag tu zad par 'gyur //
translated: One’s strength always diminishes.

original: cung zad bskyod kyang dbugs mi bde //
analyzed: cung zad bskyod kyang dbugs mi bde //
translated: One is short of breath even with slight exertion.

original: bshang ba 'phel zhing 'gags par byed //
analyzed: bshang ba 'phel zhing 'gags par byed //
translated: One’s feces increase and are obstructed.

original: rkang pa gnyis su cung zad skrang //🔽chu sor na zhing zas yang ba //
analyzed: rkang pa gnyis su cung zad skrang // chu sor na zhing zas yang ba //
translated: One’s legs swell slightly.🔽One suffers in the bladder and has light food.

original: cung zad zos kyang gsus pa rgyas //
analyzed: cung zad zos kyang gsus pa rgyas //
translated: One’s belly swells even with a little food.

original: rtsa rgyas lto ba'i gnyer ma 'jig / ces bya ba la /
analyzed: rtsa rgyas lto ba'i gnyer ma 'jig / ces bya ba la /
translated: One’s veins swell and the folds of one’s belly break.🔽The signs of the occurrence or previous occurrence of ascites are:

original: dmu rdzing de nye bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dam sngar byung ba'i tshul ni zas ma zos kyang bkres pa'i bag med pa dang // ro drug dang ldan pa'i kha zas kun kyang tsha ba ngang bcas shing skyur bag @155b gi rnam pas ring zhig lon nas gdod 'ju ba dang /
analyzed: dmu rdzing de nye bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dam sngar byung ba'i tshul ni zas ma zos kyang bkres pa'i bag med pa dang // ro drug dang ldan pa'i kha zas kun kyang tsha ba ngang bcas shing skyur bag @155b gi rnam pas ring zhig lon nas gdod 'ju ba dang /
translated: no feeling of hunger even without eating food, all food endowed with the six tastes is long digested with heat and sourness,

original: zas zos ba zhu bar gyur tam /
analyzed: zas zos ba zhu bar gyur tam /
translated: The food that is eaten will not be digested.🔽One will not be able to eat and enjoy food to one’s satisfaction.🔽The body’s strength will always diminish day and night.

original: zhu bar ma gyur pa blos rtogs shing shes par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'grangs bar za zhing longs spyad par mi nus pa dang / lus kyi stobs nyin mtshan rtag tu zad cing 'bri bar 'gyur ba dang / lus bskyod pa'i g-yo 'gul gyi bya ba cung zad byas kyang /
analyzed: zhu bar ma gyur pa blos rtogs shing shes par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'grangs bar za zhing longs spyad par mi nus pa dang / lus kyi stobs nyin mtshan rtag tu zad cing 'bri bar 'gyur ba dang / lus bskyod pa'i g-yo 'gul gyi bya ba cung zad byas kyang /
translated: Even if one moves the body a little, one will be out of breath and short of breath.🔽The feces will increase inside and not come out, being blocked.

original: dbugs mi bde zhing brtsegs pa dang / bshang ba nang du 'phel zhing sogs la phyir mi 'byung bar 'gags pa dang / de bzhin du rkang pa skrangs pa nas lto ba'i gnyer ma 'jig cing mi snang ba'i bar gyi mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbugs mi bde zhing brtsegs pa dang / bshang ba nang du 'phel zhing sogs la phyir mi 'byung bar 'gags pa dang / de bzhin du rkang pa skrangs pa nas lto ba'i gnyer ma 'jig cing mi snang ba'i bar gyi mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, the signs of swelling of the feet up to the disappearance of the folds of the belly will appear.

original: dmu rdzing nad ni thams cad la //
analyzed: dmu rdzing nad ni thams cad la //
translated: In all diseases of ascites,🔽one becomes equalized and weak,

original: snyom zhing nyam chung 'gyur ba dang // dri ma sri zhing me drod chung //
analyzed: snyom zhing nyam chung 'gyur ba dang // dri ma sri zhing me drod chung //
translated: smelly, with little digestive heat,

original: tsha zhing skrangs la gsus pa sbo //
analyzed: tsha zhing skrangs la gsus pa sbo //
translated: hot, swollen, and with a distended belly.

original: mjug tu chu ni 'byung bar 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mjug tu chu ni 'byung bar 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba la /
translated: In the end, water will appear.

original: dmu rdzing thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan ma ni snyom pa la sogs pa yin te ;
analyzed: dmu rdzing thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan ma ni snyom pa la sogs pa yin te ;
translated: The general characteristics of all the types of ascites are:

original: / snyom pa ni gnyid kyis myos pa snyam du yul 'dzin par mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: / snyom pa ni gnyid kyis myos pa snyam du yul 'dzin par mi nus pa'o //
translated: Sinking, as if one is intoxicated by sleep and unable to grasp objects.

original: tsha ba ni lus tsha ba 'ur 'ur pos khyab pa'o //
analyzed: tsha ba ni lus tsha ba 'ur 'ur pos khyab pa'o //

original: dmu rdzing de dag thams cad kyi mjug gam mthar ni lto ba'i nang du chu 'byung zhing des gang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dmu rdzing de dag thams cad kyi mjug gam mthar ni lto ba'i nang du chu 'byung zhing des gang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: At the end or conclusion of all these types of ascites, water appears in the abdomen and fills it.🔽All [types of ascites] are dark until the water disappears,

original: thams cad chu med bar du smug / skrang med khur ltar lci ma yin //
analyzed: thams cad chu med bar du smug / skrang med khur ltar lci ma yin //

original: rtsa dra'i skar khung ris kyis khebs //
analyzed: rtsa dra'i skar khung ris kyis khebs //

original: rtag tu sgra ni 'ur 'ur zer //
analyzed: rtag tu sgra ni 'ur 'ur zer //

original: rlung gis lte ba rgyu mar zhugs //
analyzed: rlung gis lte ba rgyu mar zhugs //

original: shugs bskyed nad ni 'jig par 'gyur //
analyzed: shugs bskyed nad ni 'jig par 'gyur //
translated: increasing the force and destroying the disease.🔽It causes pain in the heart, navel, waist,

original: snying ga lte ba rked pa dang // gzhang dang chu so na bar byed //
analyzed: snying ga lte ba rked pa dang // gzhang dang chu so na bar byed //

original: rlung ni sgra dang bcas par rgyu //
analyzed: rlung ni sgra dang bcas par rgyu //

analyzed: bshang ba 'gags shing gci ba nyung //

original: me drod chung min skam pa min //
analyzed: me drod chung min skam pa min //

analyzed: kha ni ro bro med ma yin // zhes bya ba la /

original: dmu rdzing gi nad thams cad ni /
analyzed: dmu rdzing gi nad thams cad ni /
translated: In this regard, all the diseases of the spleen

analyzed: dmu chur ma gyur par sha mdog smug cing dmar bar snang la /
translated: are not the spleen-fluids, but appear as a reddish brown flesh color.🔽They are not very swollen, but slightly swollen, and not very heavy like a burden, and are covered like a window with a network of veins.

translated: They always make a sound like a rumbling in the sky inside the stomach.

original: rlung lte ba dang rgyu mar zug cing na bar byed pa nas /
analyzed: rlung lte ba dang rgyu mar zug cing na bar byed pa nas /

analyzed: @156a * // sgra'i shugs bskyed cing byung nas 'jig ste mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / yang rlung gis snying ga la sogs par na zhing zug par byed pa dang / yang rlung de lto ba'i nang na sgra dang bcas shing rgyu zhing phan tshun 'gro ba dang /
translated: Again, that wind moves with sound in the belly, going back and forth.🔽It obstructs and constricts feces,🔽reduces the amount of urine,🔽does not greatly diminish the digestive heat in the stomach,🔽is not dry and does not cause craving for food,

original: bshang ba 'gags shing sri bar byed pa dang ; gcin gyi tshogs nyung bar byed pa dang / khong pa'i me drod shin tu chung ba ma yin pa dang / skam zhing zas la gdu ba ma yin pa dang // kha'i nang na ro bro ba med pa ma yin te ro dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: bshang ba 'gags shing sri bar byed pa dang ; gcin gyi tshogs nyung bar byed pa dang / khong pa'i me drod shin tu chung ba ma yin pa dang / skam zhing zas la gdu ba ma yin pa dang // kha'i nang na ro bro ba med pa ma yin te ro dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: and is not without taste in the mouth, but has taste.

original: de la rlung gi dmu rdzing ni //🔽rkang lag rlig pa lto ba skrang /
analyzed: de la rlung gi dmu rdzing ni // rkang lag rlig pa lto ba skrang /
translated: Among those, the wind distension🔽causes swelling of the hands, feet, testicles, and belly.

original: lto ba rtsib logs rked rgyab na //
analyzed: lto ba rtsib logs rked rgyab na //
translated: In the belly, sides, waist, and back,

original: tshigs rnams bye ba snyam du sems //🔽lud pa skam zhing yan lag snyom //
analyzed: tshigs rnams bye ba snyam du sems // lud pa skam zhing yan lag snyom //
translated: one feels as if the joints are being pulled apart.🔽Phlegm is dry and the limbs are numb.

original: ro smad lci zhing bshang gci 'gags //
analyzed: ro smad lci zhing bshang gci 'gags //
translated: The lower body is heavy and feces and urine are obstructed.

original: pags pa la sogs gnag la smug / glo bur du ni 'phel zhing 'bri //
analyzed: pags pa la sogs gnag la smug / glo bur du ni 'phel zhing 'bri //
translated: The skin and so forth are dark and purple, and suddenly swell and shrink.

original: gsus par zug cing na ba dang // rtsa bran nag pos khyab cing rgyas //🔽brdabs na rkyal pa dbugs kyis ni //
analyzed: gsus par zug cing na ba dang // rtsa bran nag pos khyab cing rgyas // brdabs na rkyal pa dbugs kyis ni //
translated: The belly is painful and constricted, and the small channels are pervaded and distended.🔽When tapped, it makes a sound like a bellows

original: gang ba lta bu'i sgra dang ldan //
analyzed: gang ba lta bu'i sgra dang ldan //
translated: filled with air.

original: 'dir rlung nad dang sgrar bcas pas //
analyzed: 'dir rlung nad dang sgrar bcas pas //
translated: Here, the wind and sound

analyzed: thams cad du ni rgyu bar byed // ces bya ba la /
translated: move everywhere.

original: de la dmu rdzing rnams kyi nang nas /
analyzed: de la dmu rdzing rnams kyi nang nas /
translated: Here, among the dropsy illnesses,

original: rlung las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing ni rkang pa dang lag pa la sogs pa skrang bar 'gyur ba dang / rus pa'i tshigs na zhing zhig pa snyam du sems pa dang / lud pa bad kan med par skam por 'byung ba dang / yan lag snyom zhing grugs ba snyam du sems pa dang /
analyzed: rlung las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing ni rkang pa dang lag pa la sogs pa skrang bar 'gyur ba dang / rus pa'i tshigs na zhing zhig pa snyam du sems pa dang / lud pa bad kan med par skam por 'byung ba dang / yan lag snyom zhing grugs ba snyam du sems pa dang /
translated: the dropsy illness of wind causes swelling of the feet, hands, and so forth, pain and a feeling of disintegration in the joints of the bones, dry phlegm that arises without phlegm, and a feeling of numbness and tingling in the limbs.

original: lus kyi ro smad lci zhing gdeg dka' ba snyam du sems pa dang ; bshang gci dri ma 'gags shing sri ba dang / pags pa dang sen mo dang mig dang lce dang bshang ba la sogs pa mdog gnag cing smug par snang ba dang /
analyzed: lus kyi ro smad lci zhing gdeg dka' ba snyam du sems pa dang ; bshang gci dri ma 'gags shing sri ba dang / pags pa dang sen mo dang mig dang lce dang bshang ba la sogs pa mdog gnag cing smug par snang ba dang /
translated: The skin, nails, eyes, tongue, feces, and so forth appear dark and dull.🔽Without cause, the belly suddenly expands and contracts.🔽It aches and hurts a lot.🔽A network of black veins spreads and expands.

original: rgyu med par glo bur du de'i lto ba cher 'phel zhing 'bri bar 'gyur ba dang / zug cing shas cher na ba dang / rtsa bran gyi tshogs nag pos khyab cing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / lto ba la lag pa la sogs pas brdabs shing bsnun na rkyal ba dbugs kyis gang ba la mnan pa lta bu'i sgra dang ldan pa dang /
analyzed: rgyu med par glo bur du de'i lto ba cher 'phel zhing 'bri bar 'gyur ba dang / zug cing shas cher na ba dang / rtsa bran gyi tshogs nag pos khyab cing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / lto ba la lag pa la sogs pas brdabs shing bsnun na rkyal ba dbugs kyis gang ba la mnan pa lta bu'i sgra dang ldan pa dang /
translated: When the belly is struck with the hand and so forth, it makes a sound like a bag filled with air being pressed down.

original: dmu rdzing 'di la rlung sgra dang bcas pas thams cad du rgyu zhing 'gro bar byed pa yin no //🔽mkhris @156b pa'i dmu rdzing rims 'debs rgyas //
analyzed: dmu rdzing 'di la rlung sgra dang bcas pas thams cad du rgyu zhing 'gro bar byed pa yin no // mkhris @156b pa'i dmu rdzing rims 'debs rgyas //
translated: This bile-bladder moves and travels everywhere with a sound.🔽The bile-bladder causes fever, swelling,

original: lus tsha skom dang kha ro kha //
analyzed: lus tsha skom dang kha ro kha //
translated: and a bitter taste in the mouth.

original: mgo 'khor tshad 'khru pags pa sogs //
analyzed: mgo 'khor tshad 'khru pags pa sogs //

analyzed: ser zhing gsus pa'i mdog rtsa sngo //

original: rtsa ni dmar ser dag gis khyab //
analyzed: rtsa ni dmar ser dag gis khyab //
translated: Their veins are covered with red and yellow,🔽and they are burned by heat and dust.

original: rdul dang tsha bar bcas pas sreg / ngad 'byung reg na 'jam pa dang // myur du smin cing nyer gdung 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdul dang tsha bar bcas pas sreg / ngad 'byung reg na 'jam pa dang // myur du smin cing nyer gdung 'gyur // zhes bya ba la /

original: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing ni rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa 'byung ba dang / pags pa dang sen mo la sogs pa mdog ser ba dang / gsus pa'i mdog rtsa sngo bar snang ba dang / rtsa'i mdog dmar po dang ser po dag gis khebs pa dang /
analyzed: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing ni rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa 'byung ba dang / pags pa dang sen mo la sogs pa mdog ser ba dang / gsus pa'i mdog rtsa sngo bar snang ba dang / rtsa'i mdog dmar po dang ser po dag gis khebs pa dang /
translated: The symptoms of jaundice caused by bile are: the appearance of a fever and so on, a yellow complexion of the skin, nails, and so on, the appearance of blue veins in the abdomen, and the veins being covered with red and yellow.

original: lus rdul zhing tsha ba dang bcas pas me ltar sreg par byed pa dang / ngad 'byung zhing du ba 'thul ba lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / reg na 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang / myur du smin cing tshos par mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: lus rdul zhing tsha ba dang bcas pas me ltar sreg par byed pa dang / ngad 'byung zhing du ba 'thul ba lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / reg na 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang / myur du smin cing tshos par mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: The body is burned by heat and dust as if by fire, and it emits a smell and appears to be smoking. It is smooth and soft to the touch, and it ripens quickly and is very sensitive.

original: nye bar gdung zhing bsreg par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: nye bar gdung zhing bsreg par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: It will be burned and tormented.

original: bad kan dmu rdzing lhu tshigs na //
analyzed: bad kan dmu rdzing lhu tshigs na //
translated: Phlegm-type goiters are in the joints,

original: tshor ba med cing skrang la lci //🔽gnyid che slon zhing yi ga 'chus //
analyzed: tshor ba med cing skrang la lci // gnyid che slon zhing yi ga 'chus //
translated: without sensation, swollen, and heavy.🔽There is much sleep, lethargy, and indigestion,

original: lud pa dbugs mi bde lpags sogs //
analyzed: lud pa dbugs mi bde lpags sogs //

original: skya zhing lto ba mkhrang la snum //
analyzed: skya zhing lto ba mkhrang la snum //
translated: The skin is pale, the belly is firm and oily,

original: rtsa yi ri mos khyab cing che //
analyzed: rtsa yi ri mos khyab cing che //
translated: and covered with veins.🔽It grows for a long time, is hard,

original: ring nas 'phel zhing sra ba dang // reg na grang zhing gsus pa lci //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ring nas 'phel zhing sra ba dang // reg na grang zhing gsus pa lci // zhes bya ba la /
translated: and feels cold to the touch, and the belly is heavy.

original: bad kan las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing ni yan lag gi lhu tshigs na zhing snyom pa dang / tshor ba med cing bem bem por 'gyur ba dang / skrang ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang / pags pa nas bshang gci'i bar du skya zhing dkar ba dang /
analyzed: bad kan las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing ni yan lag gi lhu tshigs na zhing snyom pa dang / tshor ba med cing bem bem por 'gyur ba dang / skrang ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang / pags pa nas bshang gci'i bar du skya zhing dkar ba dang /
translated: Phlegm-type goiters are in the joints of the limbs, are heavy and without sensation, and have the characteristics of being swollen, etc. The skin is pale and white up to the feces.

original: lto ba sra zhing rem rem por 'dug pa dang // rtsa ris kyi mdog skyabs khyab pa dang / che zhing sbom pa dang / ring zhig nas 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / rdo ltar sra ba dang / reg na grang zhing bsil ba dang /
analyzed: lto ba sra zhing rem rem por 'dug pa dang // rtsa ris kyi mdog skyabs khyab pa dang / che zhing sbom pa dang / ring zhig nas 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / rdo ltar sra ba dang / reg na grang zhing bsil ba dang /
translated: hard as stone, cold and cool to the touch,

original: gsus pa lci zhing brtan pa yin no //
analyzed: gsus pa lci zhing brtan pa yin no //
translated: and the belly is heavy and firm.

analyzed: gnas gsum 'khrugs pa de dang de //
translated: Those three places are disturbed.

original: bud med kyis byin dri ma rdul //
analyzed: bud med kyis byin dri ma rdul //
translated: The woman's discharge is dirty and dusty.

original: dbyig dug dug sogs kyis gnod 'gyur //
analyzed: dbyig dug dug sogs kyis gnod 'gyur //
translated: She is harmed by poison from snakes, scorpions, and so on.

original: khag bcas dri ma bsags pa ni //
analyzed: khag bcas dri ma bsags pa ni //
translated: The accumulated dirt of the fetus

original: ltor song gnod pa skyed byed de //🔽kha skam mgo 'khor brgyal bcas pa'i //
analyzed: ltor song gnod pa skyed byed de // kha skam mgo 'khor brgyal bcas pa'i //
translated: goes into the womb and produces harm.🔽With three signs - dry mouth, dizziness, and fainting -

original: @157a * // rtags gsum ldan pa'i dmu rdzing skyed //
analyzed: @157a * // rtags gsum ldan pa'i dmu rdzing skyed //
translated: it produces dropsy.

original: myur du smin cing mi bzad na //🔽de ni grang dang rlung dang char //
analyzed: myur du smin cing mi bzad na // de ni grang dang rlung dang char //
translated: If it quickly ripens and becomes unbearable,

original: phrad pas shin tu gnod par 'gyur //
analyzed: phrad pas shin tu gnod par 'gyur //
translated: it is greatly harmed by cold, wind, and rain.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: nad gzhi gsum char skyed par byed pa'i rgyu nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi'i skabs su bshad pa rnam pa mang po de dang de dag dang / de bzhin du bud med kyis dbang du byas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nad gzhi gsum char skyed par byed pa'i rgyu nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi'i skabs su bshad pa rnam pa mang po de dang de dag dang / de bzhin du bud med kyis dbang du byas pa'i phyir /
translated: The causes that generate all three humors are the many types of humors explained in the section on the humors of disease.🔽Likewise, because women are dominated by the humor of bile, they have hair and so on that is produced from the limbs of living beings, which removes dirt and dust.

original: srog chags kyi yan lag las byung ba'i skra la sogs pa dri ma dang rdul 'byin par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du dbyig dug dang dug la sogs pa byin pas gnod par gyur pas khrag dang bcas pa'i rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyi dri ma bsal zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lto bar song zhing /
analyzed: srog chags kyi yan lag las byung ba'i skra la sogs pa dri ma dang rdul 'byin par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du dbyig dug dang dug la sogs pa byin pas gnod par gyur pas khrag dang bcas pa'i rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyi dri ma bsal zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lto bar song zhing /
translated: Likewise, by giving poison, such as arsenic, and so on, the stains of diseases such as blood and wind increase and are removed by the harm of the poison entering the stomach.

original: phyin nas gnod pa'i nad skyed cing 'byung bar byed de /
analyzed: phyin nas gnod pa'i nad skyed cing 'byung bar byed de /
translated: Having entered, it generates and produces the harm of disease.

original: de kha skam pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dmu rdzing nad gzhi gsum gyi mtshan ma dang ldan pa skyed par byed pa de ni myur du smin zhing brnag par dka' bar mi bzad par na ba yin no //
analyzed: de kha skam pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dmu rdzing nad gzhi gsum gyi mtshan ma dang ldan pa skyed par byed pa de ni myur du smin zhing brnag par dka' bar mi bzad par na ba yin no //
translated: That which possesses dry mouth and so on, possessing the signs of the three humors, is quickly ripened, difficult to bear, and extremely painful.

original: yang dmu rdzing gi nad de ni grang ba la sogs pa dang phrad pas shin tu gnod cing nad 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dmu rdzing gi nad de ni grang ba la sogs pa dang phrad pas shin tu gnod cing nad 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, the disease of ascites is very harmful when one encounters cold and so forth, and the disease increases.

original: mang du zos pas bskyod pa dang // bzhon pa drag tu 'gro ba dang // las lam nyal po drags pas dub //
analyzed: mang du zos pas bskyod pa dang // bzhon pa drag tu 'gro ba dang // las lam nyal po drags pas dub //
translated: By eating a lot, by shaking, by riding a horse very fast, by excessive sexual intercourse, by fatigue,

original: skyug sman drags dang nad kyis skem //
analyzed: skyug sman drags dang nad kyis skem //
translated: by excessive emetics, and by wasting diseases.

original: g-yon logs gnas pa'i mcher pa ni //
analyzed: g-yon logs gnas pa'i mcher pa ni //
translated: The spleen, which is located on the left side,🔽moves from its place and increases, or by the blood being nourished by the lymph and so forth, it grows,

original: gnas las 'phos te 'phel ba dang // yang na dangs ma sogs pas khrag / rgyas byas de ni 'phel gyur dang // de ni gtun bu bzhin rab sra //
analyzed: gnas las 'phos te 'phel ba dang // yang na dangs ma sogs pas khrag / rgyas byas de ni 'phel gyur dang // de ni gtun bu bzhin rab sra //
translated: and it becomes very hard like a pestle.

original: de nas rus sbal rgyal 'dra bar //
analyzed: de nas rus sbal rgyal 'dra bar //
translated: Then, like the king of tortoises,

original: rim gyis 'phel bar 'gyur nas ni //
analyzed: rim gyis 'phel bar 'gyur nas ni //
translated: it gradually increases

original: lto bar dmu rdzing chags par byed //
analyzed: lto bar dmu rdzing chags par byed //
translated: and forms ascites in the abdomen.

original: lud pa dbugs mi bde skom dad //
analyzed: lud pa dbugs mi bde skom dad //
translated: Phlegm, dyspnea, thirst,

original: kha yis ro ni mi tshor zhing //
analyzed: kha yis ro ni mi tshor zhing //
translated: the mouth does not taste flavors,

original: lci zhing na la rims kyis 'debs //
analyzed: lci zhing na la rims kyis 'debs //
translated: it is heavy, painful, and has a fever.

original: sha mdog skya zhing mi sdug la //
analyzed: sha mdog skya zhing mi sdug la //
translated: The complexion is pale and unattractive,🔽and the body is weak.

original: brgyal zhing slon par byed pa dang // tsha zhing myos dang ldan par 'gyur //
analyzed: brgyal zhing slon par byed pa dang // tsha zhing myos dang ldan par 'gyur //
translated: heat, and intoxication.

original: rtsa mdog dmar ba'am mi sdug ba'am //
analyzed: rtsa mdog dmar ba'am mi sdug ba'am //
translated: The veins are red or unattractive,

original: sngo zhing ser la ri mor bcas //
analyzed: sngo zhing ser la ri mor bcas //
translated: blue, yellow, and striped.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: As for the many causes of spleen disorders, they are:🔽Overeating and overfilling the stomach,🔽riding horses, camels, and so on,🔽and going too fast,🔽being exhausted by work and travel, and so on.

original: mang du zos shing ha cang 'grangs drags pas bskyod pa dang / rta dang rnga mo la sogs pa'i bzhon pas @157b drag tu bskyod cing 'gro ba dang / las dang lam gyis dub pa la sogs pas g-yon logs na gnas pa'i mcher pa gnas las 'phos te 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: mang du zos shing ha cang 'grangs drags pas bskyod pa dang / rta dang rnga mo la sogs pa'i bzhon pas @157b drag tu bskyod cing 'gro ba dang / las dang lam gyis dub pa la sogs pas g-yon logs na gnas pa'i mcher pa gnas las 'phos te 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: These cause the spleen, which is located on the left side, to move from its place and increase and expand.

original: yang na dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams kyi khrag 'phel zhing rgyas par byas pa'i dbang gis mcher pa de 'phel bas gnas las 'phos pa'am /
analyzed: yang na dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams kyi khrag 'phel zhing rgyas par byas pa'i dbang gis mcher pa de 'phel bas gnas las 'phos pa'am /
translated: Alternatively, it is due to the increase and expansion of blood from the body constituents such as the nutritive essence that the spleen increases and moves from its place.

original: rang gi gnas nyid du 'phel bar gyur la /
analyzed: rang gi gnas nyid du 'phel bar gyur la /
translated: Or it increases in its own place.

original: de nas ni mcher pa de dang por gtun bu ltar sra bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de nas ni mcher pa de dang por gtun bu ltar sra bar 'gyur la /
translated: Then, that spleen first becomes as hard as a pestle.

original: de nas de'i 'og tu rus sbal gyi rgyab 'dra bar rim gyis 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur gyi cig car 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de nas de'i 'og tu rus sbal gyi rgyab 'dra bar rim gyis 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur gyi cig car 'gyur ba ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Then, after that, it gradually increases and expands like the back of a tortoise, but does not change suddenly.

original: de ltar lto bar dmu rdzing chags par 'byung par byed la de yang dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa nas rtsa ris sngo zhing ser ba'i bar du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar lto bar dmu rdzing chags par 'byung par byed la de yang dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa nas rtsa ris sngo zhing ser ba'i bar du 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, a dropsy of the abdomen occurs, and that also has symptoms from dyspnea up to blue and yellow veins.

original: de la rim gyis nad rnams ni //
analyzed: de la rim gyis nad rnams ni //
translated: In that, the diseases gradually🔽are obstructed feces, distended stomach,

original: bshang 'gags nad dang lto sbos dang // rmongs bag skom tsha rims kyis 'debs //🔽lus lci lto sra yi ga 'chus //
analyzed: bshang 'gags nad dang lto sbos dang // rmongs bag skom tsha rims kyis 'debs // lus lci lto sra yi ga 'chus //
translated: confusion, thirst, and fever.

original: zhes bya ba la /🔽mcher pa'i skran de la rlung la sogs pa'i nad rnams ni rim bzhin du bshang ba 'gags pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la / mcher pa'i skran de la rlung la sogs pa'i nad rnams ni rim bzhin du bshang ba 'gags pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The body is heavy, the stomach is hard, and there is indigestion.🔽In that, the diseases of wind and so forth are to be known as having the characteristics of obstructed feces and so forth in sequence.

original: de yang bshang ba 'gags pa dang na ba dang / lto sbos pa las ni rlung yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang bshang ba 'gags pa dang na ba dang / lto sbos pa las ni rlung yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, from obstructed feces, pain, and distended stomach, it should be known as wind.

original: rmongs bag dang skom dad tsha ba dang rims kyis 'debs pa las ni mkhris pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rmongs bag dang skom dad tsha ba dang rims kyis 'debs pa las ni mkhris pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know that fever, thirst, and contagious diseases are caused by bile.

original: lus lci ba dang lto sra ba dang yi ga 'chus pa las ni bad kan yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lus lci ba dang lto sra ba dang yi ga 'chus pa las ni bad kan yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know that heaviness of the body, distension of the stomach, and loss of appetite are caused by phlegm.

original: mcher ba lta bur mchin g-yas logs //
analyzed: mcher ba lta bur mchin g-yas logs //
translated: The spleen is to the right of the liver.

original: gnas 'phos dmu rdzing skyed ces bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gnas 'phos dmu rdzing skyed ces bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: When it moves and falls, it produces ascites.

original: ji ltar mcher ba g-yon logs na 'dug ste /
analyzed: ji ltar mcher ba g-yon logs na 'dug ste /
translated: Just as the liver is located to the left,

original: rgyu'i khyad par gyis 'phos shing lhung nas 'phel bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du mchin pa g-yas logs na gnas pa yang 'phos shing thur du lhung la 'phel bar gyur nas dmu rdzing skyed par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu'i khyad par gyis 'phos shing lhung nas 'phel bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du mchin pa g-yas logs na gnas pa yang 'phos shing thur du lhung la 'phel bar gyur nas dmu rdzing skyed par shes par bya'o //
translated: and when it moves and falls due to specific causes, it increases, so one should know that the spleen is located to the right, and when it moves and falls downward, it increases and produces ascites.

original: bya sgro spu dang bcas pa'i zas //
analyzed: bya sgro spu dang bcas pa'i zas //
translated: Food with feathers and hair

original: zos pas bshang lam gnas 'gags te //
analyzed: zos pas bshang lam gnas 'gags te //
translated: causes obstruction in the anus.

original: gzhang 'brum dang ni rtug skam dang // rgyu mar chags pa'i zas kyis kyang //
analyzed: gzhang 'brum dang ni rtug skam dang // rgyu mar chags pa'i zas kyis kyang //
translated: Hemorrhoids, constipation, and food that causes retention in the intestines

original: thur du sel ba'i rlung 'khrugs te //
analyzed: thur du sel ba'i rlung 'khrugs te //
translated: agitate the downward-clearing wind.

original: bshang bas bad mkhris @158a * //🔽bkag nas ni //
analyzed: bshang bas bad mkhris @158a * // bkag nas ni //
translated: phlegm,

original: lto bar dmu rdzing chags par byed //
analyzed: lto bar dmu rdzing chags par byed //
translated: causing a dropsy to form in the abdomen.

original: des ni tsha skom rims sbrid 'byung //
analyzed: des ni tsha skom rims sbrid 'byung //
translated: This produces fever, thirst, and a contagious disease.

original: lud pa dbugs mi bde brlan //
analyzed: lud pa dbugs mi bde brlan //
translated: The phlegm is moist and the breath is labored.

original: klad snying lte ba gzhang kha na //
analyzed: klad snying lte ba gzhang kha na //
translated: The brain, heart, navel, and anus

original: dri ma 'gags slon yi ga 'chus //
analyzed: dri ma 'gags slon yi ga 'chus //
translated: are blocked and swollen, and the appetite is impaired.

original: lto bar rlung ni 'khyims par byed //
analyzed: lto bar rlung ni 'khyims par byed //
translated: The wind in the abdomen becomes twisted.🔽It is firm, and the veins are blue-black,

original: brtan zhing rtsa ni sngo la smug / rtsa ris snang ba'am mi snang 'gyur //🔽phal cher lte ba'i 'og tu ni //
analyzed: brtan zhing rtsa ni sngo la smug / rtsa ris snang ba'am mi snang 'gyur // phal cher lte ba'i 'og tu ni //
translated: and the veins appear or disappear.🔽For the most part,🔽it occurs below the navel,

original: ba lang mjug 'dra 'byung bar 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ba lang mjug 'dra 'byung bar 'gyur // zhes bya ba la /
translated: like a cow’s tail.

original: bya sgro phra mo dang spu'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i zas zos shing longs spyad pas bshang ba'i lam gyi gnas 'gags shing 'byung du mi rung bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhang 'brum gyis gzhang 'gags par byas pa'am /
analyzed: bya sgro phra mo dang spu'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i zas zos shing longs spyad pas bshang ba'i lam gyi gnas 'gags shing 'byung du mi rung bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhang 'brum gyis gzhang 'gags par byas pa'am /
translated: As for that, by eating and consuming food with thin feathers and a collection of hairs, the place of the anus is blocked and cannot be released, and the hemorrhoids cause the anus to be blocked.

original: rgyu mar chags shing thogs par byed pa'i zas sran ma ma sha dang zar ma la sogs pa zos pas thur du sel ba'i rlung 'khrugs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyu mar chags shing thogs par byed pa'i zas sran ma ma sha dang zar ma la sogs pa zos pas thur du sel ba'i rlung 'khrugs par 'gyur te /
translated: The downward-clearing wind is disturbed, and it stops the feces and so forth.

original: bshang ba la sogs pas bkag nas lto sra bar dmu rdzing chags par gyur te /
analyzed: bshang ba la sogs pas bkag nas lto sra bar dmu rdzing chags par gyur te /
translated: The stomach becomes hard and the person develops ascites.

original: ltor 'khyil zhing dri ma 'gags pa'i dmu rdzing des nad pa la tsha zhing skom pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / lto bar rlung 'khyims te rlung phyir 'byung bar mi byed cing nang du 'khyil bar byed pa dang / brtan pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /
analyzed: ltor 'khyil zhing dri ma 'gags pa'i dmu rdzing des nad pa la tsha zhing skom pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / lto bar rlung 'khyims te rlung phyir 'byung bar mi byed cing nang du 'khyil bar byed pa dang / brtan pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /
translated: The ascites swirl in the stomach and block the impurities. The person develops a fever, thirst, and so forth. The wind swirls in the stomach and does not allow the wind to come out. It swirls inside. It has the characteristics of being stable and so forth.

original: yang dmu rdzing de ni phal cher mang du lte ba'i 'og tu dbyibs ba lang gi mjug ma 'dra bar 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dmu rdzing de ni phal cher mang du lte ba'i 'og tu dbyibs ba lang gi mjug ma 'dra bar 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, the ascites mostly occur and develop below the navel in the shape of a cow's tail.

original: rus sogs zug rngur bcas pa'i zas //
analyzed: rus sogs zug rngur bcas pa'i zas //
translated: Food that causes pain in the bones and so forth

original: zos sam shin tu drag zos pa //🔽rgyu ma rdol lam gas gyur nas //
analyzed: zos sam shin tu drag zos pa //🔽rgyu ma rdol lam gas gyur nas //
translated: is eaten or eaten too much.🔽The intestines burst or split open.

original: bu ga de nas ma zhu bar //
analyzed: bu ga de nas ma zhu bar //
translated: The undigested food flows out through that hole.

original: spyir 'dzag bshang lam las 'byung zhing //
analyzed: spyir 'dzag bshang lam las 'byung zhing //
translated: In general, it comes out through the anus.

original: bshang bcas nyung shas nyung shas ni //
analyzed: bshang bcas nyung shas nyung shas ni //
translated: But a little bit, together with feces,

original: sha rul lta bur mnam pa ni //
analyzed: sha rul lta bur mnam pa ni //
translated: smells like rotting flesh,

original: sbyin bag dmar ser 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sbyin bag dmar ser 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: and comes out reddish-yellow like vomit.

original: lhag ma yis ni lto ba 'gengs //
analyzed: lhag ma yis ni lto ba 'gengs //
translated: The rest fills the belly.

original: dmu rdzing mi bzad skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dmu rdzing mi bzad skye bar 'gyur //
translated: An unbearable dropsy develops.

original: de ni lte ba man chad rgyas //
analyzed: de ni lte ba man chad rgyas //
translated: That extends from the navel down.

original: chus gang lta bur myur du 'gyur //
analyzed: chus gang lta bur myur du 'gyur //
translated: It quickly becomes like it is filled with water.

original: nad kyi tshul ni shas cher ldan //
analyzed: nad kyi tshul ni shas cher ldan //
translated: It is mostly in the form of a disease.

original: dbugs mi bde skam mgo 'khor khyab //
analyzed: dbugs mi bde skam mgo 'khor khyab //
translated: It is dyspnea, dry, dizzy, and pervasive.

original: rgyu rdol dmu rdzing zhes bshad de //🔽gzhan dag rgyu ma 'dzag ces zer //
analyzed: rgyu rdol dmu rdzing zhes bshad de // gzhan dag rgyu ma 'dzag ces zer //
translated: It is explained as “dropsy with a hole,”

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: but others say “leaking intestines.”

original: rus pa dang rtsa dang tsher ma dang rdo dang rva dang shing gi tshal ba la sogs pa'i @158b zas zug rngu dang bcas pa'i kha zas zos par gyur pa'am /
analyzed: rus pa dang rtsa dang tsher ma dang rdo dang rva dang shing gi tshal ba la sogs pa'i @158b zas zug rngu dang bcas pa'i kha zas zos par gyur pa'am /
translated: Here, one eats food with splinters, such as bones, veins, thorns, stones, shards of horn, and shards of wood.

original: yang na shin tu drag cing shas cher zos pas gang gi rgyu ma rdol cing bu ga dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang / gas par gyur nas rdol ba'am /
analyzed: yang na shin tu drag cing shas cher zos pas gang gi rgyu ma rdol cing bu ga dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang / gas par gyur nas rdol ba'am /
translated: Or, if one eats very strongly and excessively, the intestines may burst and become full of holes.

original: gas ba'i bu ga de nas phyir 'dzag cing zas ma zhu ba kho nar phyir 'dzag par gyur cing bshang ba'i lam nas 'byung bar byed la /
analyzed: gas ba'i bu ga de nas phyir 'dzag cing zas ma zhu ba kho nar phyir 'dzag par gyur cing bshang ba'i lam nas 'byung bar byed la /
translated: After they have burst, the food comes out through the holes and is excreted through the anus without being digested.

original: de yang bshang ba dang bcas par nyung shas nyung shas 'byung zhing /
analyzed: de yang bshang ba dang bcas par nyung shas nyung shas 'byung zhing /
translated: Moreover, a little bit of it comes out together with feces.

original: 'byung ba de yang sha rul te mi ro'i dri ltar shin tu mnam par 'byung zhing /
analyzed: 'byung ba de yang sha rul te mi ro'i dri ltar shin tu mnam par 'byung zhing /
translated: It comes out with a very bad smell, like the smell of a corpse.

original: shing shal ma li'i thang chu ltar sbyin zhing 'byar bag tu gnas pa la /
analyzed: shing shal ma li'i thang chu ltar sbyin zhing 'byar bag tu gnas pa la /
translated: It is sticky like the sap of a shalmali tree.

original: mdog dmar zhing rtsa ser bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mdog dmar zhing rtsa ser bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It is red in color and has yellow veins.

original: bshang ba'i lam las byung ba'i lhag mas ni lto ba 'gengs shing rgyas par byas nas dmu rdzing gi nad mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: bshang ba'i lam las byung ba'i lhag mas ni lto ba 'gengs shing rgyas par byas nas dmu rdzing gi nad mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur la /
translated: The remaining food that comes out through the anus fills and expands the belly, causing a severe and difficult-to-treat ascites.

original: dmu rdzing de ni lte ba man chad rgyas shing 'phel bar 'gyur la ;
analyzed: dmu rdzing de ni lte ba man chad rgyas shing 'phel bar 'gyur la ;
translated: The ascites expands and increases from the navel down.

original: / de yang lto ba chus gang ba lta bu'i dmu rdzing du myur zhing ring por mi thogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / de yang lto ba chus gang ba lta bu'i dmu rdzing du myur zhing ring por mi thogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: It quickly and rapidly becomes like a bag of water in the belly.

original: de ni nad kyi tshul shas che zhing nad kyi rtags stobs dang ldan pa'i tshabs po che dang ldan pa yin la /
analyzed: de ni nad kyi tshul shas che zhing nad kyi rtags stobs dang ldan pa'i tshabs po che dang ldan pa yin la /
translated: It is a serious illness with strong signs and symptoms.

original: dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pas kyang khyab cing zil gyis mnan pa yin no //
analyzed: dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pas kyang khyab cing zil gyis mnan pa yin no //
translated: It is pervaded and overwhelmed by dyspnea and so on.

original: dmu rdzing de ni rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dmu rdzing de ni rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing zhes bya'o //
translated: That ascites is called a ruptured intestine ascites.

original: zhes slob dpon gyis bshad do //
analyzed: zhes slob dpon gyis bshad do //
translated: Thus it is explained by the master.

original: drang srong gzhan dag ni dmu rdzing de yongs su 'dzag pa'i dmu rdzing zhes bya'o //
analyzed: drang srong gzhan dag ni dmu rdzing de yongs su 'dzag pa'i dmu rdzing zhes bya'o //
translated: Other sages say that ascites is called a leaking ascites.

original: zhes zer ro //
analyzed: zhes zer ro //
translated: Thus they say.

original: snum 'thungs la sogs byas nas ni //
analyzed: snum 'thungs la sogs byas nas ni //
translated: After consuming oil and so on,

original: 'phral du chu grang 'thungs pa'am //
analyzed: 'phral du chu grang 'thungs pa'am //
translated: immediately drinking cold water,

original: me drod bri ba'am ha cang ni //
analyzed: me drod bri ba'am ha cang ni //
translated: or reducing the heat of fire,

original: skom pas chu 'thungs drags pa'am //
analyzed: skom pas chu 'thungs drags pa'am //
translated: or drinking too much water out of excessive thirst,

original: rlung dang bad kan 'khrugs chur 'dres //
analyzed: rlung dang bad kan 'khrugs chur 'dres //
translated: Wind and phlegm are disturbed and mix with water.

original: chu yi lam ni bkag gyur pas //
analyzed: chu yi lam ni bkag gyur pas //
translated: The water passage is blocked.

original: de nyid gnas der 'phel bar 'gyur //🔽de 'og dmu rdzing gyur pa yin //
analyzed: de nyid gnas der 'phel bar 'gyur // de 'og dmu rdzing gyur pa yin //
translated: It increases right there in that place.🔽After that, it becomes a bladder of dropsy.

original: de nas dmu rdzing de las ni //🔽skom dad rkub tu chu 'dzag bcas //
analyzed: de nas dmu rdzing de las ni // skom dad rkub tu chu 'dzag bcas //
translated: Then, from that bladder of dropsy,🔽thirst is suppressed and urine drips from the anus.

original: dbugs mi bde lud yi ga 'chus //
analyzed: dbugs mi bde lud yi ga 'chus //
translated: There is dyspnea, mucus, and loss of appetite.

original: sna tshogs mdog ldan rtsa yis khyab //
analyzed: sna tshogs mdog ldan rtsa yis khyab //
translated: It is covered with veins of various colors.

original: rkyal ba chus gang reg pa 'dra //
analyzed: rkyal ba chus gang reg pa 'dra //
translated: It is like being touched by a water-filled bag.

original: bskyod na sgra grag lus 'dar la //
analyzed: bskyod na sgra grag lus 'dar la //
translated: When moved, there is sound, the body trembles,

original: dmu rdzing chen pos che zhing snum //
analyzed: dmu rdzing chen pos che zhing snum //
translated: and the great bladder of dropsy is large and oily.

original: brtan zhing de ni lte ba zlum //
analyzed: brtan zhing de ni lte ba zlum //
translated: It is stable and its navel is round.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: As for that,

original: mi gang zhig snum @159a * //
analyzed: mi gang zhig snum @159a * //
translated: a person who has consumed oil

original: 'thungs par gyur pa dang / sogs pa zhes bya ba smos pas skyug sman dang / bkru sman la sogs pa byas shing btang zin pa'i rjes la 'phral du ste ring po ma lon pa nyid du chu grang bskol ba ma yin pa 'thungs pa dang /
analyzed: 'thungs par gyur pa dang / sogs pa zhes bya ba smos pas skyug sman dang / bkru sman la sogs pa byas shing btang zin pa'i rjes la 'phral du ste ring po ma lon pa nyid du chu grang bskol ba ma yin pa 'thungs pa dang /
translated: and so on, by mentioning and so on, it refers to emetics, purgatives, and so forth, who has vomited and passed them, immediately afterwards, not long after, drinks cold water that is not boiled.

original: yang na chu grang la sogs pa 'thungs drags pas pho ba'i me drod bri zhing nyams pa dang / yang na ha cang skom ches pa ste /
analyzed: yang na chu grang la sogs pa 'thungs drags pas pho ba'i me drod bri zhing nyams pa dang / yang na ha cang skom ches pa ste /
translated: Or, it is possible that the heat of the stomach fire has diminished and declined due to drinking too much cold water and so forth.

original: zas bcad pa la sogs pas rus pa dang rgyus pa tsam lus par gyur pas chu 'thungs drags te /
analyzed: zas bcad pa la sogs pas rus pa dang rgyus pa tsam lus par gyur pas chu 'thungs drags te /
translated: Or, it is possible that one has drunk too much water because one has become extremely thirsty due to fasting and so forth, and only bones and sinews remain.

original: gnod pa de'i rgyus rlung 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur ba dang / bad kan kyang 'khrugs par gyur nas chu rgyu ba'i lam gyi rgyun srang bkag cing /
analyzed: gnod pa de'i rgyus rlung 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur ba dang / bad kan kyang 'khrugs par gyur nas chu rgyu ba'i lam gyi rgyun srang bkag cing /
translated: Due to the cause of that harm, the wind is disturbed and arises, and also phlegm is disturbed and blocks the passage of the water channels.

original: rlung dang bad kan de gnyis lto bar gnas shing chu de nyid der gnas shed de las 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur bas /
analyzed: rlung dang bad kan de gnyis lto bar gnas shing chu de nyid der gnas shed de las 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur bas /
translated: Those two, wind and phlegm, remain in the stomach and that water itself remains there and increases.

original: de'i 'og tu chu'i dmu rdzing du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu chu'i dmu rdzing du gyur pa yin no //
translated: After that, it becomes a water bladder.

original: de nas de'i 'og tu dmu rdzing de skom dad la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rkyal pa chus gang ba la reg pa dang 'dra bar chu'i dmu rdzing de phan tshun bskyod na sgra grag pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa dang /
analyzed: de nas de'i 'og tu dmu rdzing de skom dad la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rkyal pa chus gang ba la reg pa dang 'dra bar chu'i dmu rdzing de phan tshun bskyod na sgra grag pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa dang /
translated: Then, after that, the water-bubble will be endowed with thirst and so forth, and when the water-bubble is stirred, like touching a full bag of water, it will make a sound and so forth.

original: lte ba kun nas zlum zhing 'khyil ba'i rang bzhin can du gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: lte ba kun nas zlum zhing 'khyil ba'i rang bzhin can du gnas pa yin no //
translated: It abides with the nature of being completely round and coiled at the navel.

original: thams cad yal bar bor na ni //
analyzed: thams cad yal bar bor na ni //
translated: If all is abandoned,

original: nad ni rang gnas las 'phos te //🔽smin pas sla zhing zag 'gyur ba //
analyzed: nad ni rang gnas las 'phos te // smin pas sla zhing zag 'gyur ba //
translated: the illness moves from its own place,🔽and because it ripens, it becomes fluid.

original: tshigs dang rtsa sgo las kyang 'dzag / phyi yi rtsa sgo nas rdul 'byung //
analyzed: tshigs dang rtsa sgo las kyang 'dzag / phyi yi rtsa sgo nas rdul 'byung //
translated: It oozes from the joints and the openings of the channels.

original: 'gags nas thad kar 'khyil zhing gnas //🔽chu de nyid ni 'phel 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: 'gags nas thad kar 'khyil zhing gnas // chu de nyid ni 'phel 'gyur zhing //
translated: When it is blocked, it coils straight up.🔽That water increases

original: sbyin bag gyur nas de'i tshe ni //
analyzed: sbyin bag gyur nas de'i tshe ni //
translated: and, when it becomes loose, at that time

original: lto ba lci zhing sra la zlum //
analyzed: lto ba lci zhing sra la zlum //
translated: the belly becomes heavy, hard, and round.

original: brdabs na sgra ni mi 'byung zhing //
analyzed: brdabs na sgra ni mi 'byung zhing //
translated: When it is struck, no sound occurs.

original: mdog 'jam rtsa ris mi snang la //
analyzed: mdog 'jam rtsa ris mi snang la //
translated: The color is smooth, and the veins do not appear.

original: lto ba dang ni rgyab du 'gro //
analyzed: lto ba dang ni rgyab du 'gro //
translated: It moves to the belly and the back.

original: de rjes chu yi dmu rdzing skye //
analyzed: de rjes chu yi dmu rdzing skye //
translated: Thereafter, a dropsy of chhuser develops.

original: lto bar 'phel zhing de las lhag / rtsa nub gyur pa'i dmu chu ni //🔽dmu rdzing bshad pa'i mtshan nyid ldan //
analyzed: lto bar 'phel zhing de las lhag / rtsa nub gyur pa'i dmu chu ni // dmu rdzing bshad pa'i mtshan nyid ldan //
translated: If it increases in the abdomen, it is called “dropsy of chhuser”.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: The signs and symptoms of this are as described in the chapter on dropsy.

original: dmu rdzing de thams cad kyang yal bar bor zhing gso ba ma byas na /
analyzed: dmu rdzing de thams cad kyang yal bar bor zhing gso ba ma byas na /
translated: If all these types of dropsy are neglected and not treated,

original: rlung la sogs pa'i nad rang gi gnas nas 'phos nas rang gi gnas spangs te /
analyzed: rlung la sogs pa'i nad rang gi gnas nas 'phos nas rang gi gnas spangs te /
translated: the humors such as loong will move from their own locations and abandon their own sites.

original: smin cing gsher bas sla zhing rnag zag par byed par 'gyur bas tshigs dang rtsa'i sgo nas kyang zag cing 'byung bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: smin cing gsher bas sla zhing rnag zag par byed par 'gyur bas tshigs dang rtsa'i sgo nas kyang zag cing 'byung bar 'gyur la /
translated: Since they are ripe and moist, they will become soft and pus will drain out through the joints and channels.

original: phyi @159b rol gyi rtsa'i sgo ba spu'i bu gnas rdul 'byung ba 'gags shing 'byung du mi ster bas /
analyzed: phyi @159b rol gyi rtsa'i sgo ba spu'i bu gnas rdul 'byung ba 'gags shing 'byung du mi ster bas /
translated: The external channel openings and the pores of the skin will be blocked and will not allow the pus to drain out.

original: thad kar 'khyil cing yan lag tu 'gro bas gnas la sngar gnas pa'i chu de nyid 'phel zhing sogs par byas nas sbyin bag tu byed la /
analyzed: thad kar 'khyil cing yan lag tu 'gro bas gnas la sngar gnas pa'i chu de nyid 'phel zhing sogs par byas nas sbyin bag tu byed la /
translated: The pus will accumulate directly and spread to the limbs. The water that was previously located in its own site will increase and overflow, causing edema.

original: de nas de'i 'og tu de'i tshe lto ba de lci ba la sogs par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de nas de'i 'og tu de'i tshe lto ba de lci ba la sogs par 'gyur la /
translated: Then, after that, at that time, the belly becomes heavy and so on.

original: lag pas brdabs na yang sgra mi 'byung ba la sogs par 'gyur la /
analyzed: lag pas brdabs na yang sgra mi 'byung ba la sogs par 'gyur la /
translated: Even when struck with the hand, there is no sound and so on.

original: de nas de'i rjes la dmu rdzing der chu'i dmu rdzing 'byung bar 'gyur zhing skye bar 'gyur te chu de lto bar lci zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / rtsa rnams nub cing mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / chu'i dmu rdzing bshang ba'i mtshan nyid //
analyzed: de nas de'i rjes la dmu rdzing der chu'i dmu rdzing 'byung bar 'gyur zhing skye bar 'gyur te chu de lto bar lci zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / rtsa rnams nub cing mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / chu'i dmu rdzing bshang ba'i mtshan nyid //
translated: Then, after that, the water bladder arises and develops in that place, and that water becomes heavy and distended in the belly, the channels sink and disappear, and the water bladder has the characteristics of feces.

original: skom dad rkub tu chu 'dzag bcas //
analyzed: skom dad rkub tu chu 'dzag bcas //
translated: Thirst is stopped by urine dripping into the anus.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //🔽rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan mcher //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro // rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan mcher //
translated: And so on.

original: 'dus pa'i chu yi dmu rdzing rnams //
analyzed: 'dus pa'i chu yi dmu rdzing rnams //
translated: The water bladders of wind, bile, and phlegm

original: phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka' //
analyzed: phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka' //
translated: are difficult to treat like the later ones.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: rlung la sogs pa'i dmu rdzing ni phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka' ba yin te /
analyzed: rlung la sogs pa'i dmu rdzing ni phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka' ba yin te /
translated: the water bladders of wind and so on are difficult to treat like the later ones.

original: rlung gi dmu rdzing bas ni mkhris pa'i dmu rdzing gso bar dka' ba yin la /🔽de bas ni bad kan gyi dmu rdzing gso bar dka' bas na /
analyzed: rlung gi dmu rdzing bas ni mkhris pa'i dmu rdzing gso bar dka' ba yin la / de bas ni bad kan gyi dmu rdzing gso bar dka' bas na /
translated: The bile-humor goiter is more difficult to cure than the wind-humor goiter.🔽And the phlegm-humor goiter is more difficult to cure than the bile-humor goiter.

original: chu'i dmu rdzing ni shin tu gso bar dka' ba yin no //
analyzed: chu'i dmu rdzing ni shin tu gso bar dka' ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the water-humor goiter is very difficult to cure.

original: gzhan dag phal cher zla phyed gsod //🔽ces bya ba la /
analyzed: gzhan dag phal cher zla phyed gsod // ces bya ba la /
translated: Most of the others kill in half a month.

original: dmu rdzing de las gzhan pa gnyis po dri ma 'gags pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing dang / rgyu ma rdol ba las byung ba'i dmu rdzing dag ni phal cher te mang du zla ba phyed lon pa dang nad pa de gsod cing 'joms par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dmu rdzing de las gzhan pa gnyis po dri ma 'gags pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing dang / rgyu ma rdol ba las byung ba'i dmu rdzing dag ni phal cher te mang du zla ba phyed lon pa dang nad pa de gsod cing 'joms par byed pa yin no //
translated: The two goiters other than that, the goiter arisen from obstructed impurities and the goiter arisen from a burst intestine, kill and destroy the patient after mostly half a month.

original: thams cad chur gyur 'chi ltas le'u //🔽las bshad bla brnan ldan pa'ang gsod //
analyzed: thams cad chur gyur 'chi ltas le'u // las bshad bla brnan ldan pa'ang gsod //
translated: All of them become water. The chapter on the signs of death

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: is explained. The one with the additional head also kills.

original: dmu rdzing thams cad de rlung las gyur pa la sogs pa kun kyang chur skyes pa ste /
analyzed: dmu rdzing thams cad de rlung las gyur pa la sogs pa kun kyang chur skyes pa ste /
translated: All of them, the wind-humor goiter and so forth, become water.

original: chu'i dmu rdzing du gyur pa dang / de bzhin du 'chi ltas las bshad pa'i bla brnan dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: chu'i dmu rdzing du gyur pa dang / de bzhin du 'chi ltas las bshad pa'i bla brnan dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The same is true of the “water-bladder” disease, and also of the “brain-disease” mentioned in the Signs of Death.

original: sna dang mig dang mtshan ma yo //
analyzed: sna dang mig dang mtshan ma yo //
translated: “The nose, the eyes, and the signs are destroyed.🔽”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dmu rdzing yang gsod pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dmu rdzing yang gsod pa yin no //
translated: The “water-bladder” disease is also fatal.

original: skyes nas dmu rdzing gyur pa dag / phal cher gso bar dka' bar bshad //
analyzed: skyes nas dmu rdzing gyur pa dag / phal cher gso bar dka' bar bshad //
translated: “The ‘water-bladder’ disease that occurs after birth is usually hard to cure.

original: stobs ldan chur ni ma gyur zhing //
analyzed: stobs ldan chur ni ma gyur zhing //
translated: If it is not too strong,

original: gsar du byung ba 'bad pas gso //
analyzed: gsar du byung ba 'bad pas gso //
translated: and if it is new, it can be cured with effort.

original: @160a * // zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: @160a * // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The first of these is the one that is being discussed here.🔽

original: skyes nas byung ba'i dmu rdzing du gyur pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gso bar dka' ba yin no //
analyzed: skyes nas byung ba'i dmu rdzing du gyur pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gso bar dka' ba yin no //
translated: The “water-bladder” disease that occurs after birth is hard to cure.

original: mi stobs dang ldan zhing na tshod dar la bab pa la dam rdzing de skyes par gyur cing /
analyzed: mi stobs dang ldan zhing na tshod dar la bab pa la dam rdzing de skyes par gyur cing /
translated: If it occurs in a strong person, in the prime of life,

original: chur ma gyur te gsar du byung ba dag ni gsor rung mod kyi /
analyzed: chur ma gyur te gsar du byung ba dag ni gsor rung mod kyi /
translated: and if it is not too strong, and if it is new, it can be cured.

original: spyir gso bar dka' ba'i nad yin pas 'bad pa dang ldan pa kho nas gso bar bya'o //
analyzed: spyir gso bar dka' ba'i nad yin pas 'bad pa dang ldan pa kho nas gso bar bya'o //
translated: But since it is a disease that is generally hard to cure, it should be treated only by someone who is very diligent.

original: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
analyzed: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
translated: The Moonlight on the Meaning of the Words, a commentary on the essence of the eight branches,

original: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las /
analyzed: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las /
translated: composed by the master Candranandana.

original: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on chapter twelve, the chapter on the site of the disease.

original: // / de nas skya rbab dang 'or nad dang me dbal gyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: // / de nas skya rbab dang 'or nad dang me dbal gyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o //
translated: Now, the site of the disease of dropsy, abscesses, and erysipelas will be explained.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: dmu rdzing gi nad gzhi'i 'og tu skya rbab kyi nad gzhi bshad pa ni /
analyzed: dmu rdzing gi nad gzhi'i 'og tu skya rbab kyi nad gzhi bshad pa ni /
translated: The site of the disease of dropsy is explained after the site of the disease of dropsy.

original: dmu rdzing gi nad skyes na skya rbab la sogs pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur bas /
analyzed: dmu rdzing gi nad skyes na skya rbab la sogs pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur bas /
translated: When the disease of dropsy arises, dropsy and so forth also occur.

original: de'i phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this chapter is composed.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i nad 'khrugs pas //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i nad 'khrugs pas //
translated: When the disturbed humors explained above

original: mkhris pa lhag par ldang gyur la //
analyzed: mkhris pa lhag par ldang gyur la //
translated: cause an excess of bile to arise,

original: de la rlung ni stobs che bas //
analyzed: de la rlung ni stobs che bas //
translated: and the wind there has great strength,

original: snying la gnas pa'i mkhris pa ni //
analyzed: snying la gnas pa'i mkhris pa ni //
translated: the bile residing in the heart

original: gtor te rtsa chen bcu'i nang bkram //
analyzed: gtor te rtsa chen bcu'i nang bkram //
translated: is scattered and distributed within the ten major channels.

original: lus kun la ni khyab gyur pas //
analyzed: lus kun la ni khyab gyur pas //
translated: As it spreads throughout the body,

original: bad kan pags pa sha khrag la //
analyzed: bad kan pags pa sha khrag la //
translated: The kapha is located in the skin, flesh, and blood.

original: gnod byas bar du gnas nas ni //
analyzed: gnod byas bar du gnas nas ni //
translated: It is located in the middle, causing harm.

original: sha dang pags pa de dag las //
analyzed: sha dang pags pa de dag las //
translated: From the flesh and skin,

original: lpags mdog tha dad dkar ba dang // ser zhing ljang sngon byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: lpags mdog tha dad dkar ba dang // ser zhing ljang sngon byed par 'gyur //
translated: the skin color becomes different, white, yellow, and blue-green.

original: de las skya ba'i shas che bas //
analyzed: de las skya ba'i shas che bas //
translated: From that, there is a predominance of pallor.

original: de phyir skya rbab nad ces bshad //
analyzed: de phyir skya rbab nad ces bshad //
translated: Therefore, it is explained as the disease of pallor.

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: In this verse,

original: nad rnams ji skad bshad pa'i kha ba dang tsha ba dang mngar ba la sogs pa'i nad gzhi ldang ba'i rgyus 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: nad rnams ji skad bshad pa'i kha ba dang tsha ba dang mngar ba la sogs pa'i nad gzhi ldang ba'i rgyus 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur la /
translated: the diseases arise and become agitated by the causes of the arising of diseases such as the described cold, hot, sweet, and so forth.

original: mkhris pa lhag par shas che bar ldang zhing 'khrugs par gyur na skya rbab kyi nad skyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mkhris pa lhag par shas che bar ldang zhing 'khrugs par gyur na skya rbab kyi nad skyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the bile becomes excessively agitated and disturbed, it gives rise to the disease of pallor.

original: de la nad de rnams kyi nang nas rlung gi nad gang yin pa de ni stobs dang nus pa shin tu che ba yin pas /
