analyzed: de la nad de rnams kyi nang nas rlung gi nad gang yin pa de ni stobs dang nus pa shin tu che ba yin pas /
translated: Among those diseases, whatever is a wind disease has very great strength and power.

original: snying gar gnas pa'i mkhris pa gang yin pa de gtor zhing byer bar byed la /
analyzed: snying gar gnas pa'i mkhris pa gang yin pa de gtor zhing byer bar byed la /
translated: It scatters and disperses the bile that is located in the heart.

original: des na mkhris pa de snying la brten pa'i rtsa bo che bcur bkram zhing phyin par byas nas lus ma lus ba kun la khyab cing byer @160b bar gyur nas bad kan la sogs pa la gnod par byas nas /
analyzed: des na mkhris pa de snying la brten pa'i rtsa bo che bcur bkram zhing phyin par byas nas lus ma lus ba kun la khyab cing byer @160b bar gyur nas bad kan la sogs pa la gnod par byas nas /
translated: Therefore, the bile spreads and moves into the ten great channels that support the heart, and having spread and moved there, it pervades and spreads throughout the entire body, and having harmed the phlegm and so forth,

original: de pags pa dang sha gnyis kyi bar du gnas te /
analyzed: de pags pa dang sha gnyis kyi bar du gnas te /
translated: it remains between the skin and flesh.

original: mkhris pa de pags pa'i mdog rnam pa tha dad cing du mar gyur pa skya zhing dkar ba dang ser po dang ljang sngon du byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mkhris pa de pags pa'i mdog rnam pa tha dad cing du mar gyur pa skya zhing dkar ba dang ser po dang ljang sngon du byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: The color of that bile becomes various and manifold, making the skin pale, white, yellow, and blue-green.

original: mdog de dag las gang gi phyir skya zhing dkar ba'i shas che bas na rgyu de'i phyir nad de la skya rbab kyi nad ces bya'o zhes drang srong dag gis bshad do //
analyzed: mdog de dag las gang gi phyir skya zhing dkar ba'i shas che bas na rgyu de'i phyir nad de la skya rbab kyi nad ces bya'o zhes drang srong dag gis bshad do //
translated: Because of those colors, and especially because of the pale white, the sages explain that the disease is called ascites.🔽That disease makes the body heavy,

original: nad des lus ni lci ba dang // lus zungs rnams ni lhod pa dang // mdangs kyi yon tan zad gyur cing //
analyzed: nad des lus ni lci ba dang // lus zungs rnams ni lhod pa dang // mdangs kyi yon tan zad gyur cing //
translated: and the body constituents slack, and the good qualities of radiance are exhausted.

original: de las khrag dang tshil chung ste //
analyzed: de las khrag dang tshil chung ste //
translated: From that, blood and fat decrease,

original: snying po med cing dbang po lhod //
analyzed: snying po med cing dbang po lhod //
translated: and the body becomes insubstantial and the faculties slack.

original: yan lag brdungs pa snyam byed cing //
analyzed: yan lag brdungs pa snyam byed cing //
translated: One feels as if one's limbs are being beaten,

original: snying ni zag pa snyam du sems //
analyzed: snying ni zag pa snyam du sems //
translated: and one's heart is being drained.

original: mig phugs skrang zhing nyams la na //
analyzed: mig phugs skrang zhing nyams la na //
translated: The eyes become swollen and sunken,🔽one drools, one's voice is weak,

original: mchil mang skad gdangs dma' ba dang // zas mi 'dod cing grang mi bzod //
analyzed: mchil mang skad gdangs dma' ba dang // zas mi 'dod cing grang mi bzod //
translated: one has no appetite for food, and one cannot tolerate cold.🔽The body hair is rough, one's body heat decreases,

original: spu 'byi me drod nyams pa dang // ro smad 'bying zhing rims kyis 'debs //
analyzed: spu 'byi me drod nyams pa dang // ro smad 'bying zhing rims kyis 'debs //
translated: one's lower body sinks, and one is afflicted by fever.

original: dbugs mi bde zhing rna sgra 'bod //
analyzed: dbugs mi bde zhing rna sgra 'bod //
translated: One has difficulty breathing and one's ears ring.

original: mgo 'khor ngal bar byed pa yin //
analyzed: mgo 'khor ngal bar byed pa yin //
translated: One's head spins and one becomes exhausted.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: This is what is meant.

original: skya rbab kyi nad des lus kyi khong lci ba dang // dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs lhod cing gcig tu 'dus pa zhig pa dang / mdangs kyi yon tan gang dag yod pa de zad cing nyams par 'gyur ba dang / rgyu de dag gis mi'i khrag dang tshil chung ba la sogs par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: skya rbab kyi nad des lus kyi khong lci ba dang // dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs lhod cing gcig tu 'dus pa zhig pa dang / mdangs kyi yon tan gang dag yod pa de zad cing nyams par 'gyur ba dang / rgyu de dag gis mi'i khrag dang tshil chung ba la sogs par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: This ascites disease causes heaviness in the body, looseness and disintegration of the bodily constituents such as the refined elements, and the exhaustion and deterioration of any good qualities of radiance. Due to these causes, one's blood and fat decrease, and so on.

original: snying po ni lus kyi stobs la bya ste de med par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po'i tshogs rnams lhod cing bya ba'i sbyar ba las nyams pa dang / lag ngar la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams brdungs pa snyam du sems pa dang / na bar 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: snying po ni lus kyi stobs la bya ste de med par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po'i tshogs rnams lhod cing bya ba'i sbyar ba las nyams pa dang / lag ngar la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams brdungs pa snyam du sems pa dang / na bar 'gyur ba dang /
translated: The collection of faculties becomes loose and loses its application to action. The limbs, such as the arms, feel as if they have been beaten.

original: snying zag cing 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang / mig gi phugs skrang zhing glo ba dang / mig nyams shing mi sdug pa dang / mchil ma mang ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / ro smad 'bying zhing nang du zhum par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: snying zag cing 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang / mig gi phugs skrang zhing glo ba dang / mig nyams shing mi sdug pa dang / mchil ma mang ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / ro smad 'bying zhing nang du zhum par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: The heart is filled with phlegm and disturbed. The eyes become swollen and the chest congested. The eyes become impaired and unattractive. One has an abundance of saliva and so forth. The lower body sinks and becomes depressed.

original: de bzhin du rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa 'byung bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa 'byung bar shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that these occur in the order of the arising of the fever and so forth.

original: de ni nad gzhi tha dad 'dus //
analyzed: de ni nad gzhi tha dad 'dus //
translated: That is the combination of different illnesses.

original: sa zhag zos las rnam ldar 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sa zhag zos las rnam ldar 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba la /
translated: It arises from eating earth and grease.

original: skya rbab kyi nad de rnam pa lnga yod de nad gzhi tha dad pa las gyur pa gsum dang / gsum char @161a * //
analyzed: skya rbab kyi nad de rnam pa lnga yod de nad gzhi tha dad pa las gyur pa gsum dang / gsum char @161a * //
translated: The disease of ascites has five forms: three that arise from separate humors,🔽one that arises from a combination of all three, and one that arises from eating clay.

original: 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig dang / sa zhag zos pa las gyur pa ni lnga pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig dang / sa zhag zos pa las gyur pa ni lnga pa yin no //
translated: The symptoms of ascites are as follows:

original: 'di yi sngon tshul snying 'phar zhing //
analyzed: 'di yi sngon tshul snying 'phar zhing //
translated: The heart palpitates,

original: pags pa rtsub par gyur pa dang // yi ga 'chus shing gcin mdog ser //
analyzed: pags pa rtsub par gyur pa dang // yi ga 'chus shing gcin mdog ser //
translated: the skin becomes rough, appetite is lost, urine is yellow,

original: rdul med khong pa'i me drod nyams //
analyzed: rdul med khong pa'i me drod nyams //
translated: there is no perspiration, and the digestive heat is diminished.

original: lus rmya ngal bar byed pa yin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: lus rmya ngal bar byed pa yin // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The body wastes away and becomes exhausted.

original: skya rbab kyi nad 'di'i sngon du byung ba'i tshul ni /
analyzed: skya rbab kyi nad 'di'i sngon du byung ba'i tshul ni /
translated: The symptoms that occur prior to the onset of ascites are as follows:

original: snying cung zad 'phar ba dang / la lar pags pa rtsub par gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: snying cung zad 'phar ba dang / la lar pags pa rtsub par gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The heart palpitates slightly, and in some cases the skin becomes rough.

original: de la rlung gyur lus na zug / rtsa sen mig dang bshang gci rnams //
analyzed: de la rlung gyur lus na zug / rtsa sen mig dang bshang gci rnams //
translated: In the case of a wind-related ascites, the body aches, the veins, nails, eyes, and feces

original: mdog gnag rtsub la 'dar ba dang // skrang sbo kha yis ro mi tshor //
analyzed: mdog gnag rtsub la 'dar ba dang // skrang sbo kha yis ro mi tshor //
translated: are dark, rough, and trembling, and there is swelling, bloating, and a loss of taste.

original: rtug skam rtsib logs klad pa na //
analyzed: rtug skam rtsib logs klad pa na //
translated: The body becomes emaciated, and there is pain in the flanks and head.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: The text reads: The disease of ascites.

original: skya rbab kyi nad de rlung las gyur pa ni lus na zhing mi bde ba dang / khab kyis phug pa ltar zug pa dang / rtsa dang sen mo la sogs pa mdog dmar zhing rtsub pa dang / lus 'dar ba dang / skom dad la sogs pas nyen par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: skya rbab kyi nad de rlung las gyur pa ni lus na zhing mi bde ba dang / khab kyis phug pa ltar zug pa dang / rtsa dang sen mo la sogs pa mdog dmar zhing rtsub pa dang / lus 'dar ba dang / skom dad la sogs pas nyen par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The disease of ascites which arises from wind is a pain in the body, an uneasiness, a piercing like a needle, a redness and roughness of the veins, nails, etc., a trembling of the body, and a danger from thirst, etc.

original: mkhris las rtsa dang sen mo sogs //
analyzed: mkhris las rtsa dang sen mo sogs //
translated: From bile, the veins, nails, etc.,

original: ljang sngon rims 'debs mun 'thibs byed //
analyzed: ljang sngon rims 'debs mun 'thibs byed //
translated: are green-blue, and one is infected with fever, and is enveloped in darkness.

original: skom dad rdul brgyal bsil ba 'dod //
analyzed: skom dad rdul brgyal bsil ba 'dod //
translated: One is in danger from thirst, dust, and fainting, and desires coolness.🔽The body is foul-smelling, the mouth is dry,

original: lus mnam kha nang kha ba dang // 'khru zhing sgregs pa skyur la tsha //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: lus mnam kha nang kha ba dang // 'khru zhing sgregs pa skyur la tsha // zhes bya ba la /
translated: and one has diarrhea, belches, and an acid taste.

original: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi nad ni /
analyzed: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi nad ni /
translated: The text reads: From bile, the disease of ascites.

original: rtsa dang sen mo dang mig dang / bshang ba dang / gci ba ljang sngon la sogs pa'i mdog tu snang ba dang / rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtsa dang sen mo dang mig dang / bshang ba dang / gci ba ljang sngon la sogs pa'i mdog tu snang ba dang / rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The disease of ascites which arises from bile is a green-blue appearance of the veins, nails, eyes, feces, and urine, and one is infected with fever, etc.

original: bad kan rtsa sogs dkar ba dang // glongs shing kha nang lan tshva bro //
analyzed: bad kan rtsa sogs dkar ba dang // glongs shing kha nang lan tshva bro //
translated: The veins, etc. are white, and there is a salty taste in the mouth.

original: ba spu ldang zhing skad 'gags la //
analyzed: ba spu ldang zhing skad 'gags la //
translated: The hair stands on end, and the voice is hoarse.

original: lud pa lu zhing slon par byed //🔽ces bya ba la /
analyzed: lud pa lu zhing slon par byed // ces bya ba la /
translated: There is a discharge of phlegm, and the patient is suffocated.

original: bad kan las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi nad ni //
analyzed: bad kan las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi nad ni //
translated: The symptoms of a tumor caused by phlegm are as follows:

original: rtsa dang sen mo la sogs pa dkar ba dang / ba spu ldang zhing brtse ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no //🔽'dus gyur mtshan ma 'dres brnag dka' //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rtsa dang sen mo la sogs pa dkar ba dang / ba spu ldang zhing brtse ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no // 'dus gyur mtshan ma 'dres brnag dka' // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The veins, nails, etc. are white, and the hair stands on end, and there is a feeling of cold, etc.

original: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i skya rbab ni nad gzhi gsum char gyi mtshan nyid 'dres ma dang ldan la /
analyzed: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i skya rbab ni nad gzhi gsum char gyi mtshan nyid 'dres ma dang ldan la /
translated: The symptoms of a tumor caused by a combination of humors are a mixture of the characteristics of all three diseases,

original: de yang rnag cing bzod par dka' ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang rnag cing bzod par dka' ba yin no //
translated: and the pus is hard to bear.

original: sa zhag bska bas rlung skyed la //
analyzed: sa zhag bska bas rlung skyed la //
translated: The wind is increased by a dry, astringent diet,

original: tshva bro mkhris pa mngar bad kan //
analyzed: tshva bro mkhris pa mngar bad kan //
translated: and the bile by a salty, sweet diet, and the phlegm by a sweet diet.

original: dangs ma la sogs @161b gnod 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: dangs ma la sogs @161b gnod 'gyur zhing //
translated: The humors are increased by a diet that is not suitable for them.

original: rtsub pas zas zos rtsub gyur nas //
analyzed: rtsub pas zas zos rtsub gyur nas //
translated: If the food is rough, the humors become rough.

original: zhu bas rtsa sbubs 'gags byas te //
analyzed: zhu bas rtsa sbubs 'gags byas te //
translated: When they are digested, they block the channels.

original: snga ma bzhin du skya rbab skyed //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du skya rbab skyed //
translated: As before, it produces ascites.🔽Then it causes swelling of the navel, feet,

original: de nas lte ba rkang pa dang // kha dang pho mtshan skrang bar byed //
analyzed: de nas lte ba rkang pa dang // kha dang pho mtshan skrang bar byed //
translated: mouth, and genitals.

original: bshang ba srin bu dang bcas 'khru //
analyzed: bshang ba srin bu dang bcas 'khru //
translated: There is diarrhea with worms.

original: bad kan khrag dang bcas pa 'byung //
analyzed: bad kan khrag dang bcas pa 'byung //
translated: Phlegm and blood occur.

original: zhes bya ba la /🔽sa zhag zos na de'i ro bska bas ni rlung skyed cing gnod par byed la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la / sa zhag zos na de'i ro bska bas ni rlung skyed cing gnod par byed la /
translated: Here,🔽since the taste of earth is astringent, it produces and harms wind.

original: lan tshva bro bas ni mkhris pa skyed par byed //
analyzed: lan tshva bro bas ni mkhris pa skyed par byed //
translated: Since it has a salty taste, it produces bile.

original: mngar bag las ni bad kan skyed par byed cing /
analyzed: mngar bag las ni bad kan skyed par byed cing /
translated: Since it is sweet, it produces phlegm.🔽It also harms and disturbs the bodily constituents such as the lymph.🔽Due to its roughness, the food eaten becomes rough, and that earth is digested.

original: dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams la yang gnod cing 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang / de'i rtsub pa'i rgyus kha zas zos pa rtsub por gyur nas sa zhag de zhu bar gyur pa dang / des rtsa sbubs kyi sgo 'gag cing rgyur mi rung bar byas te rtsa sbubs de dag snga ma bzhin du skya rbab kyi nad skyed bar byed do //
analyzed: dangs ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams la yang gnod cing 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang / de'i rtsub pa'i rgyus kha zas zos pa rtsub por gyur nas sa zhag de zhu bar gyur pa dang / des rtsa sbubs kyi sgo 'gag cing rgyur mi rung bar byas te rtsa sbubs de dag snga ma bzhin du skya rbab kyi nad skyed bar byed do //
translated: That blocks the openings of the channels and makes them unsuitable for circulation, and those channels produce ascites as before.

original: de nas de'i 'og tu lte ba la sogs ba skrang bar byed pa dang / bshang ba srin bu dang bcas par 'khru zhing 'byung ba dang / khrag dang bcas pa'i bad kan kha nas 'byung bar 'gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas de'i 'og tu lte ba la sogs ba skrang bar byed pa dang / bshang ba srin bu dang bcas par 'khru zhing 'byung ba dang / khrag dang bcas pa'i bad kan kha nas 'byung bar 'gyur pa yin no //
translated: Then, after that, it causes swelling of the navel and so forth, and diarrhea with worms, and phlegm with blood comes out of the mouth.

original: gang zhig skya rbab nad kyis btab //
analyzed: gang zhig skya rbab nad kyis btab //
translated: Whoever is afflicted by ascites

original: de yis mkhris skyed zas zos pas //
analyzed: de yis mkhris skyed zas zos pas //
translated: by eating food that produces bile

original: khong pa yan lag gnas mkhris gnas //🔽bshang khrag bsregs te mig ser skyed //
analyzed: khong pa yan lag gnas mkhris gnas // bshang khrag bsregs te mig ser skyed //
translated: the bile that resides in the stomach and limbs

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: burns the feces and blood, producing jaundice.

original: skya rbab kyi nad dang ldan pa'i mi gang zhig mkhris pa skyed cing 'phel bar byed pa'i zas dang skom la sogs pa bsten cing zos pas /
analyzed: skya rbab kyi nad dang ldan pa'i mi gang zhig mkhris pa skyed cing 'phel bar byed pa'i zas dang skom la sogs pa bsten cing zos pas /
translated: Here, whoever is a person afflicted by ascites, by relying on and consuming food and drink that produces and increases bile,

original: mi de'i khong pa dang yan lag la brten cing gnas pa'i mkhris pas mig ser skyed par byed do //
analyzed: mi de'i khong pa dang yan lag la brten cing gnas pa'i mkhris pas mig ser skyed par byed do //
translated: the bile that resides in the stomach and limbs of that person produces jaundice.

original: ci zhig byas nas skyed par byed ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas nas skyed par byed ce na /
translated: What does it do to produce it?

original: khrag dang sha bsregs shing tshig par byas pas mig ser skyed par byed do //
analyzed: khrag dang sha bsregs shing tshig par byas pas mig ser skyed par byed do //
translated: By burning and consuming blood and flesh, it produces jaundice.

original: des ni mig dang pags pa gdong //
analyzed: des ni mig dang pags pa gdong //
translated: The eyes, skin, and face are yellow.

original: bshang gci sen mo kha dog ser //
analyzed: bshang gci sen mo kha dog ser //
translated: Feces, urine, nails, and complexion are yellow.

original: lus tsha skom dad zas mi 'ju //
analyzed: lus tsha skom dad zas mi 'ju //
translated: The body is hot, thirsty, and has little appetite.

original: sbal 'dra dbang po nyam chung 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sbal 'dra dbang po nyam chung 'gyur // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The body is like a frog, and the faculties are weak.

original: mig ser gyi nad des mig la sogs pa mdog ser por 'gyur la /
analyzed: mig ser gyi nad des mig la sogs pa mdog ser por 'gyur la /
translated: The eyes and so on become yellow in color because of the disease jaundice.

original: de bzhin du lus tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / sngal ba ser po lta bu'i mdog dang ldan pa dang / dbang po rnams nyam chung zhing rang gi yul 'dzin par mi nus pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du lus tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / sngal ba ser po lta bu'i mdog dang ldan pa dang / dbang po rnams nyam chung zhing rang gi yul 'dzin par mi nus pa yin no //
translated: Similarly, the body is hot and so on, and the urine and so on are yellow in color, and the faculties are weak and unable to apprehend their objects.

original: de ni mkhris pa'i shas che na //🔽skya rbab nad med bar de 'byung //
analyzed: de ni mkhris pa'i shas che na // skya rbab nad med bar de 'byung //
translated: If it is an excess of bile,

original: zhes bya @162a * //
analyzed: zhes bya @162a * //
translated: it is a non-pathological edema.

original: ba la ; mig ser gyi nad 'di ni mkhris pa skyed par byed ba'i dngos bo bsten pa dang mkhris pa'i rang bzhin shas che bas mkhris pa shin tu rgyas par gyur pa ni /
analyzed: ba la ; mig ser gyi nad 'di ni mkhris pa skyed par byed ba'i dngos bo bsten pa dang mkhris pa'i rang bzhin shas che bas mkhris pa shin tu rgyas par gyur pa ni /
translated: This disease jaundice arises from using things that produce bile and from the nature of bile being excessive, causing bile to greatly increase.

original: skya rbab kyi nad med par yang khong ba dang yan lag la brten pa'i mkhris pa mig ser skyed par byed do //
analyzed: skya rbab kyi nad med par yang khong ba dang yan lag la brten pa'i mkhris pa mig ser skyed par byed do //
translated: Even when there is no edema, it produces bile in the stomach and limbs, causing jaundice.

original: yal bar bor na cher skrangs te //
analyzed: yal bar bor na cher skrangs te //
translated: If neglected, it becomes a large swelling,

original: gso dka' mig ser 'or thabs yin //
analyzed: gso dka' mig ser 'or thabs yin //
translated: difficult to treat, called jaundiced abscess.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: This is what is meant.

original: mig ser gyi nad de nyid gso ba ma byas par yal bar bor na /
analyzed: mig ser gyi nad de nyid gso ba ma byas par yal bar bor na /
translated: If that very disease of jaundice is not treated but neglected,

original: tsha bas cher skrangs par gyur ba de ni mig ser 'or thabs zhes bya ste /
analyzed: tsha bas cher skrangs par gyur ba de ni mig ser 'or thabs zhes bya ste /
translated: it becomes a large swelling due to heat, called a jaundiced abscess.

original: de ni gso dka' zhing bcos par dka' ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni gso dka' zhing bcos par dka' ba yin no //
translated: That is difficult to treat and hard to cure.

original: ha li sa ni ljang nag ser //
analyzed: ha li sa ni ljang nag ser //
translated: Halisaka is dark green or yellow,

original: rlung mkhris mgo 'khor skom dad che //
analyzed: rlung mkhris mgo 'khor skom dad che //
translated: with wind and bile, dizziness, great thirst,

original: bud med la dga' rims chung 'debs //
analyzed: bud med la dga' rims chung 'debs //
translated: fond of women, and causes small pox.

original: khong rmya me drod nyams stobs 'bri //
analyzed: khong rmya me drod nyams stobs 'bri //
translated: It emaciates the stomach, impairs digestive heat, and weakens.

original: ha li sa ka khrag ngan gyur //
analyzed: ha li sa ka khrag ngan gyur //
translated: Halisaka becomes bad blood,

original: chu ser can zhes bya ba yin //
analyzed: chu ser can zhes bya ba yin //
translated: called having lymph.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: This is what is meant.

original: gang gi tshe skya rbab kyi nad mkhris pa shas che bas ldang zhing gnas la ser bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe skya rbab kyi nad mkhris pa shas che bas ldang zhing gnas la ser bar 'gyur la /
translated: When the disease of edema arises due to the predominance of bile, and becomes yellow in the stomach and limbs,

original: rlung dang mkhris ba shas che ba las mgo 'khor ba la sogs pa 'byung ba dang / rims cung zad tsam gyis 'debs pa dang / khong rmya ba la sogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rlung dang mkhris ba shas che ba las mgo 'khor ba la sogs pa 'byung ba dang / rims cung zad tsam gyis 'debs pa dang / khong rmya ba la sogs par 'gyur te /
translated: From an excess of wind and bile, vertigo and so forth occur, and one is easily infected with fever, and one suffers from a hollow stomach and so forth.

original: nad de'i ming ni ha li sa ka zhes bya ba khrag ngan pa las gyur pa dang / de bzhin du chu ser can zhes bya'o //
analyzed: nad de'i ming ni ha li sa ka zhes bya ba khrag ngan pa las gyur pa dang / de bzhin du chu ser can zhes bya'o //
translated: The name of that disease is halisaka, which arises from bad blood, and likewise it is called “the one with lymph.”

original: zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //🔽de rnams kyi ni bla brnan sngar //
analyzed: zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do // de rnams kyi ni bla brnan sngar //
translated: Thus it is explained by the sages.🔽Of those, the swelling is explained

original: 'or nad gtso bo yin par bshad //
analyzed: 'or nad gtso bo yin par bshad //
translated: as the chief of the swellings.

original: de phyir de nyid bshad par bya'o //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de phyir de nyid bshad par bya'o // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Therefore, it will be explained.

original: skya rbab kyi nad de rnams kyi bla ba rnan sngar 'chi ltas kyi le'u'i skabs su 'or nad skrangs pa kho na gtso bo yin par bshad cing bstan pas /
analyzed: skya rbab kyi nad de rnams kyi bla ba rnan sngar 'chi ltas kyi le'u'i skabs su 'or nad skrangs pa kho na gtso bo yin par bshad cing bstan pas /
translated: Of those diseases of swelling, the swelling is explained as the chief of the swellings in the chapter on the signs of death.

original: de'i phyir 'or nad skya rbab kyi 'og tu bshad cing bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'or nad skya rbab kyi 'og tu bshad cing bstan par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the swelling will be explained after the swellings.

original: de yang / skya rbab 'or nad bcas pa dang // rmig dang sen mo ser por snang //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang / skya rbab 'or nad bcas pa dang // rmig dang sen mo ser por snang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis bstan pa yin no //
translated: It is a swelling, a boil, and a carbuncle, and the hooves and claws appear yellow.

original: rlung 'khrugs gyur pas bad kan dang // khrag dang mkhris pa phyi rol rtsar //
analyzed: rlung 'khrugs gyur pas bad kan dang // khrag dang mkhris pa phyi rol rtsar //
translated: The disturbance of the wind causes phlegm, blood, and bile to spread to the external veins,

original: 'phros byas de yang rgyun srang 'gags //
analyzed: 'phros byas de yang rgyun srang 'gags //
translated: and the passageways of those are also blocked.

original: pags pa sha la gnas gyur te //
analyzed: pags pa sha la gnas gyur te //
translated: It abides in the skin and flesh,

original: 'or nad mthong zhing skrang bar byed //
analyzed: 'or nad mthong zhing skrang bar byed //
translated: and is seen as a swelling and causes swelling.

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: In this passage,

original: rlung 'khrugs @162b shang ldang bar gyur pas bad kan dang khrag dang mkhris pa phyi rol gyi rtsar 'phros shing bye bar byas nas /
analyzed: rlung 'khrugs @162b shang ldang bar gyur pas bad kan dang khrag dang mkhris pa phyi rol gyi rtsar 'phros shing bye bar byas nas /
translated: the disturbance of the wind causes the phlegm, blood, and bile to spread and be dispersed to the external veins.

original: bad kan la sogs pa de dag kyang phan tshun 'gro ba'i rgyun srang 'gags pas pags pa dang sha la gnas te 'or nad du 'gyur zhing mthong zhing mkhrang bar gyur pa'i skrang pa'i nad du 'gyur ro //🔽de bas thams cad 'dus gyur bshad //
analyzed: bad kan la sogs pa de dag kyang phan tshun 'gro ba'i rgyun srang 'gags pas pags pa dang sha la gnas te 'or nad du 'gyur zhing mthong zhing mkhrang bar gyur pa'i skrang pa'i nad du 'gyur ro // de bas thams cad 'dus gyur bshad //
translated: Those phlegm and so on are also blocked from flowing to each other, and they abide in the skin and flesh, becoming a swelling, and they become a disease of swelling that is seen and hard.

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: It is explained that all of them are combined.

original: rgyu de bas na 'or nad thams cad ni nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa yin no zhes rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa'i drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
analyzed: rgyu de bas na 'or nad thams cad ni nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa yin no zhes rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa'i drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
translated: For that reason, all abscesses are explained by the sages such as Ātreya to be the result of the combination of three humors.

original: rgyu rnams kyi ni bye brag las //
analyzed: rgyu rnams kyi ni bye brag las //
translated: From the specific causes,

original: gzugs byed dgu yi bdag nyid can ;
analyzed: gzugs byed dgu yi bdag nyid can ;
translated: the nine types of abscesses arise.

original: / nad gzhi tha dad gnyis dang kun //
analyzed: / nad gzhi tha dad gnyis dang kun //
translated: The different humors, both, and all,

original: snad dang dug gis phog las byung //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: snad dang dug gis phog las byung // zhes bya ba la /
translated: arise from injury and poisoning.

original: 'or nad kyi rgyu so sor nges pa'i bye brag gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba rnam pa dgu'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'or nad kyi rgyu so sor nges pa'i bye brag gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba rnam pa dgu'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur te /
translated: From the specific causes of abscesses, the characteristics of the nine types of abscesses arise.

original: de yang rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi tha dad las gyur pa gsum dang / gnyis gnyis 'dres pa las gyur pa gsum dang / thams cad 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig ste de ltar bdun dang / snad pa las gyur pa dang dug gis phog pa las byung ba gnyis te spyir dgu yin no //
analyzed: de yang rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi tha dad las gyur pa gsum dang / gnyis gnyis 'dres pa las gyur pa gsum dang / thams cad 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig ste de ltar bdun dang / snad pa las gyur pa dang dug gis phog pa las byung ba gnyis te spyir dgu yin no //
translated: They are the three that arise from the different humors of wind and so on, the three that arise from the combination of two humors, the one that arises from the combination of all three, and the two that arise from injury and poisoning. Thus there are nine in total.

original: yang na rang dang glo bur gnyis //
analyzed: yang na rang dang glo bur gnyis //
translated: Or, it is endogenous or exogenous.

original: yan lag kun skrang phyogs gcig gnyis //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yan lag kun skrang phyogs gcig gnyis // zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is of two types: generalized or localized.

original: yang na 'or nad ni rnam pa gnyis te /🔽nang na rang la yod pa'i nyes pa'i gzhi las byung ba dang / glo bur ba'i nyes pa dug dang snad pa las byung ba gnyis so //🔽yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: yang na 'or nad ni rnam pa gnyis te / nang na rang la yod pa'i nyes pa'i gzhi las byung ba dang / glo bur ba'i nyes pa dug dang snad pa las byung ba gnyis so // yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: It is of two types: endogenous and exogenous.🔽Endogenous gout is caused by the basis of one’s own faults, and exogenous gout is caused by external faults such as poison or injury.

original: lus kyi yan lag kun skrang ba'i 'or nad dang / yan lag gi phyogs gcig tu 'byung ba'o //🔽khyab dang mtho dang mdud pa yi //
analyzed: lus kyi yan lag kun skrang ba'i 'or nad dang / yan lag gi phyogs gcig tu 'byung ba'o // khyab dang mtho dang mdud pa yi //
translated: It is of two types: generalized gout and localized gout.

original: dbyibs kyi dbye bas gsum du'ang 'dod //🔽ces bya ba la /
analyzed: dbyibs kyi dbye bas gsum du'ang 'dod // ces bya ba la /
translated: It is of three types: generalized, elevated, and knotted.

original: yang 'or nad de ni khyab pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum yin par drang srong rnams 'dod cing bshad de /
analyzed: yang 'or nad de ni khyab pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum yin par drang srong rnams 'dod cing bshad de /
translated: The sages assert and explain that gout is of three types: generalized, elevated, and knotted.

original: khyab pa ni rgya che ba'o //🔽mtho ba ni grog mkhar ltar bags kyis mtho ba'o //
analyzed: khyab pa ni rgya che ba'o // mtho ba ni grog mkhar ltar bags kyis mtho ba'o //
translated: Generalized gout is extensive.🔽Elevated gout is gradually elevated like an anthill.

original: mdud pa can ni mdud pa ltar tog tog por 'dug pa'o //
analyzed: mdud pa can ni mdud pa ltar tog tog por 'dug pa'o //
translated: Knotted gout is like a knot, with a lump here and there.

original: de ltar na khyad par de dag gi 'or nad ni rnam pa gsum yin par 'dod do //
analyzed: de ltar na khyad par de dag gi 'or nad ni rnam pa gsum yin par 'dod do //
translated: Thus, these differences are asserted to be the three types of indigestion.

original: 'or nad kyi ni spyi yi rgyu //
analyzed: 'or nad kyi ni spyi yi rgyu //
translated: The general cause of indigestion

original: nad las skyes pa khyad par nyid //
analyzed: nad las skyes pa khyad par nyid //
translated: is a specific condition arising from a disease.

original: nad las smyung sogs @163a * //
analyzed: nad las smyung sogs @163a * //
translated: From a disease, fasting and so on

original: kyis nyam chung //
analyzed: kyis nyam chung //
translated: cause weakness.

original: myur du lhag par zos las 'byung //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: myur du lhag par zos las 'byung // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Quickly overeating causes indigestion.

original: lhan cig skyes pa dang glo bur ba'i 'or nad thams cad kyi spyi'i thun mong gi rgyu ni 'og nas bshad pa yin la /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa dang glo bur ba'i 'or nad thams cad kyi spyi'i thun mong gi rgyu ni 'og nas bshad pa yin la /
translated: With regard to that, the general, shared cause of all coemergent and adventitious indigestion is explained below.

original: nad gzhi las byung ba'i 'or nad kyi mtshan nyid ni rgyu'i khyad par lhag pa gzhan yod de /
analyzed: nad gzhi las byung ba'i 'or nad kyi mtshan nyid ni rgyu'i khyad par lhag pa gzhan yod de /
translated: The definition of indigestion arising from a disease is the presence of another specific cause.

original: de bzhin du glo bur ba'i rgyu ni rims la sogs pa'i nad dang / skyug sman la sogs pa'i las dang / smyung ba byas shing zas bcad pa dang / sogs pa zhes smos pa las kyis dub pa la sogs pa nyam chung zhing rid par gyur pa'i mis myur du ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du glo bur ba'i rgyu ni rims la sogs pa'i nad dang / skyug sman la sogs pa'i las dang / smyung ba byas shing zas bcad pa dang / sogs pa zhes smos pa las kyis dub pa la sogs pa nyam chung zhing rid par gyur pa'i mis myur du ste /
translated: Similarly, the adventitious cause is a disease such as contagious fever, an action such as emesis, fasting and abstaining from food, and so on. Quickly overeating by a person who is weak and emaciated from such things as physical labor causes indigestion.

original: de'i mod la zas drag par zos na 'or nad skyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i mod la zas drag par zos na 'or nad skyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one eats very hot food immediately after that, it will cause vomiting.🔽Then again, heavy, sour, oily, cold, salty,

original: de nas gzhan yang lci ba dang // skyur dang snum bsil lan tshva dang // thal sman rnon po tsha ba dang // mya ngan chu gnyid drags dang yar //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang lci ba dang // skyur dang snum bsil lan tshva dang // thal sman rnon po tsha ba dang // mya ngan chu gnyid drags dang yar //
translated: sharp medicine, hot, grief, excessive sleep, and vomiting,

original: zas zos sha lci sha skam dang // ma zhu ngal dang bud med drags //🔽rkang gis lam du 'gro ba'am //
analyzed: zas zos sha lci sha skam dang // ma zhu ngal dang bud med drags // rkang gis lam du 'gro ba'am //
translated: eating food, heavy flesh, dry flesh, indigestion, fatigue, and excessive sexual intercourse,🔽walking on foot,

original: bzhon pas drag tu bskyod 'gyur yin //
analyzed: bzhon pas drag tu bskyod 'gyur yin //
translated: or being shaken violently by a vehicle.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de nas gzhan yang nad med par gnas pa dag gis zas dang skom lci ba la sogs pa shas cher drags pa bsten pas 'or nad skyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang nad med par gnas pa dag gis zas dang skom lci ba la sogs pa shas cher drags pa bsten pas 'or nad skyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then again, those who maintain good health by relying excessively on heavy food and drink such as heavy food and so on will develop vomiting.

original: de bzhin du ma zhu ba la sogs pas nad skyed pa yin no //🔽lud pa dbugs mi bde tshad 'khru //🔽gzhang 'brum lto ba'i nad dang ni //
analyzed: de bzhin du ma zhu ba la sogs pas nad skyed pa yin no // lud pa dbugs mi bde tshad 'khru // gzhang 'brum lto ba'i nad dang ni //
translated: Similarly, indigestion and so on will cause illness.🔽Phlegm, dyspnea, fever,🔽hemorrhoids, stomach disorders,

original: mngal nas khrag zag rims kyis btab //
analyzed: mngal nas khrag zag rims kyis btab //
translated: uterine bleeding, and contagious fevers.

original: gsud dang chu ser slon nyes dang // sbrum ma dang ni me dbal gyi //
analyzed: gsud dang chu ser slon nyes dang // sbrum ma dang ni me dbal gyi //
translated: It is caused by indigestion, lymph disorders, and pregnancy,

original: nad dang skya rbab dag gis btab //
analyzed: nad dang skya rbab dag gis btab //
translated: and by diseases such as erysipelas and edema.

original: gzhan yang log par gsos gyur pa'i //
analyzed: gzhan yang log par gsos gyur pa'i //
translated: Moreover, it is caused by improper treatment of🔽those diseases.

original: nad de brang du gnas na ni //
analyzed: nad de brang du gnas na ni //
translated: If the disease is located in the chest,

original: stod skrang chu sor gnas smad skrang //
analyzed: stod skrang chu sor gnas smad skrang //
translated: there is swelling of the upper body. If it is located in the bladder, there is swelling of the lower body.

original: dbus na gnas pa rab tu skrang //
analyzed: dbus na gnas pa rab tu skrang //
translated: If it is located in the middle, there is severe swelling.

original: yan lag kun khyab thams cad skrang //
analyzed: yan lag kun khyab thams cad skrang //
translated: If it spreads to all the limbs, there is swelling of the whole body.

original: nying lag la brten de skrang byed //
analyzed: nying lag la brten de skrang byed //
translated: If it is located in the minor body parts, it causes swelling there.

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: This is what is said.

original: lud pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams dang / de las gzhan pa'i nad rnams legs par gsos shing sman dpyad kyi bstan bcos las ji skad bshad pa bzhin du gsos par gyur na 'or nad kyi rgyur 'gyur te /
analyzed: lud pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams dang / de las gzhan pa'i nad rnams legs par gsos shing sman dpyad kyi bstan bcos las ji skad bshad pa bzhin du gsos par gyur na 'or nad kyi rgyur 'gyur te /
translated: If the diseases such as phlegm and so on, and other diseases, are properly treated and cured according to the explanations in the treatises on medicine, they can become the cause of swelling.

original: rgyu des rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs par 'gyur ba de brang na gnas pa lus kyi ro stod kyi cha skrang par byed la /
analyzed: rgyu des rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs par 'gyur ba de brang na gnas pa lus kyi ro stod kyi cha skrang par byed la /
translated: By that cause, the diseases of wind and so on become disturbed. If it is located in the chest, it causes swelling of the upper part of the body.

original: chu sor gnas na chu so man chad kyi ro smad skrang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chu sor gnas na chu so man chad kyi ro smad skrang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is located in the bladder, there will be swelling of the lower body below the bladder.

original: @163b dbus te lte ba dang rked pa'i phyogs su gnas na lus kyi bar gyi phyogs su skrang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @163b dbus te lte ba dang rked pa'i phyogs su gnas na lus kyi bar gyi phyogs su skrang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is located in the middle, that is, in the navel and waist, the body will swell in the middle.

original: lus kyi yan lag kun la khyab par gnas na thams cad skrang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus kyi yan lag kun la khyab par gnas na thams cad skrang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is located throughout the body, the whole body will swell.

original: yan lag re re'i nying lag la gnas na gang la gnas pa'i nying lag nyid skrang bar byed par 'gyur ro //🔽de yi sngon tshul rtsa rnams tsha //
analyzed: yan lag re re'i nying lag la gnas na gang la gnas pa'i nying lag nyid skrang bar byed par 'gyur ro // de yi sngon tshul rtsa rnams tsha //
translated: If it is located in the minor parts of each limb, it will cause swelling in the minor part where it is located.🔽The way it occurs is that the channels

original: yan lag snyom par byed pa yin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yan lag snyom par byed pa yin // zhes bya ba la /
translated: are extremely hot and cause the limbs to contract.

original: 'or nad kyi sngon byung ba'i tshul ni mig la sogs pa'i rtsa rnams shin tu mi bzod par tsha ba dang / yan lag rnams snyom zhing na bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'or nad kyi sngon byung ba'i tshul ni mig la sogs pa'i rtsa rnams shin tu mi bzod par tsha ba dang / yan lag rnams snyom zhing na bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The way it occurs is that the channels of the eyes and so forth become extremely unbearable and hot, and they cause the limbs to contract and ache.

original: rlung las skrang ba 'pho zhing rtsub //
analyzed: rlung las skrang ba 'pho zhing rtsub //
translated: The swelling from wind moves and is rough.

original: spu rtsub smug cing gnag pa dang // lpags 'khums 'dar brtse reg na na //
analyzed: spu rtsub smug cing gnag pa dang // lpags 'khums 'dar brtse reg na na //
translated: The hair is rough, brown and black, the skin is wrinkled, trembling and sensitive.

original: na zhing zug pa bem bem po //
analyzed: na zhing zug pa bem bem po //
translated: It aches and throbs when touched.

original: myur bar ldang zhing myur du zhi //
analyzed: myur bar ldang zhing myur du zhi //
translated: It quickly rises and quickly subsides.

original: skrang ba mnan na dma' bar 'gyur //
analyzed: skrang ba mnan na dma' bar 'gyur //
translated: If a swelling is pressed down, it becomes lower.

original: snum dang dro bas mnyes na zhi //
analyzed: snum dang dro bas mnyes na zhi //
translated: If it is massaged with oil and warmth, it is pacified.

original: mtshan mo chung zhing nyin mo che //
analyzed: mtshan mo chung zhing nyin mo che //
translated: It is small at night and large during the day.

original: pags pa yungs kar lde gu yis //
analyzed: pags pa yungs kar lde gu yis //
translated: The skin is smeared with mustard seed paste

original: bskus ltar tsha ba tsag tsag byed //🔽ces bya ba la /
analyzed: bskus ltar tsha ba tsag tsag byed // ces bya ba la /
translated: and feels hot and prickly.

original: rlung las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni /
analyzed: rlung las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni /
translated: The following are the characteristics of a vata-type abscess:

original: 'pho zhing gnas ma nges pa dang / reg na rtsub pa dang / spu rtsub bar gnas pa dang / mdog smug cing gnag pa dang / pags pa 'khums shing gnyer ma yod pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin du myur du ldang zhing 'byung la /
analyzed: 'pho zhing gnas ma nges pa dang / reg na rtsub pa dang / spu rtsub bar gnas pa dang / mdog smug cing gnag pa dang / pags pa 'khums shing gnyer ma yod pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin du myur du ldang zhing 'byung la /
translated: It moves and is not fixed, is rough to the touch, has rough hair, is brown or black in color, and has skin that is wrinkled and has lines. It arises quickly and

original: myur du rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / skrang ba'i phyogs lag pas mnan na dma' zhing kung kung por 'gyur ba dang / snum bskus shing drod bag tu byas te mnyes na zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / mtshan mo skrang ba bri zhing chung la /
analyzed: myur du rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / skrang ba'i phyogs lag pas mnan na dma' zhing kung kung por 'gyur ba dang / snum bskus shing drod bag tu byas te mnyes na zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / mtshan mo skrang ba bri zhing chung la /
translated: is quickly pacified. If the swollen area is pressed down with the hand, it becomes lower and concave. If it is massaged with oil and warmth, it is pacified. The swelling decreases and becomes smaller at night.

original: nyin mo skrang ba che zhing 'phel ba dang / pags pa yang yungs kar btags pa'i lde gus bskus pa ltar tsha ba tsag tsag byed pa dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: nyin mo skrang ba che zhing 'phel ba dang / pags pa yang yungs kar btags pa'i lde gus bskus pa ltar tsha ba tsag tsag byed pa dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: In the daytime, the swelling increases and spreads, and the skin feels as if it is being anointed with mustard seed paste, with a burning sensation.🔽The veins are yellow-red and dark,🔽the body hair becomes reddish-yellow,

original: mkhris pa rtsa ser dmar la gnag / spu ni dmar ser gyur pa dang // myur du ldang dang zhi mi 'gyur //
analyzed: mkhris pa rtsa ser dmar la gnag / spu ni dmar ser gyur pa dang // myur du ldang dang zhi mi 'gyur //
translated: it arises quickly and does not subside.

original: dang por dbus su byung dang srab //🔽skom bcas tsha zhing rims 'debs rdul //
analyzed: dang por dbus su byung dang srab // skom bcas tsha zhing rims 'debs rdul //
translated: First it appears in the center and spreads.🔽It is hot with thirst, contagious, and causes sweating.

original: mnam zhing 'drul la snum mgo 'khor //
analyzed: mnam zhing 'drul la snum mgo 'khor //
translated: It smells bad, oozes, is oily, and causes dizziness.

original: bsil bag 'dod cing thur du 'khru //
analyzed: bsil bag 'dod cing thur du 'khru //
translated: One desires coolness and diarrhea occurs.

original: dri mnam reg na mi bzod 'jam //
analyzed: dri mnam reg na mi bzod 'jam //
translated: It smells bad, feels soft when touched,🔽and is smooth.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: As for that,

original: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni //
analyzed: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni //
translated: the abscess caused by bile

original: mdog @164a * //
analyzed: mdog @164a * //
translated: has a yellow-red color.

original: ser po la sogs par snang ba dang / spu'i mdog dmar ser du gyur pa dang / myur du ldang zhing 'byung ba dang / zhi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / thog mar dbus kyi phyogs nas skrangs shing mched pa dang / pags pa srab ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang ;
analyzed: ser po la sogs par snang ba dang / spu'i mdog dmar ser du gyur pa dang / myur du ldang zhing 'byung ba dang / zhi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / thog mar dbus kyi phyogs nas skrangs shing mched pa dang / pags pa srab ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang ;
translated: It appears yellow and so on, the hair turns yellow, it quickly rises and appears, it does not subside, it first swells in the middle and spreads, and it is accompanied by thin skin and so on.

original: / reg na mi bzod cing na la 'jam zhing mnyen pa yin no //
analyzed: / reg na mi bzod cing na la 'jam zhing mnyen pa yin no //
translated: It is unbearable to the touch, painful, smooth, and soft.

original: bad kan g-ya' spu pags pa dkar //
analyzed: bad kan g-ya' spu pags pa dkar //
translated: Phlegm is white, itchy, and has white hair and skin.

original: mkhrang zhing bsil la lci ba dang // snum zhing 'jam la brtan zhing 'thas //
analyzed: mkhrang zhing bsil la lci ba dang // snum zhing 'jam la brtan zhing 'thas //
translated: It is firm, cool, heavy, oily, smooth, stable, and moist.

original: gnyid che slon zhing me drod nyams //
analyzed: gnyid che slon zhing me drod nyams //
translated: It has great sleep, vomiting, and weak digestive heat.

original: mnan na mi 'bying ldang dka' zhing //
analyzed: mnan na mi 'bying ldang dka' zhing //
translated: When pressed, it does not sink, is difficult to raise,

original: zhi dka' mtshan mo skrangs tshabs che //
analyzed: zhi dka' mtshan mo skrangs tshabs che //
translated: and is difficult to pacify, with severe swelling at night.

original: 'od ma gtsags bu sogs dral yang //
analyzed: 'od ma gtsags bu sogs dral yang //
translated: Even if bamboo slivers and so on are inserted,

original: khrag mi 'byung bar sbyin bag 'dzag / dro dang reg pa la mngon dga' //
analyzed: khrag mi 'byung bar sbyin bag 'dzag / dro dang reg pa la mngon dga' //
translated: blood does not come out, but pus oozes. It delights in warmth and touch.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: bad kan las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni skrang pa g-ya' ba dang / spu dang pags pa dkar zhing skya ba dang / mkhrang zhing sra ba dang / reg na bsil ba dang / snum pa la sogs pa dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: bad kan las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni skrang pa g-ya' ba dang / spu dang pags pa dkar zhing skya ba dang / mkhrang zhing sra ba dang / reg na bsil ba dang / snum pa la sogs pa dang ldan zhing /
translated: The swelling of a cold abscess is swollen, itchy, with white or pale hair and skin, hard and solid, cold to the touch, and oily, and so on.

original: gnyid che ba la sogs par byed pa dang / mnan na 'bying zhing spo bar mi byed pa dang / ldang zhing skye ba dang zhi ba dka' ba dang / mtshan mo skrangs tshabs che zhing nyin mo skrangs tshabs chung ba dang / 'od ma'i tshal pa dang /
analyzed: gnyid che ba la sogs par byed pa dang / mnan na 'bying zhing spo bar mi byed pa dang / ldang zhing skye ba dang zhi ba dka' ba dang / mtshan mo skrangs tshabs che zhing nyin mo skrangs tshabs chung ba dang / 'od ma'i tshal pa dang /
translated: It causes great sleepiness and so on, and when pressed it sinks and does not rise up, and it is difficult to make it rise up and heal. It swells more at night and less during the day, and it is like a bamboo shoot.

original: gtsags bu la sogs pas dbral ba yang khrag mi 'byung bar ring zhig na sbyin bag nal nal po 'byung ba dang / dro ba la dga' ba dang / reg cing byugs na dga' ba yin no //
analyzed: gtsags bu la sogs pas dbral ba yang khrag mi 'byung bar ring zhig na sbyin bag nal nal po 'byung ba dang / dro ba la dga' ba dang / reg cing byugs na dga' ba yin no //
translated: Even if it is lanced with a needle and so on, blood does not come out, and after a long time a thin, thin discharge comes out. It likes warmth and likes to be touched and anointed.

original: gnyis byung gsum por ji bzhin pa //
analyzed: gnyis byung gsum por ji bzhin pa //
translated: The two arising together is just like that.

original: rgyu dang mtshan ma 'dren ma yin //
analyzed: rgyu dang mtshan ma 'dren ma yin //
translated: The cause and signs are mixed.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: This is what is said.

original: nad gnyis las byung ba'i 'or nad gsum ni rgyu dang dbyibs kyi mtshan ma 'dren ma dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: nad gnyis las byung ba'i 'or nad gsum ni rgyu dang dbyibs kyi mtshan ma 'dren ma dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: The three swellings that arise from the two humors have a mixture of the characteristics of cause and shape.

original: 'dus pa kun gyi bdag nyid can //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'dus pa kun gyi bdag nyid can // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The one that is the nature of all the collections🔽has all the characteristics.

original: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid can yin no //
analyzed: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid can yin no //
translated: The swelling that arises from the collections has the nature of all the characteristics.

original: mtshon la sogs pas snad gyur cing //
analyzed: mtshon la sogs pas snad gyur cing //
translated: The one that is caused by weapons, etc.

original: bcad dam dbral lam smas la sogs //
analyzed: bcad dam dbral lam smas la sogs //
translated: is cut, torn, or wounded, etc.

original: kha ba me dang rgya mtsho'i rlung //
analyzed: kha ba me dang rgya mtsho'i rlung //
translated: Snow, fire, and ocean winds,

original: bse rtsi ka pi ka chu yi //
analyzed: bse rtsi ka pi ka chu yi //
translated: the juice of musk, the juice of kapi,

original: khu ba gra ma sogs reg pas //
analyzed: khu ba gra ma sogs reg pas //
translated: and the juice of ginger, etc.,

original: skrang ba mched par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: skrang ba mched par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: when they come in contact with a swelling, it spreads.

original: shin tu tsha zhing dmar @164b bar snang //
analyzed: shin tu tsha zhing dmar @164b bar snang //
translated: It is very hot and appears red,

original: phal cher 'khris pa'i mtshan nyid can //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: phal cher 'khris pa'i mtshan nyid can // zhes bya ba la /
translated: and mostly has the characteristics of a boil.🔽The one that is caused by weapons, etc.,

original: mtshon cha la sogs pas snad cing rma phyung la /
analyzed: mtshon cha la sogs pas snad cing rma phyung la /
translated: is cut, torn, or wounded, etc.,

original: bcad pa dang dbral ba dang / rma phug pa la sogs pa las byung ba'i 'or nad dang / sogs pa smos pas brdungs pa dang / bcag pa dang / bsnun pa dang;/ lhung ba dang / bcings pa dang / dkris pa la sogs pa bsdu'o //
analyzed: bcad pa dang dbral ba dang / rma phug pa la sogs pa las byung ba'i 'or nad dang / sogs pa smos pas brdungs pa dang / bcag pa dang / bsnun pa dang;/ lhung ba dang / bcings pa dang / dkris pa la sogs pa bsdu'o //
translated: The swelling that arises from cutting, tearing, piercing, and so on, and the swelling that arises from being beaten, broken, struck, fallen, bound, wrapped, and so on, is included by the phrase “and so on.”

original: de bzhin du kha bas phyid pa dang / mes tshig pa dang / de bzhin du rgya mtsho las byung ba'i rlung gis phog pa dang / bse shing gi me tog dang thang chus phog pa dang / ka pi ka chu'i zhes ba kha sral phre'u aad ma kub ta zhes bya ba'i gra mas reg na yang skrang par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin du kha bas phyid pa dang / mes tshig pa dang / de bzhin du rgya mtsho las byung ba'i rlung gis phog pa dang / bse shing gi me tog dang thang chus phog pa dang / ka pi ka chu'i zhes ba kha sral phre'u aad ma kub ta zhes bya ba'i gra mas reg na yang skrang par 'gyur zhing /
translated: Similarly, there is swelling from frostbite, from being burned by fire, from being struck by the wind that arises from the ocean, from being struck by the flowers of the silk-cotton tree, from being struck by the water of the river, and from being touched by the grass called “the grass that causes swelling.”

original: skrang pa de phan tshun mched cing byer bar 'gyur ba dang / shin tu tsha zhing dro ba dang / mdog dmar por snang ba yin la /
analyzed: skrang pa de phan tshun mched cing byer bar 'gyur ba dang / shin tu tsha zhing dro ba dang / mdog dmar por snang ba yin la /
translated: The swelling spreads and spreads, becomes very hot and warm, and appears red in color.

original: phal cher te mang du mkhris pa dang mtshan nyid 'dra ba yin no //
analyzed: phal cher te mang du mkhris pa dang mtshan nyid 'dra ba yin no //
translated: It is mostly similar in characteristics to bile.

original: dug skyes srog chags dug can ni //
analyzed: dug skyes srog chags dug can ni //
translated: The poison-born abscesses are from contact with poisonous animals,🔽such as snakes, or from their urine,

original: lus la song dang gcin gyis phog / srog chags dug med pa yi yang //
analyzed: lus la song dang gcin gyis phog / srog chags dug med pa yi yang //
translated: or from the bites of non-poisonous animals,🔽or from urine, feces, semen, or menstrual blood,🔽or from contact with dirty clothes,🔽or from contact with the wind from a poisonous tree,

original: so dang mche ba sen mos zug / gcin rtug khu bas smes pa dang // dri ma can gyi gos kyis reg / dug shing rlung la reg pa dang // dbyig dug phye mas reg las byung //
analyzed: so dang mche ba sen mos zug / gcin rtug khu bas smes pa dang // dri ma can gyi gos kyis reg / dug shing rlung la reg pa dang // dbyig dug phye mas reg las byung //
translated: or from contact with the dust of a poisonous plant.🔽They are soft, mobile, hanging,

original: mnyen zhing g-yo la 'phyang ba dang // myur gsod tsha zhing na bar byed //
analyzed: mnyen zhing g-yo la 'phyang ba dang // myur gsod tsha zhing na bar byed //
translated: quickly fatal, hot, and painful.

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: Here is the explanation:

original: dug las skyes pa'i 'or nad ni sbrul la sogs pa'i srog chags dug can gyis reg cing lus la song ba dang / de bzhin du de'i gcin gyis phog pa dang / srog chags dug med pa dag gi yang gcin dang rtug pas phog pa dang /
analyzed: dug las skyes pa'i 'or nad ni sbrul la sogs pa'i srog chags dug can gyis reg cing lus la song ba dang / de bzhin du de'i gcin gyis phog pa dang / srog chags dug med pa dag gi yang gcin dang rtug pas phog pa dang /
translated: The poison-born abscesses are from contact with poisonous animals such as snakes, and from their urine, and similarly from the urine and feces of non-poisonous animals.

original: yang zhes smos pa ni dug dang bcas pa bsdu ba ste /
analyzed: yang zhes smos pa ni dug dang bcas pa bsdu ba ste /
translated: The word also includes those with poison.

original: de dag gi so dang mche ba dang sen mos zin cing zug pa dag kyang 'or nad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag gi so dang mche ba dang sen mos zin cing zug pa dag kyang 'or nad du 'gyur ro //
translated: They are also abscesses from the bites of their teeth, fangs, and claws.

original: de bzhin du gcin dang rtug pa dang khu chus smes par byas pa dang / de bzhin du dri ma dang bcas pa'i gos kyis reg pas kyang 'or nad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du gcin dang rtug pa dang khu chus smes par byas pa dang / de bzhin du dri ma dang bcas pa'i gos kyis reg pas kyang 'or nad du 'gyur ro //
translated: Likewise, it arises from being soiled by urine, feces, or semen, and likewise from touching soiled clothing.

original: de bzhin du dug gis shing la reg pa dang / dug dang 'dres pa'i rlung la reg pa dang / de bzhin du dbyig dug sbyar mar byas pa'i phye mas reg pa las kyang 'or nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du dug gis shing la reg pa dang / dug dang 'dres pa'i rlung la reg pa dang / de bzhin du dbyig dug sbyar mar byas pa'i phye mas reg pa las kyang 'or nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Likewise, it arises from touching a poisonous tree, from touching a wind mixed with poison, and likewise from touching a powder mixed with snake venom.

original: skrangs pa de ni mnyen @165a * //
analyzed: skrangs pa de ni mnyen @165a * //
translated: That swelling is soft and smooth,

original: zhing 'jam pa dang / g-yo zhing 'pho ba dang / 'phyang bag tu gnas pa dang / myur du gsod par byed pa dang / tsha bar byed pa dang / na bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: zhing 'jam pa dang / g-yo zhing 'pho ba dang / 'phyang bag tu gnas pa dang / myur du gsod par byed pa dang / tsha bar byed pa dang / na bar byed pa yin no //
translated: moves and shifts, hangs down, quickly kills, causes fever, and causes pain.

original: 'or nad gsar byung bla brnan med //
analyzed: 'or nad gsar byung bla brnan med //
translated: That swelling is new and without complications,

original: gso sla / zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gso sla / zhes bya ba la /
translated: and is easy to cure.

original: 'or nad gsar du byung zhing skyes nas ring por ma lon pa dang / bla brnan gyi nad gzhan gyis ma gcos pa dag ni gso bar sla zhing sman dpyad kyis bcos par nus pa yin no //🔽gso dka' sngar bshad zin /
analyzed: 'or nad gsar du byung zhing skyes nas ring por ma lon pa dang / bla brnan gyi nad gzhan gyis ma gcos pa dag ni gso bar sla zhing sman dpyad kyis bcos par nus pa yin no // gso dka' sngar bshad zin /
translated: Those that are new and have not been present for a long time, and those that are not mixed with other diseases such as tumors, are easy to cure and can be treated with medicine and therapy.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: The difficult to cure have already been explained.

original: 'or nad gso bar mi rung ba ni sngar lus kyi 'gyur ba bshad pa'i le'u'i skabs su bla brnan du mar ldan pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis bshad cing bstan zin pa yin no //🔽me dpal nad dang snad pa'i bar //
analyzed: 'or nad gso bar mi rung ba ni sngar lus kyi 'gyur ba bshad pa'i le'u'i skabs su bla brnan du mar ldan pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis bshad cing bstan zin pa yin no // me dpal nad dang snad pa'i bar //
translated: As for those that are incurable, it has been explained and taught in the chapter on bodily changes that tumors that are associated with many tumors are incurable.🔽The diseases of fire and the injuries

original: gnod pa 'or nad mtshungs pa yin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gnod pa 'or nad mtshungs pa yin // zhes bya ba la /
translated: are similar to the harm of tumors.

original: me dpal gyi nad ni nad gzhi so so dang gnyis 'dres pa dang / thams cad 'dus pa las gyur pa dang // snad pa'i bar las byung ba ste //
analyzed: me dpal gyi nad ni nad gzhi so so dang gnyis 'dres pa dang / thams cad 'dus pa las gyur pa dang // snad pa'i bar las byung ba ste //
translated: As for the diseases of fire, they are the combination of two individual diseases, the combination of all, and those arising from injuries.

original: me dpal rnam pa brgyad yin no //
analyzed: me dpal rnam pa brgyad yin no //
translated: There are eight types of diseases of fire.

original: de bzhin du gnod pa rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa la sogs pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin no //🔽de ni phyi nang gnyis ka ste //
analyzed: de bzhin du gnod pa rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa la sogs pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin no // de ni phyi nang gnyis ka ste //
translated: That fire-glory is explained as

original: gsum na gnas pa yin par bshad //
analyzed: gsum na gnas pa yin par bshad //
translated: existing in the three: external, internal, and both.

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: me dpal de ni phyi la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum yod do zhes drang srong rnams kyi bshad de /
analyzed: me dpal de ni phyi la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum yod do zhes drang srong rnams kyi bshad de /
translated: the sages explain that fire-glory has three types by the division of external and so on.

original: la la ni phyi rol na gnas pa yin la /🔽la la ni nang na /
analyzed: la la ni phyi rol na gnas pa yin la / la la ni nang na /
translated: Some exist externally,🔽some exist internally,

original: la la ni gnyi ga na gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: la la ni gnyi ga na gnas pa yin no //
translated: and some exist in both.

original: phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka' //
analyzed: phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka' //
translated: It is difficult to treat like the latter.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: me dpal de yang phyi ma bzhin du gso zhing bcos par dka' ste /
analyzed: me dpal de yang phyi ma bzhin du gso zhing bcos par dka' ste /
translated: that fire-glory is difficult to treat and cure like the latter.

original: de yang phyi rol na gnas pa bas ni nang na gnas pa rab tu gso bar dka' la /
analyzed: de yang phyi rol na gnas pa bas ni nang na gnas pa rab tu gso bar dka' la /
translated: Moreover, it is more difficult to treat the one existing internally than the one existing externally,

original: nang na gnas pa bas ni gnyis ka na gnas pa mchog tu gso bar dka' ba yin no //
analyzed: nang na gnas pa bas ni gnyis ka na gnas pa mchog tu gso bar dka' ba yin no //
translated: and it is most difficult to treat the one existing in both than the one existing internally.

original: de la nad ni ji bzhin du //
analyzed: de la nad ni ji bzhin du //
translated: There, the disease is just like that.

original: 'khrugs pa'i rgyu yis ldang gyur la //
analyzed: 'khrugs pa'i rgyu yis ldang gyur la //
translated: The cause of disturbance is the arising of the disease.

original: khyad par du ni tsha ba yis //
analyzed: khyad par du ni tsha ba yis //
translated: In particular, the hot disease

original: lus la myur du mched par byed //
analyzed: lus la myur du mched par byed //
translated: quickly spreads throughout the body.

original: de yang nang gnas nang du mched //🔽phyir gnas phyir mched gnyis kar gnas //
analyzed: de yang nang gnas nang du mched // phyir gnas phyir mched gnyis kar gnas //
translated: Moreover, it abides internally and spreads internally,🔽it abides externally and spreads externally, and

original: gnyis kar mched par byed pa yin //
analyzed: gnyis kar mched par byed pa yin //
translated: it abides in both and spreads in both.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: This is what is said.

original: me dpal gyi nad de ni rlung la sogs pa'i nad @165b rang rang gi rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'khrugs shing g-yo bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu /
analyzed: me dpal gyi nad de ni rlung la sogs pa'i nad @165b rang rang gi rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'khrugs shing g-yo bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu /
translated: The disease of fire-glory is the cause of the disturbance and agitation of each of the diseases of wind and so forth, according to their respective aspects.

original: kha ba dang tsha ba dang bska ba la sogs pa'i rgyus ldang bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: kha ba dang tsha ba dang bska ba la sogs pa'i rgyus ldang bar 'gyur la /
translated: It arises due to the causes of hot, bitter, astringent, and so on.

original: khyad par du ni tsha zhing sreg par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sman dang zas dang / spyod lam gyis ldang zhing nad des lus la myur du mched cing rgyas par byed do //
analyzed: khyad par du ni tsha zhing sreg par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sman dang zas dang / spyod lam gyis ldang zhing nad des lus la myur du mched cing rgyas par byed do //
translated: In particular, it arises through medicine, food, and conduct that have the characteristics of heat and burning, and that disease quickly spreads and increases throughout the body.

original: de yang ji ltar mched ce na /
analyzed: de yang ji ltar mched ce na /
translated: Moreover, how does it spread?

original: nang na gnas pa'i me dpal ni nang na mched cing rgyas par byed la /
analyzed: nang na gnas pa'i me dpal ni nang na mched cing rgyas par byed la /
translated: The fire-glory that abides internally spreads and increases internally,

original: phyi rol du gnas pa ni phyi rol nyid du mched la /
analyzed: phyi rol du gnas pa ni phyi rol nyid du mched la /
translated: The one that abides externally spreads externally.

original: gnyis kar gnas shing brten pa ni phyi dang nang gnyis kar mched cing rgyas par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gnyis kar gnas shing brten pa ni phyi dang nang gnyis kar mched cing rgyas par byed pa yin no //
translated: The one that abides in both and is supported spreads and increases in both the external and internal.

original: de la nang na gnas pa ni //
analyzed: de la nang na gnas pa ni //
translated: The one that abides internally

original: gnas rnams tsha gdung myos par byed //🔽bu ga rnams la gnod pa dang // skom dad rab che gcin nad sogs //
analyzed: gnas rnams tsha gdung myos par byed // bu ga rnams la gnod pa dang // skom dad rab che gcin nad sogs //
translated: is known by the signs of hot, burning🔽and painful joints.🔽It is known by the signs of🔽great thirst, urinary disorders,

original: mi snyoms par ni 'byung ba dang // me drod myur nyams las shes bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mi snyoms par ni 'byung ba dang // me drod myur nyams las shes bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: and so on, and by the rapid🔽diminution of digestive heat.

original: de las nang na gnas pa la sogs pa'i me dpal gyi nang nas nang na gnas pa'i me dbal ni gnad rnams tsha ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma las shes shing rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: de las nang na gnas pa la sogs pa'i me dpal gyi nang nas nang na gnas pa'i me dbal ni gnad rnams tsha ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma las shes shing rtogs par bya ste /
translated: The one that abides internally and so on is known by the signs of hot, burning and painful joints.

original: snying la sogs pa'i gnad rnams tsha zhing sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa dang / myos shing rmongs bag tu byed pa dang / nang du bu ba'i sgo rnams la gnod cing gzir la khyad par du bskyod pa dang / de bzhin du skom dad lhag par rab tu che ba dang /
analyzed: snying la sogs pa'i gnad rnams tsha zhing sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa dang / myos shing rmongs bag tu byed pa dang / nang du bu ba'i sgo rnams la gnod cing gzir la khyad par du bskyod pa dang / de bzhin du skom dad lhag par rab tu che ba dang /
translated: The vital points of the heart and so forth are hot and one is tormented by suffering, one is intoxicated and confused, and the orifices of the body are harmed and oppressed, and in particular, they move.🔽Also, one has an especially strong desire for drink.

original: bshang ba dang gci ba la sogs pa'i shugs mi snyoms shing legs par mi 'byung ba dang / khong pa'i me drod dang lus kyi sbubs shin tu myur bar nyams pa las shes shing rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bshang ba dang gci ba la sogs pa'i shugs mi snyoms shing legs par mi 'byung ba dang / khong pa'i me drod dang lus kyi sbubs shin tu myur bar nyams pa las shes shing rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The force of feces, urine, and so forth is not balanced and does not come out well, and the digestive heat and the body's interior quickly deteriorate. This should be understood and realized.

original: phyi rol de las bzlog pa yin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: phyi rol de las bzlog pa yin // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The external is the opposite of that.

original: phyi rol tu gnas pa'i me dbal gyi mtshan nyid ni nang na gnas pa'i me dbal gyi mtshan nyid las go bzlog par 'gyur ba yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi rol tu gnas pa'i me dbal gyi mtshan nyid ni nang na gnas pa'i me dbal gyi mtshan nyid las go bzlog par 'gyur ba yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The characteristics of external small pox should be understood as the opposite of the characteristics of internal small pox.

original: de la rlung gyur me dpal ni //
analyzed: de la rlung gyur me dpal ni //
translated: Therein, the wind-type small pox

original: rlung gi rims dang nad thabs 'dra //
analyzed: rlung gi rims dang nad thabs 'dra //
translated: is like the wind-fever and the method of treatment.

original: skrang zhing 'gul la zug pa dang // yan lag snyom zhing ba spu brtse //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: skrang zhing 'gul la zug pa dang // yan lag snyom zhing ba spu brtse // zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is swollen, moves, and is painful, and the limbs are numb and the pores are closed.

original: de la me dpal gyi nad rlung las gyur pa ni rlung gi rims dang na ba'i mtshan nyid 'dra ba yin par shes par bya la //
analyzed: de la me dpal gyi nad rlung las gyur pa ni rlung gi rims dang na ba'i mtshan nyid 'dra ba yin par shes par bya la //
translated: Here, one should understand that a fire-colic illness due to wind is similar to the signs of a wind fever and illness.

original: yang de bzhin du me dbal de ni skrang ba la sogs pa dang yang ldan @166a * //🔽pa yin no //
analyzed: yang de bzhin du me dbal de ni skrang ba la sogs pa dang yang ldan @166a * // pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, that fire-colic is also associated with swelling and so on.

original: mkhris gyur myur du mched cing 'gro //
analyzed: mkhris gyur myur du mched cing 'gro //
translated: A bile-type one spreads quickly and moves.

original: mkhris rims rtags ldan shin tu dmar //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mkhris rims rtags ldan shin tu dmar // zhes bya ba la /
translated: A bile fever has the signs and is very red.

original: mkhris pa las gyur ba'i me dbal ni lus la myur du mched cing khyab par byed pa dang / mkhris pa'i rims kyi mtshan nyid ji skad smos pa'i rtags dang ldan pa dang shin tu shas cher dmar ba yin no //🔽bad kan las g-ya' reg na 'jam //
analyzed: mkhris pa las gyur ba'i me dbal ni lus la myur du mched cing khyab par byed pa dang / mkhris pa'i rims kyi mtshan nyid ji skad smos pa'i rtags dang ldan pa dang shin tu shas cher dmar ba yin no // bad kan las g-ya' reg na 'jam //
translated: A fire-colic illness due to bile spreads quickly and pervades the body, has the signs as described of the characteristics of a bile fever, and is very intense.🔽A phlegm-type one itches when touched.

original: bad kan las byung rims 'dar na //
analyzed: bad kan las byung rims 'dar na //
translated: A phlegm fever has the signs and shakes.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: bad kan las byung ba'i me dbal ni shas cher g-ya' ba dang / reg na 'jam pa dang / bad kan las byung ba'i me dpal dang rims dang tshul 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bad kan las byung ba'i me dbal ni shas cher g-ya' ba dang / reg na 'jam pa dang / bad kan las byung ba'i me dpal dang rims dang tshul 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: The abscesses that arise from phlegm are mostly itchy, soft to the touch, and similar to the appearance of phlegm.

original: me dpal sogs kun yal bar bor //
analyzed: me dpal sogs kun yal bar bor //
translated: All abscesses are neglected

original: rang gi nad tshul bsags gyur na //
analyzed: rang gi nad tshul bsags gyur na //
translated: and their own condition accumulates.

original: de ni smin rdol rang rang gi / me dpal rma yi mtshan nyid 'dzin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de ni smin rdol rang rang gi / me dpal rma yi mtshan nyid 'dzin // zhes bya ba la /
translated: They ripen and burst, each bearing the characteristics of an abscess.

original: me dbal thams cad yal bar bor zhing gso bar ma byas na /
analyzed: me dbal thams cad yal bar bor zhing gso bar ma byas na /
translated: If all abscesses are neglected and not treated,

original: rang gi nad rlung la sogs pa'i tshul bsags shing 'phel bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rang gi nad rlung la sogs pa'i tshul bsags shing 'phel bar 'gyur te /
translated: their own condition, such as wind, accumulates and increases.

original: rlung gi mtshan nyid kyis ni rlung gi me dbal 'phel bar 'gyur la /🔽mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid kyis ni mkhris pa'i me dbal 'phel zhing stsogs par 'gyur la /
analyzed: rlung gi mtshan nyid kyis ni rlung gi me dbal 'phel bar 'gyur la / mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid kyis ni mkhris pa'i me dbal 'phel zhing stsogs par 'gyur la /
translated: The characteristics of wind increase wind abscesses.🔽The characteristics of bile increase bile abscesses.

original: bad kan gyi mtshan nyid kyis ni bad kan gyi me dpal sogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bad kan gyi mtshan nyid kyis ni bad kan gyi me dpal sogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The characteristics of phlegm increase phlegm abscesses.

original: de bzhin du smin zhing rdol ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du smin zhing rdol ba ste /
translated: Similarly, they ripen and burst.

original: dang por smin nas phyis rdol bar 'gyur ba yin pas na smin zhing rdol ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dang por smin nas phyis rdol bar 'gyur ba yin pas na smin zhing rdol ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Since it first ripens and then bursts open, it is called “ripening and bursting open.”

original: de bzhin du rlung las gyur pa rang rang gi rma'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de 'dzin zhing 'phyang bar byed de /
analyzed: de bzhin du rlung las gyur pa rang rang gi rma'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de 'dzin zhing 'phyang bar byed de /
translated: Similarly, the wind-born ones hold and hang down with the characteristics of their own wounds.

original: rma'i le'u las ;
analyzed: rma'i le'u las ;
translated: In the chapter on wounds,

original: / de las /
analyzed: / de las /
translated: it says:

original: rlung las sngo nag smug pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur smin zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas smos pa yin no //
analyzed: rlung las sngo nag smug pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur smin zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas smos pa yin no //
translated: “From wind, blue-black smoke, and so on, and from bile, ripening and so on, will be mentioned below.”

original: rlung mkhris las ni rims 'debs slon //🔽brgyal zhing tshad 'khru skom mgo 'khor //
analyzed: rlung mkhris las ni rims 'debs slon // brgyal zhing tshad 'khru skom mgo 'khor //
translated: From wind and bile, it causes fever.🔽Fainting, fever, thirst, and dizziness,

original: rus tshigs chag snyam me drod nyams //
analyzed: rus tshigs chag snyam me drod nyams //
translated: bones and joints feel broken, and digestive heat declines.

original: mun zhugs snyam sems yi ga 'chus //🔽yan lag thams cad me mdag ni //
analyzed: mun zhugs snyam sems yi ga 'chus // yan lag thams cad me mdag ni //
translated: Feeling as if entering darkness, appetite is lost.🔽All limbs feel as if

original: 'bar bas khyab pa lta bur tsha //
analyzed: 'bar bas khyab pa lta bur tsha //
translated: covered by blazing embers.

original: phyogs ni gang dang gang du mched //
analyzed: phyogs ni gang dang gang du mched //
translated: Wherever the fire spreads,

original: khyab pas yan lag de dang der //
analyzed: khyab pas yan lag de dang der //
translated: those limbs

original: me mdag zhi ba ltar gnag pa'am //
analyzed: me mdag zhi ba ltar gnag pa'am //
translated: feel as if covered by extinguished embers.

original: sngo ba 'am dmar @166b bas khyab byed la //
analyzed: sngo ba 'am dmar @166b bas khyab byed la //
translated: It is filled with blue or red [blood],

original: mes bsregs lta bur chu bur 'byung //
analyzed: mes bsregs lta bur chu bur 'byung //
translated: and blisters arise as if burned by fire.

original: myur du mched cing khyab par byed //
analyzed: myur du mched cing khyab par byed //
translated: It spreads quickly and pervades [the body].

original: gnad kyi rjes 'jug me dbal ni //
analyzed: gnad kyi rjes 'jug me dbal ni //
translated: Then, the 'fire-like fever that follows the vital points'

original: de nas stobs rab skyes pa'i rlung //
analyzed: de nas stobs rab skyes pa'i rlung //
translated: is the wind that arises with great strength.

original: yan lag na zhing dran pa stor //
analyzed: yan lag na zhing dran pa stor //
translated: The limbs ache and memory is lost.

original: gnyid yar dbugs kyi rngam pa drag / skyigs bus 'debs shing 'di lta bu'i //
analyzed: gnyid yar dbugs kyi rngam pa drag / skyigs bus 'debs shing 'di lta bu'i //
translated: Sleep is disturbed, breathing is labored, and one is afflicted by hiccups.

original: gnas skabs des ni thob par 'gyur //🔽sa dang mal khri stan sogs la //
analyzed: gnas skabs des ni thob par 'gyur // sa dang mal khri stan sogs la //
translated: One attains this condition🔽where one finds no comfort

original: gang du'ang bde ba mi 'thob cing //🔽'gre zhing sdug bsngal myong ba dang // lus sems ngal las byung ba yis //
analyzed: gang du'ang bde ba mi 'thob cing // 'gre zhing sdug bsngal myong ba dang // lus sems ngal las byung ba yis //
translated: anywhere, on the ground, on a bed, or on a seat,🔽and one writhes in pain.🔽The delusion of sleep is difficult to overcome

original: gnyid kyi rmongs bag sad dka' ba //
analyzed: gnyid kyi rmongs bag sad dka' ba //
translated: due to the fatigue of body and mind.

original: de ni me 'dra'i me dpal yin //
analyzed: de ni me 'dra'i me dpal yin //
translated: This is the 'fire-like fever'.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is said:

original: rlung dang mkhris pa las ni me dang 'dra ba'i me dbal du 'gyur la /
analyzed: rlung dang mkhris pa las ni me dang 'dra ba'i me dbal du 'gyur la /
translated: From wind and bile, there arises a fever like fire.
