original: de yang rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang // lus kyi yan lag thams cad me mdag 'bar bas khyab cing gtor ba lta bur rab tu tsha ba dang / yang me dpal de lus kyi phyogs gang dang gang du mched cing khyab pa'i lus kyi yan lag gi phyogs de dang der me mdag 'bar ba zhi ba bzhin du gnag cing sngo ba dang dmar bas khyab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang // lus kyi yan lag thams cad me mdag 'bar bas khyab cing gtor ba lta bur rab tu tsha ba dang / yang me dpal de lus kyi phyogs gang dang gang du mched cing khyab pa'i lus kyi yan lag gi phyogs de dang der me mdag 'bar ba zhi ba bzhin du gnag cing sngo ba dang dmar bas khyab par 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, it is associated with fever and so on, and all the limbs of the body are extremely hot, as if pervaded and sprinkled with blazing embers.🔽Moreover, wherever that fire spreads and pervades the body, that part of the body becomes black, blue, and red, as if pervaded by extinguished blazing embers.

original: yang me dpal de ni mes bsregs pa lta bur chu bur gyis myur du mched par byed cing kun tu khyab par byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang me dpal de ni mes bsregs pa lta bur chu bur gyis myur du mched par byed cing kun tu khyab par byed par 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, that fire spreads and pervades quickly, like a burn, with blisters.

original: de yang rlung dang mkhris pa'i rgyu nyid kyis myur ba kho nar khyab par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang rlung dang mkhris pa'i rgyu nyid kyis myur ba kho nar khyab par byed pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, it spreads quickly due to the causes of wind and bile.

original: yang de bzhin du snying la sogs pa'i gnad kyi rjes su 'jug par byed cing me dbal des de'i 'og tu stobs rab tu skyes pa'i rlung des yan lag na zhing gzer bar byed pa dang / dran pa stor zhing brgyal bar byed pa dang /
analyzed: yang de bzhin du snying la sogs pa'i gnad kyi rjes su 'jug par byed cing me dbal des de'i 'og tu stobs rab tu skyes pa'i rlung des yan lag na zhing gzer bar byed pa dang / dran pa stor zhing brgyal bar byed pa dang /
translated: In the same way, the vital wind that completely destroys the body moves through the vital points of the heart and so forth, and then the vital wind that produces great strength causes the limbs to ache and throb, and it causes loss of memory and fainting.

original: gnyid yar zhing med pa dang / dbugs kyi rngam pa drag tu 'byung ba dang / skyigs bu'i nad kyis 'debs pa dang / me dpal gyi nad dang ldan pa'i skyes bu de 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs 'thob cing myong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gnyid yar zhing med pa dang / dbugs kyi rngam pa drag tu 'byung ba dang / skyigs bu'i nad kyis 'debs pa dang / me dpal gyi nad dang ldan pa'i skyes bu de 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs 'thob cing myong bar 'gyur te /
translated: It causes sleep to increase and disappear, and it causes violent panting, choking, and fever.

original: sems mal na bde bar mi gnas pa'i dbang du gyur bas sa dang mal khri dang stan la sogs pa gang du gnas su zin kyang lus dang sems bde ba mi 'thob pa yin la /
analyzed: sems mal na bde bar mi gnas pa'i dbang du gyur bas sa dang mal khri dang stan la sogs pa gang du gnas su zin kyang lus dang sems bde ba mi 'thob pa yin la /
translated: A person who has this disease does not rest well in bed, and no matter where he stays, on the ground, in bed, or on a seat, he does not obtain physical or mental pleasure.

original: de ltar mi bde ba nyid kyis phan tshun 'gre zhing ldog la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba @167a * //
analyzed: de ltar mi bde ba nyid kyis phan tshun 'gre zhing ldog la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba @167a * //
translated: Because of that discomfort, he rolls back and forth, and he experiences the feeling of suffering.

original: nyams su myong ba dang / lus dang sems ngal zhing dub pa las byung ba gnyid kyi rmongs bag nyams su myong zhing /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba dang / lus dang sems ngal zhing dub pa las byung ba gnyid kyi rmongs bag nyams su myong zhing /
translated: Experience of sleepiness and drowsiness, which is a mental state of heaviness and dullness that arises from physical and mental fatigue.

original: de yang sad par shin tu dka' ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang sad par shin tu dka' ba yin no //
translated: It is also very difficult to wake up from.

original: bad kan gyis ni bkag pa'i rlung //
analyzed: bad kan gyis ni bkag pa'i rlung //
translated: The wind obstructed by phlegm

original: bad kan de brtol mang du byed //🔽khrag 'phel ba yis khrag brtol te //
analyzed: bad kan de brtol mang du byed // khrag 'phel ba yis khrag brtol te //
translated: breaks through that phlegm.

original: pags pa chu ba sha la gnas //🔽gnon byas thor bu phra zhing rim //
analyzed: pags pa chu ba sha la gnas // gnon byas thor bu phra zhing rim //
translated: Breaking through the blood, it resides in the skin, sinews, and flesh.🔽It causes a series of small, scattered,

original: zlum zhing sbom la sra ba yi //🔽mdzer pa'i phreng ba chags byed cing //
analyzed: zlum zhing sbom la sra ba yi // mdzer pa'i phreng ba chags byed cing //
translated: round, thick, and hard🔽rows of boils.

original: mdog dmar rab na rims kyis 'debs //🔽lud pa dbugs mi bde tshad 'khru //
analyzed: mdog dmar rab na rims kyis 'debs // lud pa dbugs mi bde tshad 'khru //
translated: If they are very red, they are infected with fever.🔽There is sputum, dyspnea, fever, vomiting,

original: kha skam skyigs bu slon mgo 'khor //
analyzed: kha skam skyigs bu slon mgo 'khor //
translated: dry mouth, hiccups, and dizziness.

original: rmongs bag mdog nyams brgyal dang lus //
analyzed: rmongs bag mdog nyams brgyal dang lus //
translated: Drowsiness, poor complexion, fainting, and the body

original: yan lag na zhing me drod nyams //
analyzed: yan lag na zhing me drod nyams //
translated: have pain in the limbs and loss of digestive heat.

original: de ltar mdzer pa'i me dbal ni //
analyzed: de ltar mdzer pa'i me dbal ni //
translated: Thus, these boils and blisters

original: bad kan rlung 'khrugs las gyur yin //
analyzed: bad kan rlung 'khrugs las gyur yin //
translated: arise from disturbed phlegm and wind.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: bad kan dang rlung 'khrugs pa las ni mdzer pa'i me dpal zhes bya ba'i nad du 'gyur te /
analyzed: bad kan dang rlung 'khrugs pa las ni mdzer pa'i me dpal zhes bya ba'i nad du 'gyur te /
translated: From a disturbance of phlegm and wind, a disease called “the fire of moles” occurs.

original: de yang bad kan gyi nad kyis rlung de bkag cing 'byung du mi ster ba dang / rlung gis bad kan de brtol zhing phye nas dum bu mang du byas pa'am /
analyzed: de yang bad kan gyi nad kyis rlung de bkag cing 'byung du mi ster ba dang / rlung gis bad kan de brtol zhing phye nas dum bu mang du byas pa'am /
translated: Moreover, phlegm obstructs and prevents the wind from arising, and the wind penetrates and splits the phlegm, causing it to form many pieces.

original: yang khrag 'phel bar gyur pa'i mi'i khrag phye zhing dum bur brtol nas mdzer pa'i phreng ba'am rmen bu'i phreng ba skyed par byed do //
analyzed: yang khrag 'phel bar gyur pa'i mi'i khrag phye zhing dum bur brtol nas mdzer pa'i phreng ba'am rmen bu'i phreng ba skyed par byed do //
translated: Or, if blood increases in a person, the blood is split and penetrated, causing a string of moles or a string of glands to develop.

original: de yang pags pa la sogs pa la gnas pa'i khrag gis gnod cing 'khrugs par byas nas /
analyzed: de yang pags pa la sogs pa la gnas pa'i khrag gis gnod cing 'khrugs par byas nas /
translated: Moreover, blood residing in the skin and so on is harmed and disturbed.

original: thor bu phra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can dang mdog dmar ba'i phreng ba chags par byed la /
analyzed: thor bu phra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can dang mdog dmar ba'i phreng ba chags par byed la /
translated: It causes a string of small, fine, and so on, characteristics and a red color to develop.

original: mdzer pa'i phreng ba de yang nang du na zhing rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa skyed par byed de /
analyzed: mdzer pa'i phreng ba de yang nang du na zhing rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa skyed par byed de /
translated: That string of moles also causes internal pain and gradually produces fever and so on.

original: de ltar bshad pa'i mdzer pa'i me dbal 'di ni bad kan dang rlung 'khrugs pa las gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar bshad pa'i mdzer pa'i me dbal 'di ni bad kan dang rlung 'khrugs pa las gyur pa yin no //
translated: This type of herpes, as explained, is caused by the disturbance of phlegm and wind.🔽Fever, delirium, and fainting

original: bad kan mkhris las rims 'debs rengs //
analyzed: bad kan mkhris las rims 'debs rengs //
translated: are caused by the disturbance of phlegm and bile.

original: gnyid che slon bag klad pa na //
analyzed: gnyid che slon bag klad pa na //
translated: There is excessive sleep, lethargy, and a feeling of heaviness in the head.

original: yan lag na zhing bya rmyang 'dod //
analyzed: yan lag na zhing bya rmyang 'dod //
translated: The limbs ache and one wants to stretch.

original: bla zhing mgo 'khor yi ga 'chus //
analyzed: bla zhing mgo 'khor yi ga 'chus //
translated: One is weak, dizzy, and has a loss of appetite.

original: rtsub cing drod nyams rus chag snyam //🔽skam zhing dbang po mi gsal lci //
analyzed: rtsub cing drod nyams rus chag snyam // skam zhing dbang po mi gsal lci //
translated: It is rough, with a loss of heat, and one feels as if one’s bones are broken.🔽One is dry, with unclear senses and heaviness.

original: be'u snabs 'khru zhing dang ga 'khyil //
analyzed: be'u snabs 'khru zhing dang ga 'khyil //
translated: One has mucus, diarrhea, and a loss of digestive heat.

original: de ni rtsa sbubs rnams su 'gro //
analyzed: de ni rtsa sbubs rnams su 'gro //
translated: It moves through the channels and their branches.

original: phal cher ma zhu gnas na zhugs //
analyzed: phal cher ma zhu gnas na zhugs //
translated: For the most part, it resides in the undigested food.

original: phyogs gcig tu ni rab mi na //
analyzed: phyogs gcig tu ni rab mi na //
translated: It does not spread to one side.

original: @167b thor bu ser po dmar po dang // dkar pos phyogs kun khyab par byed //
analyzed: @167b thor bu ser po dmar po dang // dkar pos phyogs kun khyab par byed //
translated: It spreads throughout the body with occasional yellow, red, and white patches.

original: nor bu ltar snang gnag cing snum //
analyzed: nor bu ltar snang gnag cing snum //
translated: It appears like a jewel, black and shiny.

original: dri ma can la skrang zhing lci //
analyzed: dri ma can la skrang zhing lci //
translated: It is dirty, swollen, and heavy.

original: rnag pa'i zabs che rab tu tsha //
analyzed: rnag pa'i zabs che rab tu tsha //
translated: The pus is deep, and there is a lot of heat.

original: reg na 'jig cing rnags pa dang // 'dam ltar sha ni zhig gyur cing //
analyzed: reg na 'jig cing rnags pa dang // 'dam ltar sha ni zhig gyur cing //
translated: When touched, it breaks and becomes putrid, and the flesh decays like mud.

original: rtsa rgyus gsal bar snang ba yin //
analyzed: rtsa rgyus gsal bar snang ba yin //
translated: The veins and arteries appear clearly.

original: mi yi ro ltar mnam me dbal //
analyzed: mi yi ro ltar mnam me dbal //
translated: Like a human corpse, it smells bad.

original: de ni 'dam 'dra zhes byar bshad //🔽ces bya ba la /
analyzed: de ni 'dam 'dra zhes byar bshad // ces bya ba la /
translated: It is explained as being like a swamp.

original: bad kan dang mkhris pa las ni 'dam 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i me dbal 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bad kan dang mkhris pa las ni 'dam 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i me dbal 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The abscesses arise from phlegm and bile.

original: der yang mtshan ma rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa snang ste /
analyzed: der yang mtshan ma rims kyis 'debs pa la sogs pa snang ste /
translated: The signs of being afflicted by a fever, etc., appear there.

original: yan lag na zhing bya rmyang byed 'dod pa ni phan tshun rkyong zhing 'degs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yan lag na zhing bya rmyang byed 'dod pa ni phan tshun rkyong zhing 'degs par byed pa'o //
translated: The limbs ache and one wants to stretch, which is to say, one wants to extend and lift them.

original: rus pa chag pa snyam sems pa ni rus pa dkrum pa snyam du byed pa'o //
analyzed: rus pa chag pa snyam sems pa ni rus pa dkrum pa snyam du byed pa'o //
translated: One thinks that the bones are broken, which is to say, one thinks that the bones are shattered.

original: dang ga 'khyil ba ni zhal zhal byas snyam du sems shing bad kan la sogs pa 'khyil ba'o //
analyzed: dang ga 'khyil ba ni zhal zhal byas snyam du sems shing bad kan la sogs pa 'khyil ba'o //
translated: One thinks that one has been anointed, which is to say, phlegm, etc., are smeared on.

original: me dbal de yang phal cher ma zhu ba'i gnas nu ma dang lte ba'i bar du zhugs nas /
analyzed: me dbal de yang phal cher ma zhu ba'i gnas nu ma dang lte ba'i bar du zhugs nas /
translated: Moreover, that abscess mostly enters the place of indigestion between the breasts and the navel.

original: de'i phyogs gcig la brten te lhag par na bar mi byed do //
analyzed: de'i phyogs gcig la brten te lhag par na bar mi byed do //
translated: It does not cause excessive pain in one place.

original: yang na de bzhin du thor bu mdog ser po la sogs pas khyab cing gang bar byed pa dang / nor bu'i mdog lta bur snang ba ste /
analyzed: yang na de bzhin du thor bu mdog ser po la sogs pas khyab cing gang bar byed pa dang / nor bu'i mdog lta bur snang ba ste /
translated: Or, it is like a jewel, appearing as a yellow color, and so on.

original: gnag cing ser skyar gnas pa dang / phal cher mdog nag po dang smug por gnas pa dang / dri ma can la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / rnag pa'i zabs che zhing nang du nub pa dang / shas cher rab tu tsha ba dang /
analyzed: gnag cing ser skyar gnas pa dang / phal cher mdog nag po dang smug por gnas pa dang / dri ma can la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / rnag pa'i zabs che zhing nang du nub pa dang / shas cher rab tu tsha ba dang /
translated: It is black and resides as a dark yellow, it resides as mostly black and brown, it is associated with impurities, and so on. It is deep and sunken inside, it is mostly very hot,

original: lag pa la sogs pas reg na 'jig cing nyams la rnags pa 'dam ltar gnas shing sha rnams zhig par 'gyur pa dang / de nyid kyis rtsa rgyus la sogs pa gsal bar snang zhing gsal ba dang / mi ro ltar shin tu mnam zhing dri nga ba'i me dbal gyi nad de ni 'dam 'dra ba'i me dbal zhes bya'o zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
analyzed: lag pa la sogs pas reg na 'jig cing nyams la rnags pa 'dam ltar gnas shing sha rnams zhig par 'gyur pa dang / de nyid kyis rtsa rgyus la sogs pa gsal bar snang zhing gsal ba dang / mi ro ltar shin tu mnam zhing dri nga ba'i me dbal gyi nad de ni 'dam 'dra ba'i me dbal zhes bya'o zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
translated: and when touched with the hand, it breaks down and decays. It is like a swamp, and the flesh decays. By that, the veins and so on appear and are clear, and it is like a human corpse, very foul smelling and stinking. That is the disease of leprosy, which is like a swamp, as explained by the sages.

original: kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan //
analyzed: kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan //
translated: It is born from all, and has all characteristics.

original: lus zungs kun la rab khyab byed ;🔽/ ces bya ba la /
analyzed: lus zungs kun la rab khyab byed ; / ces bya ba la /
translated: It pervades all the body's constituents.🔽🔽

original: me dpal nad gzhi kun las skyes pa nad gzhi gsum car gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin la /
analyzed: me dpal nad gzhi kun las skyes pa nad gzhi gsum car gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin la /
translated: It is the fire of glory, arising from all the humors, and possessing the characteristics of all three humors.

original: yang des ni lus zungs thams cad la khyab cing mched par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: yang des ni lus zungs thams cad la khyab cing mched par byed pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, it spreads and pervades all the bodily constituents.

original: phyi yi rgyu yi smas las 'khrugs //
analyzed: phyi yi rgyu yi smas las 'khrugs //
translated: It is disturbed by external causes, such as blows.
